evidence_da: Antarktis -LRB- UK English -LSB- ænיtיktķkə -RSB- eller -LSB- æns-יtיtיkə -RSB- , US English -LSB- æntייייrktķkə -RSB- -RRB- is Earth 's sydligste kontinent . Den indeholder den geografiske Sydpol og er beliggende i den antarktiske region på den sydlige halvkugle , næsten helt syd for Antarktis Cirkel , og er omgivet af det sydlige Ocean . Med 14000000 km2 er det det femtestørste kontinent . Til sammenligning er Antarktis næsten dobbelt så stor som Australien . Omkring 98 % af Antarktis er dækket af is , der i gennemsnit er 1,9 km i tykkelse , hvilket strækker sig til alle undtagen de nordligste strækninger af Den Antarktiske Halvø .   Antarktis , i gennemsnit , er den koldeste , tørreste, og mest blæsende kontinent, og har den højeste gennemsnitlige højde af alle kontinenter . Antarktis er en ørken, med årlig nedbør på kun 200 mm -LRB- 8 i -RRB- langs kysten og langt mindre inde i landet . Temperaturen i Antarktis har nået − 89,2 ° C -LRB- − 128,6 ° F-RRB - selv om gennemsnittet for tredje kvartal -LRB- den koldeste del af året -RRB- er − 63 ° C -LRB- − 81 ° F -RRB- . Overalt fra 1.000 til 5.000 mennesker bor hele året på forskningsstationer spredt over hele kontinentet. Organismer hjemmehørende i Antarktis omfatter mange typer af alger , bakterier, svampe, planter, protista , og visse dyr , såsom mider , nematoder , pingviner , sæler og tardigrades . Vegetation , hvor det sker , er tundra .   Selv om myter og spekulationer om en Terra Australis-LRB- '' Southern Land '' -RRB- dateres tilbage til antikken , Antarktis er noteret som den sidste region på Jorden i historien, der skal opdages og koloniseres af mennesker , der først blev observeret i 1820 af den russiske ekspedition af Fabian Gottlieb von Bellingshausen og Mikhail Lazarev på Vostok og Mirny , der så Fimbul ishylden . Kontinentet forblev imidlertid stort set forsømt i resten af 1800-tallet på grund af dets fjendtlige miljø , mangel på lettilgængelige ressourcer og isolation . I 1895 blev den første bekræftede landing udført af et hold nordmænd .   Antarktis er en de facto ejerlejlighed , der reguleres af parterne i Antarktis traktat system , der har høring status . 12 lande underskrev Antarktis-traktaten i 1959 , og 38 har underskrevet den siden da . Traktaten forbyder militære aktiviteter og mineralminedrift , forbyder atomeksplosioner og bortskaffelse af nukleart affald , støtter videnskabelig forskning og beskytter kontinentets økozone . Igangværende eksperimenter udføres af mere end 4.000 forskere fra mange nationer.
evidence_en: Antarctica -LRB- UK English -LSB- ænˈtɑːktɪkə -RSB- or -LSB- ænˈtɑːtɪkə -RSB- , US English -LSB- æntˈɑːrktɪkə -RSB- -RRB- is Earth 's southernmost continent . It contains the geographic South Pole and is situated in the Antarctic region of the Southern Hemisphere , almost entirely south of the Antarctic Circle , and is surrounded by the Southern Ocean . At 14000000 km2 , it is the fifth-largest continent . For comparison , Antarctica is nearly twice the size of Australia . About 98 % of Antarctica is covered by ice that averages 1.9 km in thickness , which extends to all but the northernmost reaches of the Antarctic Peninsula .   Antarctica , on average , is the coldest , driest , and windiest continent , and has the highest average elevation of all the continents . Antarctica is a desert , with annual precipitation of only 200 mm -LRB- 8 in -RRB- along the coast and far less inland . The temperature in Antarctica has reached − 89.2 ° C -LRB- − 128.6 ° F -RRB- , though the average for the third quarter -LRB- the coldest part of the year -RRB- is − 63 ° C -LRB- − 81 ° F -RRB- . Anywhere from 1,000 to 5,000 people reside throughout the year at the research stations scattered across the continent . Organisms native to Antarctica include many types of algae , bacteria , fungi , plants , protista , and certain animals , such as mites , nematodes , penguins , seals and tardigrades . Vegetation , where it occurs , is tundra .   Although myths and speculation about a Terra Australis -LRB- `` Southern Land '' -RRB- date back to antiquity , Antarctica is noted as the last region on Earth in recorded history to be discovered and colonised by humans , being only first sighted in 1820 by the Russian expedition of Fabian Gottlieb von Bellingshausen and Mikhail Lazarev on Vostok and Mirny , who sighted the Fimbul ice shelf . The continent , however , remained largely neglected for the rest of the 19th century because of its hostile environment , lack of easily accessible resources , and isolation . In 1895 , the first confirmed landing was conducted by a team of Norwegians .   Antarctica is a de facto condominium , governed by parties to the Antarctic Treaty System that have consulting status . Twelve countries signed the Antarctic Treaty in 1959 , and thirty-eight have signed it since then . The treaty prohibits military activities and mineral mining , prohibits nuclear explosions and nuclear waste disposal , supports scientific research , and protects the continent 's ecozone . Ongoing experiments are conducted by more than 4,000 scientists from many nations .

evidence_da: Sydpolen , også kendt som Geografisk Sydpolen eller Terrestrial South Pole , er et af de to punkter , hvor Jordens rotationsakse skærer sin overflade . Det er det sydligste punkt på jordens overflade og ligger på den modsatte side af Jorden fra Nordpolen.   Beliggende på det kontinent Antarktis , er det stedet for USA Amundsen - Scott South Pole Station , som blev etableret i 1956 og har været fast bemandet siden det år . Geografisk Sydpol bør ikke forveksles med Sydmagnetpolen , som er defineret på grundlag af Jordens magnetfelt . Sydpolen er i centrum af den sydlige halvkugle.
evidence_en: The South Pole , also known as the Geographic South Pole or Terrestrial South Pole , is one of the two points where the Earth 's axis of rotation intersects its surface . It is the southernmost point on the surface of the Earth and lies on the opposite side of the Earth from the North Pole .   Situated on the continent of Antarctica , it is the site of the United States Amundsen -- Scott South Pole Station , which was established in 1956 and has been permanently staffed since that year . The Geographic South Pole should not be confused with the South Magnetic Pole , which is defined based on the Earth 's magnetic field . The South Pole is at the center of the Southern Hemisphere .

evidence_da: Taal -LRB- Engelsk : Rhythm -RRB- er en 1999 Bollywood musikalsk eukromantisk drama film co skrevet, redigeret , produceret og instrueret af Subhash Ghai . Taal var et officielt valg til 2005 Ebertfest : Roger Ebert 's Film Festival . Taal blev screenet med tilbagevirkende kraft , under 2014 International Film Festival of India i Fejring Dance i indiske biograf sektion .   Filmen stjerner Anil Kapoor , Akshaye Khanna , Aishwarya Rai , Amrish Puri og Alok Nath . Det blev også døbt i Tamil som Thaalam . Det var meget vellykket i Indien og udlandet , bliver den første indiske film til at nå top 20 på Variety 's box office liste . Anil Kapoor , A. R. Rahman , Alka Yagnik og Anand Bakshi hver vandt en Filmfare Award for deres arbejde i filmen .
evidence_en: Taal -LRB- English : Rhythm -RRB- is a 1999 Bollywood musical romantic drama film co written , edited , produced and directed by Subhash Ghai . Taal was an official selection for the 2005 Ebertfest : Roger Ebert 's Film Festival . Taal was screened retrospectively , during the 2014 International Film Festival of India in the Celebrating Dance in Indian cinema section .   The film stars Anil Kapoor , Akshaye Khanna , Aishwarya Rai , Amrish Puri and Alok Nath . It was also dubbed in Tamil as Thaalam . It was very successful in India and overseas , becoming the first Indian film to reach the top 20 on Variety 's box office list . Anil Kapoor , A. R. Rahman , Alka Yagnik and Anand Bakshi each won a Filmfare Award for their work in the film .

evidence_da: Forslaget er en amerikansk romantisk komediefilm fra 2009 instrueret af Anne Fletcher og skrevet af Peter Chiarelli . Filmen stjerner Sandra Bullock og Ryan Reynolds , Betty White , Mary Steenburgen og Craig T. Nelson . Filmen blev produceret af Mandeville Films og udgivet den 19 juni 2009 , i Nordamerika af Touchstone Pictures . Plottet er centreret om en canadisk udøvende , Margaret Tate , der lærer, at hun kan stå over for udvisning fra USA på grund af hendes udløbne visum . Fast besluttet på at bevare sin stilling som chefredaktør for et forlag , Tate overbeviser hendes assistent , Andrew Paxton , til midlertidigt at fungere som hendes forlovede . Oprindeligt planer om at genoptage deres liv efter Tate løser hendes visum spørgsmål , de synes at opgive disse planer som deres forhold intensiveres .   Udviklingen på filmen begyndte i 2005 , da Chiarelli skrev filmens manuskript . Vigtigste optagelserne fandt sted over en periode på to måneder fra marts til maj 2008 . Filmen modtog blandede anmeldelser fra kritikere , der kritiserede sit manuskript , men roste kemien mellem Bullock og Reynolds . Filmen var en box office succes , opregning over $ 317 millioner på verdensplan , bliver den højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren romantisk komedie film af 2009 .
evidence_en: The Proposal is a 2009 American romantic comedy film directed by Anne Fletcher and written by Peter Chiarelli . The film stars Sandra Bullock and Ryan Reynolds , Betty White , Mary Steenburgen and Craig T. Nelson . The film was produced by Mandeville Films and released on June 19 , 2009 , in North America by Touchstone Pictures . The plot centers on a Canadian executive , Margaret Tate , who learns that she may face deportation from the U.S. because of her expired visa . Determined to retain her position as editor in chief of a publishing house , Tate convinces her assistant , Andrew Paxton , to temporarily act as her fiancé . Initially planning on resuming their lives after Tate resolves her visa issues , they appear to abandon those plans as their relationship intensifies .   Development on the film began in 2005 , when Chiarelli wrote the film 's script . Principal filming occurred over a period of two months from March to May 2008 . The film received mixed reviews from critics , who criticized its script , but praised the chemistry between Bullock and Reynolds . The film was a box office success , grossing over $ 317 million worldwide , becoming the highest grossing romantic comedy film of 2009 .

evidence_da: Pierce Brendan Brosnan , OBE -LRB- født 16 Maj 1953 -RRB- er en irsk skuespiller , filmproducent , og aktivist, der efter at have forladt omfattende skole i en alder af 16 , begyndte uddannelse i kommerciel illustration . Han fortsatte med at træne på Drama Centre i London i tre år . Efter en scene skuespillerkarriere han steg til popularitet i tv-serien Remington Steele -LRB- 1982 - 87 -RRB-, som blandede genrer af romantisk komedie , drama , og detektiv proceduremæssige . Efter afslutningen af Remington Steele , Brosnan dukkede op i film som den kolde krig spion film The Fourth Protocol -LRB- 1987 -RRB- og komedien Mrs Doubtfire -LRB- 1993 -RRB- .   I 1994 blev Brosnan den femte skuespiller til at skildre hemmelige agent James Bond i Eon Productions filmserie , stjernespækket i fire film fra 1995 til 2002 -LRB- GoldenEye , Tomorrow Never Dies , Verden er ikke nok og Die Another Day-RRB-. Han lånte sin lighed for Bond i videospil James Bond 007 : Nightfire og James Bond 007 : Alt eller intet , der giver sin stemme til sidstnævnte . I denne periode tog han også føringen i andre film, herunder den episke katastrofe eventyr film Dante 's Peak-LRB- 1997 -RRB- og genindspilningen af kup filmen The Thomas Crown Affair -LRB- 1999 -RRB- . Siden han forlod rollen som Bond , har han medvirket i film som den musikalske / romantiske komedie Mamma Mia ! -LRB- 2008 -RRB-, den romerske Polanski-instrueret politiske thriller The Ghost Writer-LRB- 2010 -RRB- og handlingen spion thriller The November Man -LRB- 2014 -RRB- .   I 1996 dannede Brosnan sammen med Beau St. Clair irish DreamTime , et produktionsselskab i Los Angeles . I de senere år er han blevet kendt for sit velgørende arbejde og miljøaktivisme . Han var gift med den australske skuespillerinde Cassandra Harris fra 1980 til hendes død i 1991 . Han giftede sig med den amerikanske journalist og forfatter Keely Shaye Smith i 2001 , og blev amerikansk statsborger i 2004 , der havde dobbelt statsborgerskab i USA og Irland . Han har tjent to Golden Globe Award nomineringer , først for tv-miniserien Nancy Astor -LRB- 1982 -RRB- og næste for den mørke komedie film The Matador-LRB- 2005 -RRB- .
evidence_en: Pierce Brendan Brosnan , OBE -LRB- born 16 May 1953 -RRB- is an Irish actor , film producer , and activist who after leaving comprehensive school at age 16 , began training in commercial illustration . He then went on to train at the Drama Centre in London for three years . Following a stage acting career he rose to popularity in the television series Remington Steele -LRB- 1982 -- 87 -RRB- , which blended the genres of romantic comedy , drama , and detective procedural . After the conclusion of Remington Steele , Brosnan appeared in films such as the Cold War spy film The Fourth Protocol -LRB- 1987 -RRB- and the comedy Mrs. Doubtfire -LRB- 1993 -RRB- .   In 1994 , Brosnan became the fifth actor to portray secret agent James Bond in the Eon Productions film series , starring in four films from 1995 to 2002 -LRB- GoldenEye , Tomorrow Never Dies , The World Is Not Enough and Die Another Day -RRB- . He lent his likeness for Bond in the video games James Bond 007 : Nightfire and James Bond 007 : Everything or Nothing , providing his voice for the latter . During this period , he also took the lead in other films including the epic disaster adventure film Dante 's Peak -LRB- 1997 -RRB- and the remake of the heist film The Thomas Crown Affair -LRB- 1999 -RRB- . Since leaving the role of Bond , he has starred in such films as the musical/romantic comedy Mamma Mia ! -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , the Roman Polanski-directed political thriller The Ghost Writer -LRB- 2010 -RRB- and the action spy thriller The November Man -LRB- 2014 -RRB- .   In 1996 , along with Beau St. Clair , Brosnan formed Irish DreamTime , a Los Angeles-based production company . In later years , he has become known for his charitable work and environmental activism . He was married to Australian actress Cassandra Harris from 1980 until her death in 1991 . He married American journalist and author Keely Shaye Smith in 2001 , and became an American citizen in 2004 , holding dual citizenship in the United States and Ireland . He has earned two Golden Globe Award nominations , first for the television miniseries Nancy Astor -LRB- 1982 -RRB- and next for the dark comedy film The Matador -LRB- 2005 -RRB- .

evidence_da: Susan Abigail Sarandon -LRB- -LSB- səיrændən -RSB- født Tomalin ; født 4 oktober , 1946 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller og aktivist . Hun er en Oscar og BAFTA Award vinder, som også er kendt for sin sociale og politiske aktivisme for en række forskellige årsager . Hun blev udnævnt til UNICEF Goodwill-ambassadør i 1999 og modtog aktionen mod humanitær uddeling i 2006 .   Sarandon begyndte sin karriere i 1970 filmen Joe , før optræder i sæbeoperaA World Apart -LRB- 1970 - 71 -RRB- . I 1975 medvirkede hun i kultklassikeren The Rocky Horror Picture Show . Hun blev nomineret til Oscar for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle for Atlantic City -LRB- 1980 -RRB- , Thelma & Louise -LRB- 1991 -RRB- , Lorenzo 's Oil -LRB- 1992 -RRB- og The Client -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , før han vandt for Dead Man Walking -LRB- 1995 -RRB- . Hun har også vundet BAFTA Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle i en hovedrolle for Kunden , og Screen Actors Guild Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle for Dead Man Walking . Hendes andre film omfatter : Pretty Baby -LRB- 1978 -RRB-, The Hunger-LRB- 1983 -RRB- , The Witches of Eastwick -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , Bull Durham -LRB- 1988 -RRB- , White Palace -LRB- 1990 -RRB- , Little Women -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , Stepmom -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , Enchanted -LRB- 2007 -R RB- , The Lovely Bones -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , Tammy -LRB- 2014 -RRB- og The Meddler -LRB- 2015 -RRB- .   Hun fik sin Broadway debut i En aften med Richard Nixon i 1972 og fortsatte med at modtage Drama Desk Award nomineringer til Off-Broadway spiller , A Coupla White Chicks Sidder Around Talking -LRB- 1979 -RRB- og Ekstremiteter -LRB- 1982 -RRB- . Hun vendte tilbage til Broadway i 2009 genoplivning af Exit the King .   På tv , hun er en fem-tiden Emmy Award nomineret , herunder for hendes gæst roller på sitcoms Friends -LRB- 2001 -RRB- og Malcolm i Midten -LRB- 2002 -RRB-, og tv-film Bernard og Doris -LRB- 2007 -RRB- og du kender ikke Jack -LRB- 2010 -RRB- . I 2017 portrætterede Sarandon Bette Davis i den første sæson af FX 's antologi serie Fejde .
evidence_en: Susan Abigail Sarandon -LRB- -LSB- səˈrændən -RSB- née Tomalin ; born October 4 , 1946 -RRB- is an American actress and activist . She is an Academy Award and BAFTA Award winner who is also known for her social and political activism for a variety of causes . She was appointed a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador in 1999 and received the Action Against Hunger Humanitarian Award in 2006 .   Sarandon began her career in the 1970 film Joe , before appearing in the soap opera A World Apart -LRB- 1970 -- 71 -RRB- . In 1975 , she starred in the cult classic film The Rocky Horror Picture Show . She was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress for Atlantic City -LRB- 1980 -RRB- , Thelma & Louise -LRB- 1991 -RRB- , Lorenzo 's Oil -LRB- 1992 -RRB- , and The Client -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , before winning for Dead Man Walking -LRB- 1995 -RRB- . She has also won the BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role for The Client , and the Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Actress for Dead Man Walking . Her other films include : Pretty Baby -LRB- 1978 -RRB- , The Hunger -LRB- 1983 -RRB- , The Witches of Eastwick -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , Bull Durham -LRB- 1988 -RRB- , White Palace -LRB- 1990 -RRB- , Little Women -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , Stepmom -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , Enchanted -LRB- 2007 -RRB- , The Lovely Bones -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , Tammy -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , and The Meddler -LRB- 2015 -RRB- .   She made her Broadway debut in An Evening with Richard Nixon in 1972 and went on to receive Drama Desk Award nominations for the Off-Broadway plays , A Coupla White Chicks Sitting Around Talking -LRB- 1979 -RRB- and Extremities -LRB- 1982 -RRB- . She returned to Broadway in the 2009 revival of Exit the King .   On television , she is a five-time Emmy Award nominee , including for her guest roles on the sitcoms Friends -LRB- 2001 -RRB- and Malcolm in the Middle -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , and the TV films Bernard and Doris -LRB- 2007 -RRB- and You Do n't Know Jack -LRB- 2010 -RRB- . In 2017 , Sarandon portrayed Bette Davis in the first season of FX 's anthology series Feud .

evidence_da: Transformers : Dark of the Moon er en amerikansk science fiction-actionfilm fra 2011 instrueret af Michael Bay og baseret på legetøjslinjen af samme navn skabt af Hasbro . Det er den tredje rate i live-action Transformers filmserie , og er efterfølgeren til 2009 's Transformers : Revenge of the Fallen . Det er også den første film i serien ikke at være co-produceret af DreamWorks . Filmen stjerner Shia LaBeouf , Josh Duhamel , John Turturro , Tyrese Gibson , Rosie Huntington-Whiteley , Patrick Dempsey , Kevin Dunn , Julie White , John Malkovich og Frances McDormand . Dens historie er sat tre år efter begivenhederne i Revenge of the Fallen , og følger de stridende Autobots og Decepticons, som de kæmper for at besidde kraftfuld teknologi fra deres hjemverden, der var styrtet ned på Jordens måne .   Manuskriptet blev skrevet af Ehren Kruger , som også samarbejdede om fortællingen om Revenge of the Fallen . Dark of the Moon ansat både regelmæssige 35mm film kameraer og specielt udviklede 3-D kameraer , med optagelserne steder i Chicago , Florida, Indiana , Milwaukee , Moskva , og Washington , DC . Filmen blev gengivet specifikt til 3D , og de visuelle effekter involverede mere komplekse robotter , som tog længere tid at gøre . I maj 2011 , blev det annonceret, at Paramount ville flytte Dark of the Moon udgivelsesdato juli 1 til juni 29 , for at overvåge en tidlig reaktion på optagelser .   Eksklusive tidlige premierer i udvalgte 3D- og IMAX-teatre fandt sted 28. Kritisk modtagelse af filmen var blandet , med flere kritikere kalder det bedre end Revenge of the Fallen og rose filmens visuals , Steve Jablonsky 's musikalske score , og 3-D action sekvenser , mens andre kritiserede dens skriftligt , handler , og længde . Dark of the Moon indtjente US $ 1,12 milliarder på verdensplan , og er i øjeblikket den 13.-højest indtjenende film af hele tiden , den næsthøjest epolationsfaktoren film af 2011 -LRB- bag Harry Potter og Dødsregalierne - Del 2 -RRB-, den højest indtjenende film i 2011 -LRB- bag Harry Potter og Dødsregalierne - Del 2 -RRB-, den højest indtjenende film i Transformers serien , og den tiende film til brutto over $ 1 milliard . Ligesom den første film , blev det nomineret til bedste lydredigering , Best Sound Mixing , og bedste visuelle effekter på 84th Academy Awards . Det blev efterfulgt af Transformers : Age of Extinction i 2014 . En femte film , med titlen Transformers : The Last Knight er indstillet til at blive frigivet i 2017 .
evidence_en: Transformers : Dark of the Moon is a 2011 American science fiction action film directed by Michael Bay and based on the toy line of the same name created by Hasbro . It is the third installment in the live-action Transformers film series , and is the sequel to 2009 's Transformers : Revenge of the Fallen . It is also the first film in the series not to be co-produced by DreamWorks . The film stars Shia LaBeouf , Josh Duhamel , John Turturro , Tyrese Gibson , Rosie Huntington-Whiteley , Patrick Dempsey , Kevin Dunn , Julie White , John Malkovich and Frances McDormand . Its story is set three years after the events of Revenge of the Fallen , and follows the warring Autobots and Decepticons as they battle to possess powerful technology from their homeworld that had crashed on Earth 's moon .   The script was written by Ehren Kruger , who also collaborated on the narrative of Revenge of the Fallen . Dark of the Moon employed both regular 35mm film cameras and specially-developed 3-D cameras , with filming locations in Chicago , Florida , Indiana , Milwaukee , Moscow , and Washington , D.C. . The film was rendered specifically for 3-D , and the visual effects involved more complex robots which took longer to render . In May 2011 , it was announced that Paramount would move Dark of the Moon release date of July 1 to June 29 , in order to monitor an early response to footage .   Exclusive early premieres in select 3D and IMAX theaters took place June 28 , 2011 , one night before worldwide release in 2D and 3D -LRB- including IMAX 3D -RRB- formats -- each featuring Dolby Surround 7.1 sound . Critical reception of the film was mixed , with several critics calling it better than Revenge of the Fallen and praising the film 's visuals , Steve Jablonsky 's musical score , and 3-D action sequences , while others criticized its writing , acting , and length . Dark of the Moon grossed US$ 1.12 billion worldwide , and is currently the 13th-highest-grossing film of all time , the second-highest-grossing film of 2011 -LRB- behind Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows -- Part 2 -RRB- , the highest-grossing film in the Transformers series , and the 10th film to gross over $ 1 billion . Like the first film , it was nominated for Best Sound Editing , Best Sound Mixing , and Best Visual Effects at the 84th Academy Awards . It was followed by Transformers : Age of Extinction in 2014 . A fifth film , titled Transformers : The Last Knight is set to be released in 2017 .

evidence_da: Legion er en amerikansk kabel-tv-serie skabt til FX af Noah Hawley , baseret på Marvel Comics karakter David Haller / Legion . Det er forbundet til X-Men filmserie , den første tv-serie til at være det, og er produceret af FX Productions i samarbejde med Marvel Television . Hawley fungerer som showrunner på serien .   Dan Stevens stjerner som Haller , en mutant diagnosticeret med skizofreni i en ung alder . Rachel Keller , Aubrey Plaza , Bill Irwin , Jeremie Harris , Amber Midthunder , Katie Aselton , og Jean Smart også stjerne . FX og Marvel Television annonceret et nyt samarbejde om at skabe en tv-serie baseret på X-Men karakter Legion i oktober 2015 , med Hawley underskrevet den til at skrive , og direkte piloten . Casting begyndte i januar 2016 , og optagelserne fandt sted i Vancouver . Hawley ønskede at vise Haller som en '' upålidelig fortæller '', herunder blanding af 1960'erne design med moderne elementer, og filme serien gennem titeltegnet 's forvrænget opfattelse af virkeligheden .   Den otte-episode første sæson af Legion havde premiere på Pacific Design Center on January 26 , 2017 , forud for sin FX debut februar 8 . Serien fik kritikerros , især for sin grafik og afvigelse fra superhelte genre standarder . En anden sæson - på ti episoder - blev bestilt i marts 2017 og er planlagt til en udgivelse i februar 2018 .
evidence_en: Legion is an American cable television series created for FX by Noah Hawley , based on the Marvel Comics character David Haller / Legion . It is connected to the X-Men film series , the first television series to be so , and is produced by FX Productions in association with Marvel Television . Hawley serves as showrunner on the series .   Dan Stevens stars as Haller , a mutant diagnosed with schizophrenia at a young age . Rachel Keller , Aubrey Plaza , Bill Irwin , Jeremie Harris , Amber Midthunder , Katie Aselton , and Jean Smart also star . FX and Marvel Television announced a new collaboration to create a television series based on the X-Men character Legion in October 2015 , with Hawley signed on to write , and direct the pilot . Casting began by January 2016 , and filming took place in Vancouver . Hawley wanted to show Haller as an `` unreliable narrator '' , including mixing 1960s design with modern-day elements , and filming the series through the title character 's distorted view of reality .   The eight-episode first season of Legion premiered at the Pacific Design Center on January 26 , 2017 , ahead of its FX debut on February 8 . The series received critical acclaim , particularly for its visuals and departure from superhero genre standards . A second season , of ten episodes , was ordered in March 2017 and is planned for a February 2018 release .

evidence_da: Jennifer Kate Hudson -LRB- født September 12 , 1981 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , skuespiller og talsmand . Hun steg til berømmelse i 2004 som finalist på den tredje sæson af American Idol , der kommer på syvendepladsen .   Som skuespiller , hun gjorde sin filmdebut portrættere Effie White i Dreamgirls , som hun fik verdensomspændende anerkendelse og vandt en Oscar , en Golden Globe Award , en BAFTA Award og en Screen Actors Guild Award for bedste kvindelige birolle . Hun har også optrådt i film som Sex and the City , The Secret Life of Bees og Black Fødselskirken . Hun har lavet mange tv-optrædener , herunder gæsteroller på Smash , Empire og Inside Amy Schumer . I 2015 debuterede hun på Broadway i rollen som Shug Avery i genoplivningen af The Color Purple i 2015.   Som sanger har Hudson udgivet tre studiealbum . Hendes debut album Jennifer Hudson , udgivet i 2008 , debuterede som nummer to på Billboard 200 og blev certificeret guld af RIAA , med salg på over en million eksemplarer på verdensplan . Pladen blev nomineret til fire Grammy Awards , vinde 2009 Grammy Award for Bedste R&B Album . Hendes andet album I Remember Me , udgivet i 2011 , også debuterede som nummer to på Billboard 200 og blev certificeret guld af RIAA . Hendes tredje og seneste album JHUD toppede i top ti og fremhævede den Grammy-nominerede nummer '' It 's Your World ''. Hun blev også hovedsanger i The Color Purple musikalske album , som gav hende 2017 Grammy Award for Bedste Musical Theater Album og en Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Musical Performance i en Daytime Program -LRB- delt med støbt af The Color Purple - RRB.   I oktober 2008 , efter Hudson 's mor , bror og nevø blev dræbt i et skyderi , Hudson trådte ud af offentlighedens søgelys i tre måneder . Hudson genoptaget hendes offentlige optrædener i 2009 , med højt profilerede forestillinger på Super Bowl XLIII , Grammy Awards , American Idol , og The Oprah Winfrey Show . Hudson er blevet beskrevet som en ven af tidligere præsident Barack Obama , der inviterede hende til at møde op med ham på en fundraiser i Beverly Hills i løbet af sin første periode i maj 2009 . Hun optrådte også i Det Hvide Hus ved '' Celebration of Music fra Civil Rights Movement '' begivenhed . I 2013 modtog hun en stjerne på Hollywood Walk of Fame . I 2016 blev Hudson annonceret som træner på 2017 Series of The Voice UK . Det følgende år , Hudson blev annonceret som træner på den trettende sæson af The Voice .
evidence_en: Jennifer Kate Hudson -LRB- born September 12 , 1981 -RRB- is an American singer , actress and spokesperson . She rose to fame in 2004 as a finalist on the third season of American Idol , coming in seventh place .   As an actress , she made her film debut portraying Effie White in Dreamgirls , for which she gained worldwide acclaim and won an Academy Award , a Golden Globe Award , a BAFTA Award and a Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Supporting Actress . She has also appeared in such films as Sex and the City , The Secret Life of Bees and Black Nativity . She has made numerous television appearances , including guest roles on Smash , Empire and Inside Amy Schumer . In 2015 she made her Broadway debut in the role of Shug Avery in the 2015 revival of The Color Purple .   As a singer , Hudson has released three studio albums . Her debut album Jennifer Hudson , released in 2008 , debuted at number two on the Billboard 200 and was certified gold by the RIAA , with sales exceeding a million copies worldwide . The record was nominated for four Grammy Awards , winning the 2009 Grammy Award for Best R&B Album . Her second album I Remember Me , released in 2011 , also debuted at number two on the Billboard 200 and was certified gold by the RIAA . Her third and most recent album JHUD peaked in the top ten and featured the Grammy-nominated track `` It 's Your World '' . She also became the principal singer of The Color Purple musical album , which earned her the 2017 Grammy Award for Best Musical Theater Album and a Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Musical Performance in a Daytime Program -LRB- shared with the cast of The Color Purple -RRB- .   In October 2008 , after Hudson 's mother , brother and nephew were killed in a shooting , Hudson stepped out of the public eye for three months . Hudson resumed her public appearances in 2009 , with high-profile performances at Super Bowl XLIII , the Grammy Awards , American Idol , and The Oprah Winfrey Show . Hudson has been described as a friend of former President Barack Obama , who invited her to appear with him at a fundraiser in Beverly Hills during his first term in May 2009 . She also performed at the White House at the `` Celebration of Music from the Civil Rights Movement '' event . In 2013 , she received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame . In 2016 , Hudson was announced as a coach on the 2017 Series of The Voice UK . The following year , Hudson was announced as a coach on the thirteenth season of The Voice .

evidence_da: King Kong er en 2005 episke monster eventyr film co-skrevet , produceret, og instrueret af Peter Jackson . En genindspilning af 1933-filmen af samme navn , filmen stjerner Naomi Watts , Jack Black , Adrien Brody , og , gennem motion capture , Andy Serkis som titelkarakter . Set i 1933 , King Kong fortæller historien om en ambitiøs filmskaber, der tvinger hans stemmer og hyret skibet besætning til at rejse til den mystiske Skull Island . Der møder de Kong , en legendarisk kæmpe gorilla , som de fanger og tager til New York City.   Optagelserne til King Kong fandt sted i New Zealand fra september 2004 til marts 2005 . Projektets budget steg fra en indledende $ 150 millioner til en dengang rekordstor $ 207 millioner . december 2005 i Tyskland og den 16. Mens det klarede sig lavere end forventet , King Kong gjort indenlandske og verdensomspændende grosses, der i sidste ende lægges op til $ 550 millioner , bliver den fjerde-højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film i Universal Pictures historie . Det genererede også $ 100 millioner i DVD salg på sit hjem video udgivelse . Filmen høstet positive anmeldelser fra kritikere og dukkede op på flere top ti lister for 2005 . Det blev rost for sine specialeffects , forestillinger , sans for skuespil og sammenligning med 1933 originalen . Det vandt tre Academy Awards for bedste lydredigering , Bedste Lydblanding og bedste visuelle effekter .
evidence_en: King Kong is a 2005 epic monster adventure film co-written , produced , and directed by Peter Jackson . A remake of the 1933 film of the same name , the film stars Naomi Watts , Jack Black , Adrien Brody , and , through motion capture , Andy Serkis as the title character . Set in 1933 , King Kong tells the story of an ambitious filmmaker who coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to the mysterious Skull Island . There they encounter Kong , a legendary giant gorilla , whom they capture and take to New York City .   Filming for King Kong took place in New Zealand from September 2004 to March 2005 . The project 's budget climbed from an initial $ 150 million to a then-record-breaking $ 207 million . It was released on December 14 , 2005 in Germany and on December 16 in the United States , and made an opening of $ 50.1 million . While it performed lower than expected , King Kong made domestic and worldwide grosses that eventually added up to $ 550 million , becoming the fourth-highest-grossing film in Universal Pictures history . It also generated $ 100 million in DVD sales upon its home video release . The film garnered positive reviews from critics and appeared on several top ten lists for 2005 . It was praised for its special effects , performances , sense of spectacle and comparison to the 1933 original . It won three Academy Awards for Best Sound Editing , Best Sound Mixing and Best Visual Effects .

evidence_en: Michelle Ingrid Williams -LRB- born September 9 , 1980 -RRB- is an American actress . She began her career with television guest appearances , and made her feature film debut in Lassie -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , which earned her a Youth in Film nomination . She gained wider recognition for her role as Jen Lindley on the The WB series Dawson 's Creek from 1998 to 2003 .   Williams received critical acclaim for the role of Alma , wife of Ennis Del Mar , in Brokeback Mountain -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , for which she won a Broadcast Film Critics Association Award and was nominated for the SAG Award , BAFTA Award , Golden Globe , and Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress . She followed this with films such as Martin Scorsese 's Shutter Island -LRB- 2010 -RRB- . Her work in Blue Valentine -LRB- 2010 -RRB- garnered her nominations for the Golden Globe Award and the Academy Award for Best Actress . She won a Golden Globe and an Independent Spirit Award for her portrayal of Marilyn Monroe in My Week with Marilyn -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , which also garnered her BAFTA , SAG , and Academy Award nominations . In 2016 , she received wide acclaim for her performance in the drama Manchester by the Sea , earning her nominations from the BAFTA , SAG , and Academy Award ceremonies . evidence_da: Oscar Fingal O'Flahertie Wills Wilde -LRB- 16 Oktober 185430 November 1900 -RRB- var en irsk dramatiker , forfatter , essayist , og digter . Efter at have skrevet i forskellige former i 1880'erne , blev han en af Londons mest populære dramatikere i begyndelsen af 1890'erne . Han huskes for sine epigram , hans roman The Picture of Dorian Gray , hans skuespil , samt omstændighederne ved hans fængsling og tidlig død .   Wilde 's forældre var en succes anglo-irske , Dublin intellektuelle . Deres søn blev flydende i fransk og tysk tidligt i livet. På universitetet , Wilde læse Greats ; han viste sig at være en fremragende klassicist , først i Dublin , derefter på Oxford . Han blev kendt for sit engagement i den stigende filosofi om æstetik , ledet af to af hans vejledere , Walter Pater og John Ruskin . Efter universitetet flyttede Wilde til London i fashionable kulturelle og sociale kredse .   Som talsmand for æstetik , prøvede han sin hånd på forskellige litterære aktiviteter : han udgav en bog af digte , foredrag i USA og Canada om den nye '' engelske renæssance i Art '' , og derefter vendte tilbage til London, hvor han arbejdede prolifically som journalist  . Kendt for sin bidende vid, flamboyante kjole og glitrende samtale , Wilde blev en af de mest kendte personligheder i sin tid .   Ved årsskiftet 1890'erne, han raffineret sine ideer om overherredømme af kunst i en række dialoger og essays , og indarbejdet temaer dekadence, dobbelthed , og skønhed i hans eneste roman , Billedet af Dorian Gray-LRB-1890-RRB- . Muligheden for at konstruere æstetiske detaljer præcist , og kombinere dem med større sociale temaer , trak Wilde til at skrive drama . Han skrev Salome -LRB- 1891 -RRB- på fransk i Paris, men det blev nægtet en licens til England på grund af det absolutte forbud mod bibelske emner på den engelske scene . Uforstyrret , Wilde produceret fire samfund komedier i begyndelsen af 1890'erne , hvilket gjorde ham til en af de mest succesfulde dramatikere i slutningen af victorianske London .   På højden af hans berømmelse og succes , mens vigtigheden af at være alvor -LRB- 1895 -RRB-, stadig blev udført i London , Wilde havde Marquess af Queensberry retsforfulgt for kriminel injurier . Den Marquess var far til Wilde 's elsker, Lord Alfred Douglas . Injurier retssagen afdækket beviser, der forårsagede Wilde at droppe sine afgifter og førte til hans egen anholdelse og retssag for grov uanstændighed med mænd . Efter yderligere to retssager blev han dømt og fængslet i to års hårdt arbejde , den maksimale straf .   I 1897 skrev han i fængslet De Profundis , som blev offentliggjort i 1905 , et langt brev , der diskuterer hans åndelige rejse gennem sine prøvelser , hvilket danner et mørkt modstykke til hans tidligere filosofi om nydelse . Efter sin løsladelse rejste han straks til Frankrig , aldrig at vende tilbage til Irland eller Storbritannien . Der skrev han sit sidste værk , Balladen om Reading Gaol -LRB- 1898 -RRB-, et langt digt til minde om de barske rytmer i fængselslivet . Han døde nødlidende i Paris i en alder af 46 .
evidence_en: Oscar Fingal O'Flahertie Wills Wilde -LRB- 16 October 185430 November 1900 -RRB- was an Irish playwright , novelist , essayist , and poet . After writing in different forms throughout the 1880s , he became one of London 's most popular playwrights in the early 1890s . He is remembered for his epigrams , his novel The Picture of Dorian Gray , his plays , as well as the circumstances of his imprisonment and early death .   Wilde 's parents were successful Anglo-Irish , Dublin intellectuals . Their son became fluent in French and German early in life . At university , Wilde read Greats ; he proved himself to be an outstanding classicist , first at Dublin , then at Oxford . He became known for his involvement in the rising philosophy of aestheticism , led by two of his tutors , Walter Pater and John Ruskin . After university , Wilde moved to London into fashionable cultural and social circles .   As a spokesman for aestheticism , he tried his hand at various literary activities : he published a book of poems , lectured in the United States and Canada on the new `` English Renaissance in Art '' , and then returned to London where he worked prolifically as a journalist . Known for his biting wit , flamboyant dress and glittering conversation , Wilde became one of the best-known personalities of his day .   At the turn of the 1890s , he refined his ideas about the supremacy of art in a series of dialogues and essays , and incorporated themes of decadence , duplicity , and beauty into his only novel , The Picture of Dorian Gray -LRB- 1890 -RRB- . The opportunity to construct aesthetic details precisely , and combine them with larger social themes , drew Wilde to write drama . He wrote Salome -LRB- 1891 -RRB- in French in Paris but it was refused a licence for England due to the absolute prohibition of Biblical subjects on the English stage . Unperturbed , Wilde produced four society comedies in the early 1890s , which made him one of the most successful playwrights of late Victorian London .   At the height of his fame and success , while The Importance of Being Earnest -LRB- 1895 -RRB- , was still being performed in London , Wilde had the Marquess of Queensberry prosecuted for criminal libel . The Marquess was the father of Wilde 's lover , Lord Alfred Douglas . The libel trial unearthed evidence that caused Wilde to drop his charges and led to his own arrest and trial for gross indecency with men . After two more trials he was convicted and imprisoned for two years ' hard labour , the maximum penalty .   In 1897 , in prison , he wrote De Profundis , which was published in 1905 , a long letter which discusses his spiritual journey through his trials , forming a dark counterpoint to his earlier philosophy of pleasure . Upon his release he left immediately for France , never to return to Ireland or Britain . There he wrote his last work , The Ballad of Reading Gaol -LRB- 1898 -RRB- , a long poem commemorating the harsh rhythms of prison life . He died destitute in Paris at the age of 46 .

Han er blevet beskrevet af kloge hoveder som en talentfuld angriber, hvis vigtigste egenskaber er hans kropslighed, målscoring og evne til at holde besiddelse . Costa er blevet kritiseret og straffet for flere konfrontationer med modstandere .   Han begyndte sin karriere hos Braga og Penafiel i Portugal , og blev underskrevet af Atlético Madrid i 2007 . Han blev lånt tilbage til Braga , og derefter til Celta de Vigo og Albacete, før de blev solgt til Real Valladolid i 2009 . Han vendte tilbage til Atlético den følgende sæson og fortsatte med at spille en central rolle i deres angreb , scorede 27 mål, da de vandt ligaen titel i 2014 , og derefter sluttede Chelsea for # 32 millioner . Han scorede 21 mål i sin første sæson i England , vinde Premier League og League Cup . evidence_en: Diego da Silva Costa -LRB- -LSB- ˈdjeɣo ða ˈsilβa ˈkosta -RSB- , -LSB- ˈdʒjeɡu dɐ ˈsiwvɐ ˈkɔstɐ -RSB- ; born 7 October 1988 -RRB- , is a professional footballer who plays as a striker for English club Chelsea and the Spain national team . He has been described by pundits as a talented striker whose main attributes are his physicality , goalscoring and ability to keep possession . Costa has been criticised and punished for several confrontations with opponents .   He began his career with Braga and Penafiel in Portugal , and was signed by Atlético Madrid in 2007 . He was loaned back to Braga , and then to Celta de Vigo and Albacete before being sold to Real Valladolid in 2009 . He returned to Atlético the following season and went on to play a key role in their attack , scoring 27 goals as they won the league title in 2014 , and then joined Chelsea for # 32 million . He scored 21 goals in his first season in England , winning the Premier League and League Cup .   Internationally , Costa played twice for his native Brazil in 2013 , but later declared his desire to represent Spain , having been granted Spanish citizenship in September 2013 . He made his debut for his adopted nation in March 2014 , and represented them at the 2014 FIFA World Cup .

evidence_en: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau -LRB- -LSB- neɡ̊olaɪ̯ kʰʌsd̥ɐ ˈʋald̥ɑʊ̯ -RSB- ; born 27 July 1970 -RRB- is a Danish actor , producer and screenwriter . He graduated from Danish National School of Theatre in Copenhagen in 1993 . Coster-Waldau 's breakthrough performance in Denmark was his role in the film Nightwatch -LRB- 1994 -RRB- . Since then he has appeared in numerous films in his native Scandinavia and Europe in general , including Headhunters -LRB- 2011 -RRB- and A Thousand Times Good Night -LRB- 2013 -RRB- .   In the United States , his debut film role was in the war film Black Hawk Down -LRB- 2001 -RRB- , playing Medal of Honor recipient Gary Gordon . He then played Detective John Amsterdam in the short-lived Fox television series New Amsterdam -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , as well as appearing as Frank Pike in the 2009 Fox television film Virtuality , originally intended as a pilot . He became widely known to a broad audience for his current role as Ser Jaime Lannister , in the HBO series Game of Thrones . In 2017 , he became one of the highest paid actors on television and earned # 2 million per episode of Game of Thrones .

evidence_da: Fox Broadcasting Company-LRB- ofte forkortet til Fox og stiliseret som FOX-RRB-er en amerikansk engelsksprogede kommercielle broadcast tv-net, der ejes af Fox Entertainment Group datterselskab af 21st Century Fox . Århundrede Fox studio parti på Pico Boulevard i Century City del af Los Angeles , med yderligere store kontorer og produktionsfaciliteter på Fox Television Center i nærliggende West Los Angeles og Fox Broadcasting Center i Yorkville-kvarteret på Manhattan, New York City. Det er det tredjestørste store tv-net i verden baseret på samlede indtægter , aktiver og international dækning .   Lanceret i oktober 9 , 1986 som en konkurrent til Big Three tv-net -LRB- ABC , NBC og CBS-RRB-, Fox fortsatte med at blive den mest succesfulde forsøg på et fjerde tv-net . Det var den højest ratede broadcast-netværk i 18 - 49 demografiske fra 2004 til 2012 , og tjente den position, som den mest sete amerikanske tv-net i alt seertallet i løbet af 2007 - 08 sæsonen .   Fox og dets tilknyttede virksomheder opererer mange underholdningskanaler på de internationale markeder , selv om disse ikke nødvendigvis luft den samme programmering som det amerikanske netværk . De fleste seere i Canada har adgang til mindst én amerikansk-baserede Fox affiliate , enten over-the-air eller gennem en betalings-tv-udbyder , selv om Fox 's National Football League telecasts og det meste af sin prime time programmering er underlagt samtidig substitutionsregler for kabel- og satellitudbydere , der er indført af den canadiske radio-tv - og telekommunikationskommission -LRB- CRTC -RRB - for at beskytte rettigheder , der indehaves af nationalt baserede net .   Netværket er opkaldt efter søsterselskab 20th Century Fox , og indirekte for producenten William Fox , der grundlagde en af filmstudiets forgængere , Fox Film . Fox er medlem af North American Broadcasters Association og National Association of Broadcasters .
evidence_en: The Fox Broadcasting Company -LRB- often shortened to Fox and stylized as FOX -RRB- is an American English language commercial broadcast television network that is owned by the Fox Entertainment Group subsidiary of 21st Century Fox . The network is headquartered at the 20th Century Fox studio lot on Pico Boulevard in the Century City section of Los Angeles , with additional major offices and production facilities at the Fox Television Center in nearby West Los Angeles and the Fox Broadcasting Center in the Yorkville neighborhood of Manhattan , New York City . It is the third largest major television network in the world based on total revenues , assets , and international coverage .   Launched on October 9 , 1986 as a competitor to the Big Three television networks -LRB- ABC , NBC and CBS -RRB- , Fox went on to become the most successful attempt at a fourth television network . It was the highest-rated broadcast network in the 18 -- 49 demographic from 2004 to 2012 , and earned the position as the most-watched American television network in total viewership during the 2007 -- 08 season .   Fox and its affiliated companies operate many entertainment channels in international markets , although these do not necessarily air the same programming as the U.S. network . Most viewers in Canada have access to at least one U.S.-based Fox affiliate , either over-the-air or through a pay television provider , although Fox 's National Football League telecasts and most of its prime time programming are subject to simultaneous substitution regulations for cable and satellite providers imposed by the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission -LRB- CRTC -RRB- to protect rights held by domestically based networks .   The network is named after sister company 20th Century Fox , and indirectly for producer William Fox , who founded one of the movie studio 's predecessors , Fox Film . Fox is a member of the North American Broadcasters Association and the National Association of Broadcasters .

Adrienne Bailon først blev offentligt kendt, da hun steg til berømmelse som en af de stiftende medlemmer og sanger i både 3LW -LRB- 1999 - 2007 -RRB- og Disney 's The Cheetah Girls -LRB- 2003 - 2008 -RRB- .   Bailon indspillede en debut solo album, som senere blev lagt på hylden . Siden da har Bailon udtalt , at hun har planer om at optage et spansksproget soloalbum .   Bortset fra hendes arbejde i 3LW og The Cheetah Girls , Bailon gik på at udvikle sin egen skuespillerkarriere med roller i The Cheetah Girls film , Coach Carter og MTV filmen All You 've Got . Bortset fra hendes arbejde i film , har hun også gæst medvirkede i en lang række tv-serier, herunder Disney Channel-serien That 's So Raven og The Suite Life of Zack & Cody . Bailon har etableret en solo musikkarriere , der bidrager med to solonumre , herunder '' Hvad hvis '', til The Cheetah Girls : One World soundtrack samt Confessions of a Shopaholic soundtrack , og mange andre gæst musikalske ventures .   Bailon co-stjerner sammen med tv-personlighed, model og skuespiller Julissa Bermudez i deres egen reality-serie , Empire Girls : Julissa og Adrienne som airs på Style Network . Adrienne mødte Julissa på settet af filmen All You 've Got fra 2006 .   I øjeblikket , Bailon er en af værterne for syndikerede talkshow The Real sammen med tidligere kolleger Disney Channel stjerne Tamera Mowry , Jeannie Mai , og Loni Love , som havde premiere på juli 15 , 2013 .   Bailon 's karriere , der spænder over 16 år med både 3LW og The Cheetah Girls , har hjulpet hende sælge en kombineret 5,6 millioner indspilning albums på verdensplan .
evidence_en: Adrienne Eliza Houghton -LRB- née Bailon ; born October 24 , 1983 -RRB- is an American singer-songwriter , recording artist , actress , dancer and television personality . Adrienne Bailon first became publicly known when she rose to fame as one of the founding members and singer of both 3LW -LRB- 1999 -- 2007 -RRB- and Disney 's The Cheetah Girls -LRB- 2003 -- 2008 -RRB- .   Bailon recorded a debut solo album which was later shelved . Since then , Bailon has stated that she plans to record a Spanish-language solo album .   Aside from her work in 3LW and The Cheetah Girls , Bailon went on to develop her own acting career with roles in The Cheetah Girls films , Coach Carter and the MTV film All You 've Got . Aside from her work in film , she has also guest starred in numerous television series including the Disney Channel series That 's So Raven and The Suite Life of Zack & Cody . Bailon has established a solo music career , contributing two solo tracks , including `` What If '' , to The Cheetah Girls : One World soundtrack as well as the Confessions of a Shopaholic soundtrack , and numerous other guest musical ventures .   Bailon co-stars alongside television personality , model and actress Julissa Bermudez in their own reality series , Empire Girls : Julissa and Adrienne which airs on the Style Network . Adrienne met Julissa on the set of the 2006 film All You 've Got .   Currently , Bailon is one of the hosts of syndicated talk show The Real along with former fellow Disney Channel star Tamera Mowry , Jeannie Mai , and Loni Love , which premiered on July 15 , 2013 .   Bailon 's career , spanning over 16 years with both 3LW and The Cheetah Girls , has helped her sell a combined 5.6 million recording albums worldwide .

evidence_da: Homeland er en amerikansk spion thriller tv-serie udviklet af Howard Gordon og Alex Gansa baseret på den israelske serie Prisoners of War -LRB- Original titel יוווי Hatufim , bogstaveligt talt '' Bortførte '' -RRB-, som blev skabt af Gideon Raff .   Serien stjerner Claire danskere som Carrie Mathison , en Central Intelligence Agency officer med bipolar lidelse , og Damian Lewis som Nicholas Brody , en amerikansk Marine Corps Scout Sniper . Mathison var kommet til at tro, at Brody , der blev holdt fanget af al-Qaeda som krigsfange , blev "" vendt "" af fjenden og udgør en trussel mod USA .   Serien udsendes i USA på kabelkanalen Showtime , og er produceret af Fox 21 Television Studios-LRB- tidligere Fox 21 -RRB- . Oktober 2, 2011 . Den første episode blev gjort tilgængelig online , mere end to uger før tv-udsendelsen , med seerne nødt til at fuldføre spil opgaver for at få adgang . Oktober 22 , 2013 , Showtime fornyet Homeland for fjerde sæson , som havde premiere den 5 oktober 2014 . November 10 , 2014 , Showtime fornyet serien for en 12-episode femte sæson , der havde premiere den 4 oktober 2015 . december 2015 blev serien fornyet for sjette sæson . Den sjette sæson debuterede den 15. januar 2017 . Serien er også blevet fornyet for syvende og ottende sæson; den ottende er planlagt til at blive seriens sidste sæson af skaberne .   Serien har modtaget generelt positive anmeldelser , og har vundet flere priser , herunder 2012 Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Drama Series , og 2011 og 2012 Golden Globe Award for bedste tv-serie - Drama , samt Primetime Emmy Award for Fremragende hovedrolle i en dramaserie og hovedrolle i en dramaserie for Henholdsvis Damian Lewis og Claire Danes .
evidence_en: Homeland is an American spy thriller television series developed by Howard Gordon and Alex Gansa based on the Israeli series Prisoners of War -LRB- Original title חטופים Hatufim , literally `` Abductees '' -RRB- , which was created by Gideon Raff .   The series stars Claire Danes as Carrie Mathison , a Central Intelligence Agency officer with bipolar disorder , and Damian Lewis as Nicholas Brody , a U.S. Marine Corps Scout Sniper . Mathison had come to believe that Brody , who was held captive by al-Qaeda as a prisoner of war , was `` turned '' by the enemy and poses a threat to the United States .   The series is broadcast in the U.S. on the cable channel Showtime , and is produced by Fox 21 Television Studios -LRB- formerly Fox 21 -RRB- . It premiered on October 2 , 2011 . The first episode was made available online , more than two weeks before the television broadcast , with viewers having to complete game tasks to gain access . On October 22 , 2013 , Showtime renewed Homeland for a fourth season , which premiered on October 5 , 2014 . On November 10 , 2014 , Showtime renewed the series for a 12-episode fifth season that premiered on October 4 , 2015 . On December 9 , 2015 , the series was renewed for a sixth season . The sixth season debuted on January 15 , 2017 . The series has also been renewed for a seventh and eighth season ; the eighth is planned to be the series ' final season by the creators .   The series has received generally positive reviews , and has won several awards , including the 2012 Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Drama Series , and the 2011 and 2012 Golden Globe Award for Best Television Series -- Drama , as well as the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series and Lead Actress in a Drama Series for Damian Lewis and Claire Danes , respectively .

evidence_da: Krigsfanger -LRB- oprindelige titel i -RRB- er en israelsk tv-drama serie lavet af Keshet og oprindeligt luftet på Israels Channel 2 fra marts til maj 2010 . En anden sæson blev sendt i Israel fra oktober til december 2012 , og en tredje sæson er planlagt . Serien blev skabt af den israelske instruktør , manuskriptforfatter og producer Gideon Raff . I 2010 vandt den israelske Oscar for tv for bedste dramaserie .
