evidence_da: Tilbage til future part II er en amerikansk science-fiction eventyr komedie film instrueret af Robert Zemeckis og skrevet af Bob Gale . Det er efterfølgeren til 1985 filmen Tilbage til fremtiden og den anden rate i Back to the Future trilogien . Filmen stjerner Michael J. Fox , Christopher Lloyd , Thomas F. Wilson , og Lea Thompson og fortsætter umiddelbart efter den oprindelige film . Efter at have repareret de skader på historien, som hans tidligere tidrejser eventyr , Marty McFly -LRB- Fox -RRB- og hans ven Dr. Emmett '' Doc '' Brown -LRB- Lloyd-RRB- rejse til 2015 for at forhindre McFly 's fremtidige søn fra at ende fængslet . Men deres tilstedeværelse tillader Biff Tannen -LRB- Wilson -RRB - at stjæle Doc 's DeLorean tidsmaskine og rejse til 1955, hvor han ændrer historien ved at gøre sin yngre selvvelhavende .   Filmen blev produceret på en $ 40-millioner budget og blev filmet back-to-back med sin efterfølger , Del III . Optagelserne begyndte i februar 1989 efter to år blev brugt på at bygge sæt og skrive scripts . To skuespillere fra den første film , Crispin Glover og Claudia Wells , vendte ikke tilbage til de sidste to . Mens Elisabeth Shue blev omarbejdet i rollen som Wells ' karakter , Jennifer , Glover 's karakter , George McFly , var ikke kun minimeret i plottet, men også blev tilsløret og genskabt med en anden skuespiller . Glover med held sagsøgt både Zemeckis og Gale , ændre , hvordan producenterne kan håndtere afgang og udskiftning af aktører i en rolle . Tilbage til Future Part II var også et banebrydende projekt for effektstudiet Industrial Light & Magic -LRB- ILM -RRB- : Ud over digital komposition brugte ILM VistaGlide motion control camera system , som tillod en skuespiller at skildre flere figurer samtidig tast på skærmen uden at gå på kompromis med kameraets bevægelser .   Tilbage til future part II blev udgivet af Universal Pictures on November 22 , 1989 . Filmen modtog blandede anmeldelser fra kritikere og indtjente over 331 millioner dollars på verdensplan , hvilket gør det til den tredje-højest indtjenende film i 1989 .
evidence_en: Back to the Future Part II is a 1989 American science-fiction adventure comedy film directed by Robert Zemeckis and written by Bob Gale . It is the sequel to the 1985 film Back to the Future and the second installment in the Back to the Future trilogy . The film stars Michael J. Fox , Christopher Lloyd , Thomas F. Wilson , and Lea Thompson and continues immediately following the original film . After repairing the damage to history done by his previous time travel adventures , Marty McFly -LRB- Fox -RRB- and his friend Dr. Emmett `` Doc '' Brown -LRB- Lloyd -RRB- travel to 2015 to prevent McFly 's future son from ending up imprisoned . However , their presence allows Biff Tannen -LRB- Wilson -RRB- to steal Doc 's DeLorean time machine and travel to 1955 , where he alters history by making his younger self wealthy .   The film was produced on a $ 40-million budget and was filmed back-to-back with its sequel , Part III . Filming began in February 1989 after two years were spent building the sets and writing the scripts . Two actors from the first film , Crispin Glover and Claudia Wells , did not return for the final two . While Elisabeth Shue was recast in the role of Wells ' character , Jennifer , Glover 's character , George McFly , was not only minimized in the plot , but also was obscured and recreated with another actor . Glover successfully sued both Zemeckis and Gale , changing how producers can deal with the departure and replacement of actors in a role . Back to the Future Part II was also a ground-breaking project for effects studio Industrial Light & Magic -LRB- ILM -RRB- : In addition to digital compositing , ILM used the VistaGlide motion control camera system , which allowed an actor to portray multiple characters simultaneously on-screen without sacrificing camera movement .   Back to the Future Part II was released by Universal Pictures on November 22 , 1989 . The film received mixed reviews from critics and grossed over $ 331 million worldwide , making it the third-highest-grossing film of 1989 .

evidence_da: Victor Marie Hugo -LRB- -LSB- viktķķ maķi yיo -RSB- ; 26 Februar 1802 - 22 Maj 1885 -RRB - var en fransk digter , forfatter , og dramatiker af den romantiske bevægelse . Han betragtes som en af de største og mest kendte franske forfattere . Uden for Frankrig er hans mest kendte værker romanerne Les Misérables , 1862 , og The Hunchback of Notre-Dame -LRB- Notre-Dame de Paris -RRB- , 1831 . I Frankrig er Hugo primært kendt for sine digtsamlinger , såsom Les Contemplations -LRB- The Contemplations -RRB- og La Légende des siècles -LRB- The Legend of the Ages -RRB- . Han producerede mere end 4.000 tegninger og kæmpede også for sociale årsager såsom afskaffelse af dødsstraf .   Selv om en engageret royalist, da han var ung , Hugo 's synspunkter ændret som årtierne gik, og han blev en lidenskabelig tilhænger af republikanisme ; hans arbejde berører de fleste af de politiske og sociale spørgsmål og de kunstneriske tendenser i sin tid . Han er begravet i Panthéon i Paris. Hans arv er blevet hædret på mange måder , herunder hans portræt bliver placeret på fransk valuta .
evidence_en: Victor Marie Hugo -LRB- -LSB- viktɔʁ maʁi yɡo -RSB- ; 26 February 1802 -- 22 May 1885 -RRB- was a French poet , novelist , and dramatist of the Romantic movement . He is considered one of the greatest and best-known French writers . Outside France , his best-known works are the novels Les Misérables , 1862 , and The Hunchback of Notre-Dame -LRB- Notre-Dame de Paris -RRB- , 1831 . In France , Hugo is known primarily for his poetry collections , such as Les Contemplations -LRB- The Contemplations -RRB- and La Légende des siècles -LRB- The Legend of the Ages -RRB- . He produced more than 4,000 drawings and also campaigned for social causes such as the abolition of capital punishment .   Though a committed royalist when he was young , Hugo 's views changed as the decades passed , and he became a passionate supporter of republicanism ; his work touches upon most of the political and social issues and the artistic trends of his time . He is buried in the Panthéon in Paris . His legacy has been honoured in many ways , including his portrait being placed on French currency .

evidence_da: Moana -LRB- -LSB- moķייnə -RSB- -RRB- er en amerikansk computer-animeret musikalsk fantasy-eventyrfilm fra 2016 produceret af Walt Disney Animation Studios og udgivet af Walt Disney Pictures . Disney animerede spillefilm . Instrueret af Ron Clements og John Musker , co-instrueret af Don Hall og Chris Williams , filmen introducerer Auli'i Cravalho som Moana og funktioner stemmer Dwayne Johnson , Rachel House , Temuera Morrison , Jemaine Clement , Nicole Scherzinger , og Alan Tudyk . Filmen indeholder musik skrevet af Lin-Manuel Miranda , Opetaia Foa'i , og Mark Mancina .   Filmen fortæller historien om Moana , den viljestærke datter af chefen for en polynesisk stamme , der er valgt af havet selv at genforene en mystisk levn med en gudinde . Når en blight rammer hendes ø, Moana sætter sejl på jagt efter Maui , en legendarisk halvgud , i håb om at redde sit folk .   Moana blev udgivet teatralsk i USA november 23 , 2016 til kritikerros , med kritikere især rose filmen for sin animation , musik og stemme stemmer . Filmen gik på brutto over 642 millioner dollars på verdensplan . Sammen med Zootopia , det markerede første gang siden 2002, at Walt Disney Animation Studios udgivet to spillefilm i samme år . Det modtog to Academy Award nomineringer på 89:e Academy Awards : en for bedste animerede funktion og en anden for bedste originale sang -LRB- '' Hvor langt jeg 'll Go '' -RRB-.
evidence_en: Moana -LRB- -LSB- moʊˈɑːnə -RSB- -RRB- is a 2016 American computer-animated musical fantasy-adventure film produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures . It is the 56th Disney animated feature film . Directed by Ron Clements and John Musker , co-directed by Don Hall and Chris Williams , the film introduces Auli'i Cravalho as Moana and features the voices of Dwayne Johnson , Rachel House , Temuera Morrison , Jemaine Clement , Nicole Scherzinger , and Alan Tudyk . The film features music written by Lin-Manuel Miranda , Opetaia Foa'i , and Mark Mancina .   The film tells the story of Moana , the strong-willed daughter of the chief of a Polynesian tribe , who is chosen by the ocean itself to reunite a mystical relic with a goddess . When a blight strikes her island , Moana sets sail in search of Maui , a legendary demigod , in the hope of saving her people .   Moana was released theatrically in the United States on November 23 , 2016 to critical acclaim , with critics particularly praising the film for its animation , music , and voice cast . The film went on to gross over $ 642 million worldwide . Along with Zootopia , it marked the first time since 2002 that Walt Disney Animation Studios released two feature films in the same year . It received two Academy Award nominations at the 89th Academy Awards : one for Best Animated Feature and another for Best Original Song -LRB- `` How Far I 'll Go '' -RRB- .

evidence_da: Hvor Wild Things Are er en 2009 fantasy drama film instrueret af Spike Jonze . Skrevet af Jonze og Dave Eggers , er det tilpasset fra Maurice Sendak 's 1963 børns bog af samme navn . Det kombinerer live-action, kunstnere i kostumer , animatronics, og computer-genereret billedsprog -LRB- CGI -RRB- . Filmen stjerner Max Records og funktioner stemmer James Gandolfini , Paul Dano , Lauren Ambrose , Forest Whitaker , Catherine O'Hara , og Chris Cooper . Filmen er centreret om en ensom otte-årig dreng ved navn Max, der sejler væk til en ø beboet af væsner kendt som '' Wild Things , '', der erklærer Max deres konge .   I begyndelsen af 1980'erne overvejede Disney at tilpasse filmen som en blanding af traditionelt animerede figurer og computergenererede miljøer , men udviklingen gik ikke forbi en testfilm for at se, hvordan animationen hybridisering ville resultere . I 2001 erhvervede Universal Studios rettigheder til bogens tilpasning og forsøgte i første omgang at udvikle en computeranimeret tilpasning med Disney-animatoren Eric Goldberg , men CGI-konceptet blev erstattet med en live-action i 2003 , og Goldberg blev droppet for Spike Jonze . Filmen blev co-produceret af skuespilleren Tom Hanks gennem hans produktionsselskab Playtone og lavet på et anslået budget på $ 100 millioner . Hvor Wild Things Are var en fælles produktion mellem Australien , Tyskland og USA , og blev filmet primært i Melbourne .   Filmen blev udgivet den 16 oktober , 2009 , i USA , december 3 i Australien , og december 17 i Tyskland . Filmen blev mødt med for det meste positive anmeldelser og dukkede op på mange årets udgang top ti lister. Filmen blev udgivet på DVD og Blu-ray marts 2 , 2010 .
evidence_en: Where the Wild Things Are is a 2009 fantasy drama film directed by Spike Jonze . Written by Jonze and Dave Eggers , it is adapted from Maurice Sendak 's 1963 children 's book of the same name . It combines live-action , performers in costumes , animatronics , and computer-generated imagery -LRB- CGI -RRB- . The film stars Max Records and features the voices of James Gandolfini , Paul Dano , Lauren Ambrose , Forest Whitaker , Catherine O'Hara , and Chris Cooper . The film centers on a lonely eight-year-old boy named Max who sails away to an island inhabited by creatures known as the `` Wild Things , '' who declare Max their king .   In the early 1980s , Disney considered adapting the film as a blend of traditionally animated characters and computer-generated environments , but development did not go past a test film to see how the animation hybridizing would result . In 2001 , Universal Studios acquired rights to the book 's adaptation and initially attempted to develop a computer-animated adaptation with Disney animator Eric Goldberg , but the CGI concept was replaced with a live-action one in 2003 , and Goldberg was dropped for Spike Jonze . The film was co-produced by actor Tom Hanks through his production company Playtone and made on an estimated budget of $ 100 million . Where the Wild Things Are was a joint production between Australia , Germany , and the United States , and was filmed principally in Melbourne .   The film was released on October 16 , 2009 , in the United States , on December 3 in Australia , and on December 17 in Germany . The film was met with mostly positive reviews and appeared on many year-end top ten lists . The film was released on DVD and Blu-ray on March 2 , 2010 .

evidence_da: Apple Inc. er en amerikansk multinational teknologi virksomhed med hovedsæde i Cupertino , Californien , der designer , udvikler og sælger forbrugerelektronik , computersoftware, og online-tjenester . Selskabets hardware produkter omfatter iPhone smartphone, iPad tablet computer, Mac personlige computer, iPod bærbare medier afspiller , Apple Watch smartwatch , og Apple TV digitale medieafspiller . Apples forbrugersoftware omfatter macOS- og iOS-operativsystemerne , iTunes-medieafspilleren , Safari-webbrowseren og iLife- og iWork-kreativitets- og produktivitetspakkerne . Dens online-tjenester omfatter iTunes Store , iOS App Store og Mac App Store , Apple Music , og iCloud .   Apple blev grundlagt af Steve Jobs , Steve Wozniak , og Ronald Wayne i april 1976 at udvikle og sælge personlige computere . Det blev indarbejdet som Apple Computer , Inc . Inden for et par år havde de ansat en stab af computerdesignere og havde en produktionslinje . Apple blev offentliggjort i 1980 for øjeblikkelig økonomisk succes . I løbet af de næste par år har Apple afsendt nye computere med innovative grafiske brugergrænseflader , og Apples marketingreklamer for sine produkter fik udbredt kritikerros . Den høje pris for sine produkter og begrænsede softwaretitler skabte dog problemer , og det samme gjorde magtkampe mellem virksomhedsledere i virksomheden . Jobs fratrådte Apple og skabte sin egen virksomhed . Efterhånden som markedet for personlige computere steg , oplevede Apples computere faldende salg på grund af produkter til lavere priser fra konkurrenter , især dem , der tilbydes med Microsoft Windows-operativsystemet . Flere executive job blander skete på Apple indtil daværende administrerende direktør Gil Amelio i 1997 besluttet at købe Jobs 'selskab til at bringe ham tilbage . Jobs genvandt stillingen som ceo , og begyndte en proces for at genopbygge Apples status , som omfattede åbning Af Apples egne butikker i 2001, hvilket gør talrige opkøb af software-virksomheder til at skabe en portefølje af software titler , og ændrede nogle af hardware teknologi, der anvendes i sine computere . Det igen oplevede succes og vendte tilbage til rentabilitet . I januar 2007 , Jobs meddelte, at Apple Computer , Inc . I august 2011 , Jobs fratrådte som administrerende direktør på grund af sundhedsmæssige komplikationer , og Tim Cook blev den nye administrerende direktør . To måneder senere døde Jobs , hvilket markerer afslutningen på en æra for virksomheden .   Apple er verdens største it-virksomhed efter omsætning , og verdens næststørste mobiltelefon producent efter Samsung . I februar 2015 blev Apple det første amerikanske selskab , der blev vurderet til over 700 milliarder dollar . Virksomheden beskæftiger 116.000 fuldtidsansatte og vedligeholder 496 detailbutikker i 21 lande . Det driver iTunes Store , som er verdens største musik forhandler . , mere end en milliard Apple-produkter er aktivt i brug på verdensplan .   Apples globale årlige omsætning udgjorde $215milliarder for regnskabsåret 2016 . Virksomheden har et højt niveau af brand loyalitet og er gentagne gange blevet rangeret som verdens mest værdifulde mærke . Den modtager imidlertid betydelig kritik af kontrahenternes arbejdspraksis og sine miljø - og forretningsmetoder , herunder oprindelsen af kildematerialer .
evidence_en: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino , California that designs , develops , and sells consumer electronics , computer software , and online services . The company 's hardware products include the iPhone smartphone , the iPad tablet computer , the Mac personal computer , the iPod portable media player , the Apple Watch smartwatch , and the Apple TV digital media player . Apple 's consumer software includes the macOS and iOS operating systems , the iTunes media player , the Safari web browser , and the iLife and iWork creativity and productivity suites . Its online services include the iTunes Store , the iOS App Store and Mac App Store , Apple Music , and iCloud .   Apple was founded by Steve Jobs , Steve Wozniak , and Ronald Wayne in April 1976 to develop and sell personal computers . It was incorporated as Apple Computer , Inc. in January 1977 , and sales of its computers saw significant momentum and revenue growth for the company . Within a few years , they had hired a staff of computer designers and had a production line . Apple went public in 1980 to instant financial success . Over the next few years , Apple shipped new computers featuring innovative graphical user interfaces , and Apple 's marketing commercials for its products received widespread critical acclaim . However , the high price tag of its products and limited software titles caused problems , as did power struggles between executives at the company . Jobs resigned from Apple and created his own company . As the market for personal computers increased , Apple 's computers saw diminishing sales due to lower-priced products from competitors , in particular those offered with the Microsoft Windows operating system . More executive job shuffles happened at Apple until then-CEO Gil Amelio in 1997 decided to buy Jobs ' company to bring him back . Jobs regained position as CEO , and began a process to rebuild Apple 's status , which included opening Apple 's own retail stores in 2001 , making numerous acquisitions of software companies to create a portfolio of software titles , and changed some of the hardware technology used in its computers . It again saw success and returned to profitability . In January 2007 , Jobs announced that Apple Computer , Inc. would be renamed Apple Inc. to reflect its shifted focus toward consumer electronics , and announced the iPhone , which saw critical acclaim and significant financial success . In August 2011 , Jobs resigned as CEO due to health complications , and Tim Cook became the new CEO . Two months later , Jobs died , marking the end of an era for the company .   Apple is the world 's largest information technology company by revenue , and the world 's second-largest mobile phone manufacturer after Samsung . In February 2015 , Apple became the first U.S. company to be valued at over US$ 700billion . The company employs 116,000 full-time employees and maintains 496 retail stores in 21 countries . It operates the iTunes Store , which is the world 's largest music retailer . , more than one billion Apple products are actively in use worldwide .   Apple 's worldwide annual revenue totaled $ 215billion for the 2016 fiscal year . The company enjoys a high level of brand loyalty and has been repeatedly ranked as the world 's most valuable brand . However , it receives significant criticism regarding the labor practices of its contractors and its environmental and business practices , including the origins of source materials .

evidence_da: Eurojust -LRB- også stavet kapitaliseret som EUROJUST -RRB- er et agentur for Den Europæiske Union -LRB- EU -RRB- beskæftiger sig med retligt samarbejde i straffesager . Eurojusts hjemsted ligger i Haag.   Det blev oprettet i 2002 for at forbedre håndteringen af grov grænseoverskridende og organiseret kriminalitet ved at stimulere efterforsknings - og anklagemyndighedens koordinering mellem EU-medlemsstaternes agenturer . Eurojust består af et kollegium bestående af 28 nationale medlemmer - erfarne dommere , anklagere eller politifolk med tilsvarende kompetence fra hver EU-medlemsstat . Medlemmernes vilkår og pligter defineres af den stat , der udpeger dem . Eurojust samarbejder også med tredjelande og andre EU-organer såsom Det Europæiske Retlige Netværk , Europol og OLAF .
evidence_en: Eurojust -LRB- also spelled capitalised as EUROJUST -RRB- is an agency of the European Union -LRB- EU -RRB- dealing with judicial co-operation in criminal matters . The seat of Eurojust is in The Hague .   Established in 2002 , it was created to improve handling of serious cross-border and organized crime by stimulating investigative and prosecutorial co-ordination among agencies of the EU Member States . Eurojust is composed of a College formed of 28 National Members -- experienced judges , prosecutors , or police officers of equivalent competence from each EU Member State . The terms and duties of the members are defined by the state that appoints them . Eurojust also co-operates with third states and other EU bodies such as the European Judicial Network , Europol , and OLAF .

Majors er bedst kendt for at portrættere roller Heath Barkley i den amerikanske tv-vestlige serie The Big Valley -LRB- 1965 - 1969 -RRB- , Oberst Steve Austin i den amerikanske tv-science fiction actionserie The Six Million Dollar Man -LRB- 1973 -- 1978 -RRB- , og Colt Seavers i amerikansk tv-actionserie The Fall Guy -LRB- 1981 -- 1986 -RRB- .   I tv-serien The Six Million Dollar Man , Steve Austin tager på særlige høj-risiko offentlige missioner ved hjælp af hans overmenneskelige bionic beføjelser . Tv-figuren Steve Austin blev et popkulturikon i 1970'erne .   Majors reprised rollen som oberst Steve Austin i flere bionic reunion tv-film i slutningen af 1980'erne og 1990'erne . Han optrådte i en række støtte, tilbagevendende og cameo roller i spillefilm og tv-serier , og lånte sin stemme til en række animerede tv-serier og videospil .
evidence_en: Lee Majors -LRB- born Harvey Lee Yeary ; April 23 , 1939 -RRB- is an American film , television and voice actor . Majors is best known for portraying the roles of Heath Barkley in the American television Western series The Big Valley -LRB- 1965 -- 1969 -RRB- , Colonel Steve Austin in the American television science fiction action series The Six Million Dollar Man -LRB- 1973 -- 1978 -RRB- , and Colt Seavers in American television action series The Fall Guy -LRB- 1981 -- 1986 -RRB- .   In the television series The Six Million Dollar Man , Steve Austin takes on special high-risk government missions using his superhuman bionic powers . The television character Steve Austin became a pop culture icon of the 1970s .   Majors reprised the role of Colonel Steve Austin in several bionic reunion television movies in the late 1980s and 1990s . He appeared in a number of supporting , recurring and cameo roles in feature films and television series , and lent his voice to a number of animated TV series and video games .

evidence_da: Marlon Brando , Jr. -LRB- April 3 , 1924 - 1 juli 2004 -RRB- var en amerikansk skuespiller, filminstruktør og politisk aktivist . Han er krediteret med at bringe realisme til film handler . Han hjalp med at popularisere Stanislavski system handler , studere med Stella Adler i 1940'erne . Brando er kendt for sine Oscar-vindende forestillinger som Terry Malloy i On the Waterfront -LRB- 1954 -RRB- og Vito Corleone i The Godfather -LRB- 1972 -RRB-, samt hans præstationer i A Streetcar Named Desire -LRB- 1951 -RRB- , Viva Zapata ! -LRB- 1952 -RRB- , Julius Cæsar -LRB- 1953 -RRB- , The Wild One -LRB- 1953 -RRB- , Guys and Dolls -LRB- 1955 -RRB- , Sayonara -LRB- 1957 -RRB- , Refleksioner i et gyldent øje -LRB- 1967 -RRB- , Sidste Tango i Paris -LRB- 1972 -RRB- , og Apocalypse Now -LRB- 1979 -RRB- . Brando var også aktivist for mange årsager , især Borgerrettighedsbevægelsen og forskellige indianske bevægelser .   Han fik oprindeligt anerkendelse og en Oscar nominering for reprising rolle Stanley Kowalski i 1951 filmatisering af Tennessee Williams ' spille A Streetcar Named Desire , en rolle, som han havde oprindelse med succes på Broadway . Han fik yderligere ros for sin præstation som Terry Malloy i On the Waterfront , og hans skildring af rebel motorcykel bandeleder Johnny Strabler i The Wild One viste sig at være et varigt billede i populærkulturen . Brando modtog Oscar-nomineringer for at spille Emiliano Zapata i Viva Zapata ! . Mark Antony i Joseph L. Mankiewicz 's 1953 filmatisering af Shakespeares Julius Cæsar ; og Air Force Major Lloyd Gruver i Sayonara -LRB- 1957 -RRB- , en tilpasning af James Michener 's 1954 roman . Brando blev optaget på en liste over Top Ti Money Making Stars tre gange i 1950'erne , kommer ind som nummer 10 i 1954 , nummer 6 i 1955 , og nummer 4 i 1958 .   1960'erne viste sig at være et brakårti for Brando . Han instruerede og medvirkede i kult vestlige film One-Eyed Jacks , en kritisk og kommerciel flop , hvorefter han leverede en række box-office fiaskoer , begyndende med 1962 filmatisering af romanen Mytteri på Bounty . Efter 10 år , hvor han ikke optrådte i en vellykket film , vandt han sin anden Oscar for at spille Vito Corleone i Francis Ford Coppola 's The Godfather , en rolle kritikere overveje blandt hans største . The Godfather var dengang en af de mest kommercielt succesfulde film gennem tiderne . Med det og hans Oscar-nominerede præstation i Last Tango i Paris , Brando genetableret sig i rækken af top box-office stjerner , placere sjette og tiende i Money Making Stars meningsmåling i 1972 og 1973 , henholdsvis . Brando tog en fire-årig pause, før de optræder i The Missouri Breaks -LRB- 1976 -RRB- . Efter dette , han var tilfreds med at være en højt betalt karakter skuespiller i cameo roller , såsom i Superman-LRB- 1978 -RRB- og The Formula-LRB- 1980 -RRB-, før du tager en ni-årig pause fra film . Ifølge Guinness Book of World Records , Brando blev betalt en rekord $ 3,7 millioner -LRB- $ millioner i inflation-justeret dollars -RRB- og 11,75 % af bruttofortjenesten i 13 dage 'arbejde på Superman . Han sluttede ud i 1970'erne med sin kontroversielle præstation som oberst Kurtz i en anden Coppola film , Apocalypse Now , en box-office hit, som han var højt betalt, og som hjalp finansiere sin karriere fyring i løbet af 1980'erne .   Brando blev rangeret af American Film Institute som den fjerdestørste filmstjerne blandt mandlige filmstjerner, hvis skærm debuterer fandt sted i eller før 1950 . Han var en af kun tre professionelle skuespillere , sammen med Charlie Chaplin og Marilyn Monroe , navngivet i 1999 af Time Magazine som en af sine 100 vigtigste mennesker i century . Han døde af respirationssvigt den 1.
evidence_en: Marlon Brando , Jr. -LRB- April 3 , 1924 -- July 1 , 2004 -RRB- was an American actor , film director and political activist . He is credited with bringing realism to film acting . He helped to popularize the Stanislavski system of acting , studying with Stella Adler in the 1940s . Brando is widely known for his Academy Award-winning performances as Terry Malloy in On the Waterfront -LRB- 1954 -RRB- and Vito Corleone in The Godfather -LRB- 1972 -RRB- , as well as his performances in A Streetcar Named Desire -LRB- 1951 -RRB- , Viva Zapata ! -LRB- 1952 -RRB- , Julius Caesar -LRB- 1953 -RRB- , The Wild One -LRB- 1953 -RRB- , Guys and Dolls -LRB- 1955 -RRB- , Sayonara -LRB- 1957 -RRB- , Reflections in a Golden Eye -LRB- 1967 -RRB- , Last Tango in Paris -LRB- 1972 -RRB- , and Apocalypse Now -LRB- 1979 -RRB- . Brando was also an activist for many causes , notably the Civil Rights Movement and various Native American movements .   He initially gained acclaim and an Academy Award nomination for reprising the role of Stanley Kowalski in the 1951 film adaptation of Tennessee Williams ' play A Streetcar Named Desire , a role that he had originated successfully on Broadway . He received further praise for his performance as Terry Malloy in On the Waterfront , and his portrayal of the rebel motorcycle gang leader Johnny Strabler in The Wild One proved to be a lasting image in popular culture . Brando received Academy Award nominations for playing Emiliano Zapata in Viva Zapata ! ; Mark Antony in Joseph L. Mankiewicz 's 1953 film adaptation of Shakespeare 's Julius Caesar ; and Air Force Major Lloyd Gruver in Sayonara -LRB- 1957 -RRB- , an adaption of James Michener 's 1954 novel . Brando was included in a list of Top Ten Money Making Stars three times in the 1950s , coming in at number 10 in 1954 , number 6 in 1955 , and number 4 in 1958 .   The 1960s proved to be a fallow decade for Brando . He directed and starred in the cult western film One-Eyed Jacks , a critical and commercial flop , after which he delivered a series of box-office failures , beginning with the 1962 film adaptation of the novel Mutiny on the Bounty . After 10 years , during which he did not appear in a successful film , he won his second Academy Award for playing Vito Corleone in Francis Ford Coppola 's The Godfather , a role critics consider among his greatest . The Godfather was then one of the most commercially successful films of all time . With that and his Oscar-nominated performance in Last Tango in Paris , Brando re-established himself in the ranks of top box-office stars , placing sixth and tenth in the Money Making Stars poll in 1972 and 1973 , respectively . Brando took a four-year hiatus before appearing in The Missouri Breaks -LRB- 1976 -RRB- . After this , he was content with being a highly paid character actor in cameo roles , such as in Superman -LRB- 1978 -RRB- and The Formula -LRB- 1980 -RRB- , before taking a nine-year break from motion pictures . According to the Guinness Book of World Records , Brando was paid a record $ 3.7 million -LRB- $ million in inflation-adjusted dollars -RRB- and 11.75 % of the gross profits for 13 days ' work on Superman . He finished out the 1970s with his controversial performance as Colonel Kurtz in another Coppola film , Apocalypse Now , a box-office hit for which he was highly paid and which helped finance his career layoff during the 1980s .   Brando was ranked by the American Film Institute as the fourth-greatest movie star among male movie stars whose screen debuts occurred in or before 1950 . He was one of only three professional actors , along with Charlie Chaplin and Marilyn Monroe , named in 1999 by Time magazine as one of its 100 Most Important People of the Century . He died of respiratory failure on July 1 , 2004 , at age 80 .

evidence_da: Julius Cæsar er en 1953 episke Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer filmatisering af stykket af Shakespeare , instrueret af Joseph L. Mankiewicz , der også skrev ukrediteret manuskript , og produceret af John Houseman . Den oprindelige musik score er af Miklós Rózsa . Filmen stjerner Marlon Brando som Mark Antony , James Mason som Brutus , John Gielgud som Cassius , Louis Calhern som Julius Cæsar , Edmond O'Brien som Casca , Greer Garson som Calpurnia , og Deborah Kerr som Portia .
evidence_en: Julius Caesar is a 1953 epic Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer film adaptation of the play by Shakespeare , directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz , who also wrote the uncredited screenplay , and produced by John Houseman . The original music score is by Miklós Rózsa . The film stars Marlon Brando as Mark Antony , James Mason as Brutus , John Gielgud as Cassius , Louis Calhern as Julius Caesar , Edmond O'Brien as Casca , Greer Garson as Calpurnia , and Deborah Kerr as Portia .

Martin , og dens tv-tilpasning Game of Thrones . Martin fortalte Rolling Stone i 2014, at Bran 's kapitel med Jaime og Cersei Lannister er, hvad '' hooked '' mange læsere tidligt i den første roman .   Indført i 1996 's A Game of Thrones , Bran er søn af Ned Stark , den ærede herre Winterfell , en gammel fæstning i den nordlige del af den fiktive kongerige Westeros . Han optrådte efterfølgende i Martin 's A Clash of Kings-LRB- 1998 -RRB- og A Storm of Swords -LRB- 2000 -RRB- . evidence_en: Brandon Stark , typically called Bran , is a fictional character in the A Song of Ice and Fire series of fantasy novels by American author George R. R. Martin , and its television adaptation Game of Thrones . Martin told Rolling Stone in 2014 that Bran 's chapter with Jaime and Cersei Lannister is what `` hooked '' many readers early in the first novel .   Introduced in 1996 's A Game of Thrones , Bran is the son of Ned Stark , the honorable lord of Winterfell , an ancient fortress in the North of the fictional kingdom of Westeros . He subsequently appeared in Martin 's A Clash of Kings -LRB- 1998 -RRB- and A Storm of Swords -LRB- 2000 -RRB- . Bran was one of a few prominent characters that were not included in 2005 's A Feast for Crows , but returned in the next novel A Dance with Dragons -LRB- 2011 -RRB- .   Bran is portrayed by Isaac Hempstead Wright in the HBO television adaptation .

evidence_da: Romelu Menama Lukaku -LRB- født 13 Maj 1993 -RRB- er en belgisk professionel fodboldspiller, der spiller som angriber for Premier League-klubben Everton og det belgiske landshold . Han er en af kun fem spillere til at score 50 Premier League-mål før hans 23 års fødselsdag , og den første udenlandske spiller til at score 80 før hans 24 års fødselsdag .   Lukaku startede sin karriere med den lokale side Rupel Boom , før han kom til Lierse , hvor han fik et skifte til Anderlecht i den belgiske Pro League i 2006 . Lukaku fik sin professionelle debut, mens han stadig var i skole i en alder af 16 år , og blev 2009 - 10 topscorer i Belgien, da Anderlecht vandt det belgiske mesterskab . Han vandt også den belgiske Ebony Shoe i 2011 . I sommerens transfervindue i 2011 kom Lukaku til Premier League-klubben Chelsea . Han dukkede ikke op regelmæssigt i sin første sæson der , og tilbragte de følgende to sæsoner på lån på West Bromwich Albion og Everton henholdsvis , underskrive permanent for sidstnævnte for en klub rekord # 28 millioner i 2014 .   Lukaku fik sin senior internationale debut for Belgien i 2010 , og har siden tjent over 50 caps . Han har også repræsenteret landet ved FIFA World Cup 2014 og UEFA Euro 2016 .
evidence_en: Romelu Menama Lukaku -LRB- born 13 May 1993 -RRB- is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a striker for Premier League club Everton and the Belgium national team . He is one of only five players to score 50 Premier League goals before his 23rd birthday , and the first foreign player to score 80 before his 24th birthday .   Lukaku started his career with local side Rupel Boom , before joining Lierse , where he earned a move to Anderlecht of the Belgian Pro League in 2006 . Lukaku made his professional debut while still at school at the age of 16 , and became the 2009 -- 10 top scorer in Belgium as Anderlecht won the Belgian championship . He also won the Belgian Ebony Shoe in 2011 . In the 2011 summer transfer window , Lukaku joined Premier League club Chelsea . He did not appear regularly in his first season there , and spent the following two seasons on loan at West Bromwich Albion and Everton respectively , signing permanently for the latter for a club record # 28 million in 2014 .   Lukaku made his senior international debut for Belgium in 2010 , and has since earned over 50 caps . He has also represented the country at the 2014 FIFA World Cup and UEFA Euro 2016 .

evidence_da: Royal Sporting Club Anderlecht - normalt kendt som Anderlecht -LRB- -LSB- יndərיlķl-RSB- -LSB- -----------------eller R- SCA -LRB- -LSB- יrייייי -RSB- -LSB- יייs se-RSB- -LSB- יייייייייייי -RSB- -RRB- er belgier professionel fodboldklub baseret i Anderlecht , Bruxelles Capital-Region . Anderlecht spiller i den belgiske 1. division A og er det mest succesfulde belgiske fodboldhold i europæiske turneringer med fem trofæer samt i den belgiske hjemlige liga med 34 mesterskabssejre . De har også vundet ni belgiske Cups og holde rekorden for de fleste på hinanden følgende belgiske mesterskab titler , vinde fem mellem 1963 - 64 og 1967 - 68 sæsoner .   Klubben blev grundlagt i 1908 og nåede første gang det højeste niveau i belgisk fodbold i 1921 - 22 og har spillet i 1. division kontinuerligt siden 1935 - 36 . De vandt deres første store trofæ efter Anden Verdenskrig med et mesterskab sejr i 1946 - 47 . Siden da er de aldrig færdige uden for top seks i den belgiske 1. division . De er rangeret 12:e blandt all-time UEFA klub konkurrence vindere , tiende i IFFHS kontinentale klubber i det 20. I 1986 opnåede de deres bedste UEFA-placering med en fælles førsteplads med Juventus .   Anderlecht har spillet deres kampe i Astrid Park i kommunen Anderlecht siden 1917 . Deres nuværende stadion , Constant Vanden Stock Stadium , blev først åbnet i 1983 , og erstattet den tidligere Emile Versé Stadium . De spiller i lilla og hvide outfits . De har mangeårige rivalisering med Club Brugge og Standard Liège og tidligere med FC Bruxelles .
evidence_en: Royal Sporting Club Anderlecht , usually known as Anderlecht -LRB- -LSB- ˈɑndərˌlɛxt -RSB- , -LSB- ɑ̃dəʁlɛkt -RSB- , -LSB- ˈandɐˌlɛçt -RSB- -RRB- or RSCA -LRB- -LSB- ˌɛrɛseːˈjaː -RSB- , -LSB- ɛʁ ɛs se ɑ -RSB- , -LSB- ˌʔɛɐ̯ ʔɛs tseː ˈʔaː -RSB- -RRB- , is a Belgian professional football club based in Anderlecht , Brussels Capital-Region . Anderlecht plays in the Belgian First Division A and is the most successful Belgian football team in European competitions , with five trophies , as well as in the Belgian domestic league , with 34 championship wins . They have also won nine Belgian Cups and hold the record for most consecutive Belgian championship titles , winning five between the 1963 -- 64 and 1967 -- 68 seasons .   Founded in 1908 , the club first reached the highest level in Belgian football in 1921 -- 22 and have been playing in the first division continuously since 1935 -- 36 . They won their first major trophy after World War II with a championship win in 1946 -- 47 . Since then , they have never finished outside the top six of the Belgian first division . They are ranked 12th amongst all-time UEFA club competition winners , tenth in the IFFHS continental Clubs of the 20th Century European ranking and were 41st in the 2012 UEFA team rankings . In 1986 , they achieved their best UEFA ranking with a joint first place with Juventus .   Anderlecht have been playing their matches in the Astrid Park in the municipality of Anderlecht since 1917 . Their current stadium , Constant Vanden Stock Stadium , was first opened in 1983 , and replaced the former Emile Versé Stadium . They play in purple and white outfits . They have long-standing rivalries with Club Brugge and Standard Liège and previously with FC Brussels .

evidence_da: Transformers : The Last Knight er en kommende amerikansk science fiction actionfilm baseret på legetøjet linje af samme navn skabt af Hasbro . Det er den femte rate af live-action Transformers filmserie og en direkte efterfølger til 2014 's Transformers : Age of Extinction . Filmen blev instrueret af Michael Bay , med Mark Wahlberg og Stanley Tucci reprising deres roller fra Age of Extinction sammen med Josh Duhamel , Tyrese Gibson , og John Turturro fra de første tre film . Bay har udtalt denne film markerer hans endelige billede i franchisen . Filmen er indstillet til at blive frigivet juni 21 , 2017 af Paramount Pictures i 2D , 3D , og IMAX 3D .
evidence_en: Transformers : The Last Knight is an upcoming American science fiction action film based on the toy line of the same name created by Hasbro . It is the fifth installment of the live-action Transformers film series and a direct sequel to 2014 's Transformers : Age of Extinction . The film was directed by Michael Bay , with Mark Wahlberg and Stanley Tucci reprising their roles from Age of Extinction alongside Josh Duhamel , Tyrese Gibson , and John Turturro from the first three movies . Bay has stated this film marks his final picture in the franchise . The film is set to be released on June 21 , 2017 by Paramount Pictures in 2D , 3D , and IMAX 3D .

evidence_da: Saddam Hussein Abd al-Majid al-Tikriti -LRB- Arabisk : ددام مسين عبد المييد التريتي ; 28. april 1937 - 30 . december 2006 -RRB - var Iraks femte præsident , idet han tjente i denne egenskab fra den 16 . Et ledende medlem af det revolutionære arabiske socialistiske Ba'ath-parti , og senere , det Bagdad-baserede Ba'ath-parti og dets regionale organisation det irakiske Ba'ath-parti - som gik ind for Ba'athism , en blanding af arabisk nationalisme og socialisme - spillede Saddam en central rolle i 1968 kup -LRB- senere benævnt den 17 juli revolution-RRB- der bragte partiet til magten i Irak .   Som vicepræsident under den skrantende general Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr , og på et tidspunkt, hvor mange grupper blev anset for i stand til at vælte regeringen , skabte Saddam sikkerhedsstyrker, hvorigennem han stramt kontrollerede konflikten mellem regeringen og de væbnede Styrker. I begyndelsen af 1970'erne nationaliserede Saddam olie og andre industrier . De statsejede banker blev sat under hans kontrol , hvilket efterlod systemet til sidst insolvent mest på grund af Iran - Irak-krigen , Golfkrigen og FN's sanktioner . Gennem 1970'erne cementerede Saddam sin autoritet over regeringsapparatet , da oliepenge hjalp Iraks økonomi med at vokse i et hastigt tempo . Magtpositioner i landet var for det meste fyldt med sunniarabere , et mindretal , der kun udgjorde en femtedel af befolkningen .   Saddam kom formelt til magten i 1979 , selv om han de facto havde været irakchef i flere år før . Han undertrykte adskillige bevægelser , især shiamuslimske og kurdiske bevægelser , der forsøgte at vælte regeringen eller opnå uafhængighed og opretholdt magten under Iran - Irak-krigen og Golfkrigen . Mens nogle i den arabiske verden roste Saddam for hans modstand mod USA og for at angribe Israel - blev han bredt fordømt for brutaliteten af sit diktatur. Det samlede antal irakere, der blev dræbt af Saddams regerings sikkerhedstjenester i forskellige udrensninger og folkedrab, anslås konservativt til 250.000 .   I 2003 invaderede en koalition ledet af USA Irak for at afsætte Saddam , hvor USA's præsident George W. Bush og den britiske premierminister Tony Blair beskyldte ham for at være i besiddelse af masseødelæggelsesvåben og have forbindelser til al-Qaeda . Saddams Ba'ath-parti blev opløst, og der blev afholdt valg . December 2003 fandt retssagen mod Saddam sted under den irakiske overgangsregering . november 2006 blev Saddam dømt for anklager om forbrydelser mod menneskeheden i forbindelse med drabet på 148 irakiske shiitter i 1982 og blev dømt til døden ved hængning . Hans henrettelse blev udført den 30.
evidence_en: Saddam Hussein Abd al-Majid al-Tikriti -LRB- Arabic : صدام حسين عبد المجيد التكريتي ; 28 April 1937 -- 30 December 2006 -RRB- was the fifth President of Iraq , serving in this capacity from 16 July 1979 until 9 April 2003 . A leading member of the revolutionary Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party , and later , the Baghdad-based Ba'ath Party and its regional organization the Iraqi Ba'ath Party -- which espoused Ba'athism , a mix of Arab nationalism and socialism -- Saddam played a key role in the 1968 coup -LRB- later referred to as the 17 July Revolution -RRB- that brought the party to power in Iraq .   As vice president under the ailing General Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr , and at a time when many groups were considered capable of overthrowing the government , Saddam created security forces through which he tightly controlled conflict between the government and the armed forces . In the early 1970s , Saddam nationalized oil and other industries . The state-owned banks were put under his control , leaving the system eventually insolvent mostly due to the Iran -- Iraq War , the Gulf War , and UN sanctions . Through the 1970s , Saddam cemented his authority over the apparatuses of government as oil money helped Iraq 's economy to grow at a rapid pace . Positions of power in the country were mostly filled with Sunni Arabs , a minority that made up only a fifth of the population .   Saddam formally rose to power in 1979 , although he had been the de facto head of Iraq for several years prior . He suppressed several movements , particularly Shi'a and Kurdish movements , seeking to overthrow the government or gain independence , and maintained power during the Iran -- Iraq War and the Gulf War . Whereas some in the Arab world lauded Saddam for his opposition to the United States and for attacking Israel -- he was widely condemned for the brutality of his dictatorship . The total number of Iraqis killed by the security services of Saddam 's government in various purges and genocides is conservatively estimated at 250,000 .   In 2003 , a coalition led by the U.S. invaded Iraq to depose Saddam , in which U.S. President George W. Bush and British Prime Minister Tony Blair accused him of possessing weapons of mass destruction and having ties to al-Qaeda . Saddam 's Ba'ath party was disbanded and elections were held . Following his capture on 13 December 2003 , the trial of Saddam took place under the Iraqi Interim Government . On 5 November 2006 , Saddam was convicted of charges of crimes against humanity related to the 1982 killing of 148 Iraqi Shi'ites , and was sentenced to death by hanging . His execution was carried out on 30 December 2006 .

evidence_da: Seth Woodbury MacFarlane -LRB- -LSB-ri_m er en amerikansk skuespiller , filmskaber og sanger , der primært arbejder i animation og komedie , samt live-action og andre genrer . MacFarlane er skaberen af tv-serien Family Guy-LRB- 1999 - 2003 , 2005 - nuværende -RRB-, medskaber af tv-serien American Dad ! -LRB- 2005 - nuværende -RRB- og The Cleveland Show -LRB- 2009 -- 13 -RRB- . Han skrev også , instrueret , og medvirkede i filmene Ted -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , dens efterfølger Ted 2 -LRB- 2015 -RRB- og A Million Ways to Die in the West -LRB- 2014 -RRB- .   MacFarlane er uddannet i Rhode Island School of Design , hvor han studerede animation. Rekrutteret til Hollywood , han var en animator og forfatter til Hanna-Barbera for flere tv-serier , herunder Johnny Bravo , Ko og Kylling , Dexter 's Laboratory , I Am Weasel , og Larry & Steve . Som skuespiller har han optrådt på serier som Gilmore Girls , The War at Home og FlashForward . I 2008 skabte han sin egen YouTube-serie med titlen Seth MacFarlane 's Cavalcade of Cartoon Comedy . Han vandt flere priser for sit arbejde på Family Guy , herunder to Primetime Emmy Awards og en Annie Award . I 2009 vandt han Webby Prisen for Film & Video Person of the Year . Han lejlighedsvis taler på universiteter og gymnasier i hele USA, og han er en tilhænger af homoseksuelles rettigheder .   MacFarlane 's første feature-længde komedie film, Ted , funktioner hans stemme handler og performance-capture som licenshavende antropomorfe bamse og blev den højest indtjenende originale R-rated komedie . Som sanger MacFarlane har optrådt på flere spillesteder , herunder Carnegie Hall og Royal Albert Hall . MacFarlane har udgivet tre studiealbum , i samme retning som hans musikalske idol Frank Sinatra , begyndende med Music Is Better Than Words i 2011 . Han skrev teksterne til den Oscar-nominerede sang '' Everybody Needs a Best Friend '' for Ted .   MacFarlane fungerede som executive producer af Cosmos : A Spacetime Odyssey , en opdatering af 1980'erne Carl Sagan - vært Cosmos serien , hostet af Neil deGrasse Tyson . MacFarlane var medvirkende til at yde finansiering til serien, samt sikre studie støtte til det fra andre underholdning ledere .
evidence_en: Seth Woodbury MacFarlane -LRB- -LSB- ˈsɛθ_ˈwʊdbɛri_məkˈfɑrlɪn -RSB- born October 26 , 1973 -RRB- is an American actor , filmmaker , and singer , working primarily in animation and comedy , as well as live-action and other genres . MacFarlane is the creator of the TV series Family Guy -LRB- 1999 -- 2003 , 2005 -- present -RRB- , co-creator of the TV series American Dad ! -LRB- 2005 -- present -RRB- and The Cleveland Show -LRB- 2009 -- 13 -RRB- . He also wrote , directed , and starred in the films Ted -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , its sequel Ted 2 -LRB- 2015 -RRB- , and A Million Ways to Die in the West -LRB- 2014 -RRB- .   MacFarlane is a graduate of the Rhode Island School of Design , where he studied animation . Recruited to Hollywood , he was an animator and writer for Hanna-Barbera for several television series , including Johnny Bravo , Cow and Chicken , Dexter 's Laboratory , I Am Weasel , and Larry & Steve . As an actor , he has made guest appearances on series , such as Gilmore Girls , The War at Home and FlashForward . In 2008 , he created his own YouTube series titled Seth MacFarlane 's Cavalcade of Cartoon Comedy . He won several awards for his work on Family Guy , including two Primetime Emmy Awards and an Annie Award . In 2009 , he won the Webby Award for Film & Video Person of the Year . He occasionally speaks at universities and colleges throughout the United States , and he is a supporter of gay rights .   MacFarlane 's first feature-length comedy film , Ted , features his voice acting and performance-capture as the titular anthropomorphic teddy bear and became the highest-grossing original R-rated comedy . As a singer MacFarlane has performed at several venues , including Carnegie Hall and the Royal Albert Hall . MacFarlane has released three studio albums , in the same vein of his musical idol Frank Sinatra , beginning with Music Is Better Than Words in 2011 . He wrote the lyrics for the Academy Award-nominated song `` Everybody Needs a Best Friend '' for Ted .   MacFarlane served as executive producer of Cosmos : A Spacetime Odyssey , an update of the 1980s Carl Sagan -- hosted Cosmos series , hosted by Neil deGrasse Tyson . MacFarlane was instrumental in providing funding for the series , as well as securing studio support for it from other entertainment executives .

evidence_da: RasenBallsport Leipzig e.V. , almindeligvis kendt som RB Leipzig , er en tysk forening fodboldklub baseret i Leipzig , Sachsen . Klubben blev grundlagt i 2009 ved initiativ af energi drikke-maker Red Bull GmbH, der købte en spiller ret i femte division side SSV Markranstädt med den hensigt at fremme den nye klub til top-flight Bundesliga inden for otte år . Mændenes professionelle fodbold drives af spin-off organisation RasenballSport Leipzig GmbH . RB Leipzig spiller sine hjemmekampe på Red Bull Arena .   I sin indledende sæson i 2009 - 10 dominerede RB Leipzig NOFV-Oberliga Süd -LRB- V -RRB- og blev forfremmet som mestre til Regionalliga Nord -LRB- IV -RRB- . RB Leipzig vandt 2012 - 13 Regionalliga Nordost sæsonen uden at indrømme et enkelt nederlag og blev forfremmet til 3 . Liga -LRB- III -RRB- , derefter færdig i 2013 - 14 3 . Liga sæson som runner-up og blev forfremmet til 2 . Bundesliga -LRB- II -RRB- som det første hold siden indførelsen af de 3 . Liga for at vinde forfremmelse efter kun én sæson .   maj 2016 sikrede RB Leipzig forfremmelse til Bundesligaen for 2016 - 17 sæsonen med et 2 -- 0 nederlag til Karlsruher SC . evidence_en: RasenBallsport Leipzig e.V. , commonly known as RB Leipzig , is a German association football club based in Leipzig , Saxony . The club was founded in 2009 by initiative of energy drink-maker Red Bull GmbH who purchased a playing right of the fifth division side SSV Markranstädt with the intention of advancing the new club to the top-flight Bundesliga within eight years . Men 's professional football is run by the spin-off organization RasenballSport Leipzig GmbH . RB Leipzig plays its home matches at the Red Bull Arena .   In its inaugural season in 2009 -- 10 , RB Leipzig dominated the NOFV-Oberliga Süd -LRB- V -RRB- and was promoted as champions to the Regionalliga Nord -LRB- IV -RRB- . RB Leipzig won the 2012 -- 13 Regionalliga Nordost season without conceding a single defeat and was promoted to the 3 . Liga -LRB- III -RRB- , then finished the 2013 -- 14 3 . Liga season as runner-up and was promoted to the 2 . Bundesliga -LRB- II -RRB- as the first team since the introduction of the 3 . Liga to win promotion after only one season .   On 8 May 2016 , RB Leipzig ensured promotion to the Bundesliga for the 2016 -- 17 season with a 2 -- 0 defeat of Karlsruher SC . One year later , RB Leipzig captured a place in the 2017 -- 18 UEFA Champions League by finishing as runner-up of the Bundesliga .

evidence_en: Michelle Marie Pfeiffer -LRB- -LSB- ˈfaɪfər -RSB- born April 29 , 1958 -RRB- is an American actress , singer and producer . Described by the media as a character actress , Pfeiffer is known for her versatility , period roles , ability to mask her true feelings while in character , and portraying funny , intelligent female characters with strong sex appeal throughout the 1980s and 1990s . She began her acting career in 1978 and had her first starring film role in Grease 2 -LRB- 1982 -RRB- , before receiving mainstream attention for her breakout performance in Scarface -LRB- 1983 -RRB- . Her greatest commercial successes include Batman Returns -LRB- 1992 -RRB- , Dangerous Minds -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , What Lies Beneath -LRB- 2000 -RRB- and Hairspray -LRB- 2007 -RRB- .   Pfeiffer was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress and won the BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role for Dangerous Liaisons -LRB- 1988 -RRB- , and was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress and won the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress -- Motion Picture Drama for The Fabulous Baker Boys -LRB- 1989 -RRB- . She received a third Oscar nomination for Love Field -LRB- 1992 -RRB- . Her other notable film roles include The Witches of Eastwick -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , Married to the Mob -LRB- 1988 -RRB- , Frankie and Johnny -LRB- 1991 -RRB- , The Age of Innocence -LRB- 1993 -RRB- , Wolf -LRB- 1994 -RRB- and White Oleander -LRB- 2002 -RRB- .

evidence_da: Transformers : Age of Extinction er en amerikansk science fiction-actionfilm fra 2014 baseret på Transformers-serien. Det er den fjerde rate af live-action Transformers filmserie og en stand-alone efterfølger til 2011 's Transformers : Dark of the Moon , der finder sted fem år efter dens begivenheder . Ligesom sine forgængere blev den instrueret af Michael Bay og skrevet af Ehren Kruger , med Steven Spielberg og Bay som udøvende producenter . Det stjerner Mark Wahlberg , med Peter Cullen reprising sin rolle som stemme Optimus Prime , som hovedrollerne . Det er den første film i serien til ikke at indeholde de oprindelige menneskelige karakterer fra de første tre film, men har en ny støbt af menneskelige karakterer og mange nye Transformers herunder : Dinobots , Lockdown , Stinger , Junkheap , Hound , Crosshairs og Drift . Tilbagevendende Transformers omfatter: Optimus Prime , Bumblebee , Ratchet , Leadfoot , Brains og Megatron -LRB- nu kendt som Galvatron -RRB- . Filmen blev udgivet den 27 juni 2014 , i IMAX og 3D .   Transformers : Age of Extinction blev panoreret af kritikere , hvoraf mange fandt det dårligt rettet , dårligt handlet , og frygtelig skrevet . Ifølge Rotten Tomatoes er det den dårligst anmeldte film i serien med en godkendelsesvurdering på 18 pct . Det modtog også syv nomineringer på 35th Golden Raspberry Awards , herunder Worst Picture og Worst Prequel , Remake , Rip-off eller Sequel , med Bay og Kelsey Grammer vinde priser for værste instruktør og værste birolle henholdsvis . Filmen indtjente over $ 1.104 milliarder på verdensplan , hvilket gør det til den højest indtjenende film af 2014 , den næsthøjeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film i Transformers serien , den 19. Det var den eneste film til brutto over $ 1 milliard i 2014 .   En efterfølger , Transformers : The Last Knight , er indstillet til at blive frigivet juni 21 , 2017 , med Cullen , Tucci , og Wahlberg vender tilbage , og Bay lede .
evidence_en: Transformers : Age of Extinction is a 2014 American science fiction action film based on the Transformers franchise . It is the fourth installment of the live-action Transformers film series and a stand-alone sequel to 2011 's Transformers : Dark of the Moon , taking place five years after its events . Like its predecessors , it was directed by Michael Bay and written by Ehren Kruger , with Steven Spielberg and Bay as executive producers . It stars Mark Wahlberg , with Peter Cullen reprising his role as the voice of Optimus Prime , as the lead roles . It is the first film in the series to not feature the original human characters from the first three films , but features a new cast of human characters and many new Transformers including : the Dinobots , Lockdown , Stinger , Junkheap , Hound , Crosshairs and Drift . Returning Transformers include : Optimus Prime , Bumblebee , Ratchet , Leadfoot , Brains and Megatron -LRB- now known as Galvatron -RRB- . The film was released on June 27 , 2014 , in IMAX and 3D .   Transformers : Age of Extinction was panned by critics , many of whom considered it poorly directed , badly acted , and terribly written . According to Rotten Tomatoes , it is the worst reviewed film in the series , holding an 18 % approval rating . It also received seven nominations at the 35th Golden Raspberry Awards , including Worst Picture and Worst Prequel , Remake , Rip-off or Sequel , with Bay and Kelsey Grammer winning the awards for Worst Director and Worst Supporting Actor respectively . The film grossed over $ 1.104 billion worldwide , making it the highest-grossing film of 2014 , the second highest-grossing film in the Transformers series , the 19th film to gross over $ 1 billion , and the 16th highest-grossing film of all time . It was the only film to gross over $ 1 billion in 2014 .   A sequel , Transformers : The Last Knight , is set to be released on June 21 , 2017 , with Cullen , Tucci , and Wahlberg returning , and Bay directing .

I marts 2012 blev han af Forbes Magazine opført som en af de rigeste russere med en anslået formue på 1,1 milliarder dollar . Men hans formue er siden faldet , og han anses ikke længere for at være milliardær . Han er medejer af den russiske avis Novaya Gazeta og ejer af to britiske aviser med sønnen Evgeny Lebedev : London Evening Standard , The Independent .
evidence_en: Alexander Yevgenievich Lebedev -LRB- -LSB- Алекса́ндр Евге́ньевич Ле́бедев , p = ɐlʲɪˈksandr jɪvˈɡʲenʲjɪvʲɪtɕ ˈlʲebʲɪdʲɪf -RSB- born 16 December 1959 -RRB- is a Russian businessman , referred to as one of the Russian oligarchs .   In March 2012 , he was listed by Forbes magazine as one of the richest Russians with an estimated fortune of $ 1.1 billion . However , his fortune has since declined , and he is no longer considered to be a billionaire . He is part owner of the Russian newspaper Novaya Gazeta and owner of two UK newspapers with son Evgeny Lebedev : the London Evening Standard , The Independent .

evidence_da: Havoc er en 2005 kriminalitet drama film stjernespækket Anne Hathaway og Bijou Phillips , med Shiri Appleby , Freddy Rodriguez , Joseph Gordon-Levitt , Michael Biehn , og Laura San Giacomo optræder i biroller . Filmen handler om livet for velhavende Los Angeles , Californien teenagere, hvis eksponering for hip hop kultur inspirerer dem til at efterligne gangster livsstil. De løber ind i problemer, når de støder på en bande af narkohandlere, opdage, at de ikke er så gade-kloge, som de havde troet.   Skrevet af Jessica Kaplan og Stephen Gaghan og instrueret af Barbara Kopple , filmen blev vist på flere filmfestivaler og derefter gik direkte til DVD på November 29 , 2005 .
evidence_en: Havoc is a 2005 crime drama film starring Anne Hathaway and Bijou Phillips , with Shiri Appleby , Freddy Rodriguez , Joseph Gordon-Levitt , Michael Biehn , and Laura San Giacomo appearing in supporting roles . The film is about the lives of wealthy Los Angeles , California teenagers whose exposure to hip hop culture inspires them to imitate the gangster lifestyle . They run into trouble when they encounter a gang of drug dealers , discovering they are not as street-wise as they had thought .   Written by Jessica Kaplan and Stephen Gaghan and directed by Barbara Kopple , the film was shown at several film festivals and then went directly to DVD on November 29 , 2005 .

evidence_da: Kaminey -LRB- Slyngel-RRB- er en 2009 indisk kapers thriller film instrueret af Vishal Bhardwaj og byder Shahid Kapoor , Priyanka Chopra og Amol Gupte i hovedrollerne . Set på baggrund af Mumbai underverdenen , Kaminey følger en rivalisering mellem et par tvillinger , den ene med en lisp og den anden med en stamme , i løbet af en enkelt dag .   Bhardwaj co-skrev manuskriptet med Sabrina Dhawan , Abhishek Chaubey , og Supratik Sen Bhardwaj købte den oprindelige script for fra kenyanske forfatter Cajetan Boywho han havde mentored på en manuskriptskrivning workshop i Uganda . August 2009 og blev en box-office succes på verdensplan , opregning over mod et budget på . Filmens soundtrack album blev også en kommerciel succes , med sangen '' Dhan Te Nan '' topping hitlisterne på forskellige platforme .   Kaminey fik udbredt kritikerros , hvor flere kritikere og mediepublikationer placerede den som nummer et på deres lister over '' Årets bedste film '. Siden udgivelsen har filmen opnået kultstatus . Det modtog flere priser og nomineringer ved ceremonier i hele Indien . Ved 55th Filmfare Awards , det modtog ti nomineringer , herunder Bedste Film , Bedste Instruktør , Bedste Skuespiller , Bedste Kvindelige Hovedrolle , og bedste mandlige birolle ; det vandt prisen for bedste special effects . Ved 57th National Film Awards vandt Kaminey to priser - Bedste Audiografi for Subash Sahoo og Special Jury Award for sin redigering af A. Sreekar Prasad .
evidence_en: Kaminey -LRB- Rascal -RRB- is a 2009 Indian caper thriller film directed by Vishal Bhardwaj and featuring Shahid Kapoor , Priyanka Chopra and Amol Gupte in the lead roles . Set against the backdrop of the Mumbai underworld , Kaminey follows a rivalry between a pair of twins , one with a lisp and the other with a stutter , over the course of a single day .   Bhardwaj co-wrote the screenplay with Sabrina Dhawan , Abhishek Chaubey , and Supratik Sen. Bhardwaj bought the original script for from Kenyan writer Cajetan Boywhom he had mentored at a scriptwriting workshop in Uganda . Kaminey was released on 14 August 2009 and became a box-office success worldwide , grossing over against a budget of . The film 's soundtrack album also became a commercial success , with the song `` Dhan Te Nan '' topping the charts on various platforms .   Kaminey received widespread critical acclaim , with several critics and media publications placing it at number one on their listings of `` Best film of the year '' . Since its release , the film has attained cult status . It received several awards and nominations at ceremonies across India . At the 55th Filmfare Awards , it received ten nominations , including Best Film , Best Director , Best Actor , Best Actress , and Best Supporting Actor ; it won the award for Best Special Effects . At the 57th National Film Awards , Kaminey won two awards -- Best Audiography for Subash Sahoo and Special Jury Award for its editing by A. Sreekar Prasad .

evidence_da: Marvel 's Iron Fist , eller blot Iron Fist , er en amerikansk web-tv-serie skabt til Netflix af Scott Buck , baseret på Marvel Comics karakter af samme navn . Det er sat i Marvel Cinematic Universe-LRB- MCU-RRB-, deler kontinuitet med film af franchisen og er den fjerde i en række shows, der vil føre op til The Defenders crossover miniserie . Serien er produceret af Marvel Television i samarbejde med ABC Studios og Devilina Productions , med Buck tjener som showrunner .   Finn Jones stjerner som Danny Rand / Iron Fist , en kampsport ekspert med evnen til at kalde på magt Iron Fist . Jessica Henwick , Tom Pelphrey , Jessica Stroup , Ramón Rodríguez , Sacha Dhawan , Rosario Dawson og David Wenham også stjerne . Efter en film baseret på den karakter tilbragt over et årti i udvikling på Marvel Studios , udvikling for serien begyndte i slutningen af 2013 på Marvel Television , med Buck hyret som serien showrunner i december 2015 og Jones støbt som Rand i februar 2016 . Optagelserne begyndte i New York City i april 2016 og sluttede i oktober 2016 .   Iron Fist havde premiere den 15. marts 2017 - i New York City , hvor hele sæsonen med 13 episoder blev udgivet på Netflix den 17. marts 2017 . Serien modtog blandede anmeldelser fra kritikere , med kritik rettet mod sit tempo og storytelling , underwhelming kamp sekvenser , og Jones ' skildring af Rand , mens Henwick 's præstation som Colleen Wing og optrædener af etablerede tegn Claire Temple og Jeri Hogarth modtaget ros . Tredjeparts dataanalyse fastslået serien havde stærke indledende seertallet , men dette blev snart skåret i halve .
evidence_en: Marvel 's Iron Fist , or simply Iron Fist , is an American web television series created for Netflix by Scott Buck , based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name . It is set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe -LRB- MCU -RRB- , sharing continuity with the films of the franchise and is the fourth in a series of shows that will lead up to The Defenders crossover miniseries . The series is produced by Marvel Television in association with ABC Studios and Devilina Productions , with Buck serving as showrunner .   Finn Jones stars as Danny Rand / Iron Fist , a martial arts expert with the ability to call upon the power of the Iron Fist . Jessica Henwick , Tom Pelphrey , Jessica Stroup , Ramón Rodríguez , Sacha Dhawan , Rosario Dawson and David Wenham also star . After a film based on the character spent over a decade in development at Marvel Studios , development for the series began in late 2013 at Marvel Television , with Buck hired as the series showrunner in December 2015 and Jones cast as Rand in February 2016 . Filming began in New York City in April 2016 and concluded in October 2016 .   Iron Fist had its premiere on March 15 , 2017 , in New York City , with the full season of 13 episodes releasing on Netflix on March 17 , 2017 . The series received mixed reviews from critics , with criticism aimed towards its pace and storytelling , underwhelming fight sequences , and Jones ' portrayal of Rand , while Henwick 's performance as Colleen Wing and the appearances of established characters Claire Temple and Jeri Hogarth received praise . Third-party data analytics determined the series had strong initial viewership , but this was shortly cut in half .

evidence_da: Life Is Peachy er det andet studiealbum af det amerikanske nu metal band Korn , udgivet den 15. Efter udgivelsen af Korn 's 1994 selvbetitlede debut album , bandet bad Ross Robinson til at producere og gik tilbage til Indigo Ranch at optage . Life Is Peachy har fjorten numre , bortset fra det skjulte spor efter '' Kill You ''. Korn udgav tre singler fra Life Is Peachy : '' No Place to Hide '', '' A.D.D.A.S. '' og '' God Gud ''. Alle tre singler gik på uk Singles Chart . Livet er Fersken funktioner temaer som narkotika, sociale møder, sex, og hævn. Albummets coverkunst er designet af Martin Riedl, og dets navn krediteres Korns bassist Reginald '' Fieldy '' Arvizu .   Life Is Peachy blev certificeret guld den 8. Efter succesen med Korn 's 1994 selvbetitlede debut album , Life Is Peachy blev certificeret dobbelt platin november 10 , 1999 . Life Is Peachy debuterede og toppede som nummer tre på Billboard 200 og toppede som nummer et i New Zealand . I sin første uge for at blive frigivet , albummet solgt 106.000 eksemplarer . Kritisk modtagelse for Life Is Peachy var hovedsageligt blandet , med kritikere rose albummets sangskrivning og lydkvalitet .   Før udgivelsen af Life Is Peachy turnerede Korn med mange bands. I første omgang , Korn sluttede sig til Sick of It All Tour . Efter Sick of It All Tour , Korn sluttede sig til Danzig 4 Tour . Korn turnerede også med Megadeth , Fear Factory og Flotsam og Jetsam . Efter udgivelsen af Life Is Peachy turnerede Korn solo og hovednavn og ofte udsolgte shows . Korn turnerede også i Lollapalooza sommer tour.
evidence_en: Life Is Peachy is the second studio album by the American nu metal band Korn , released on October 15 , 1996 through both Immortal Records and Epic Records . After the release of Korn 's 1994 self-titled debut album , the band asked Ross Robinson to produce and went back to Indigo Ranch to record . Life Is Peachy has fourteen tracks , excluding the hidden track after `` Kill You '' . Korn released three singles from Life Is Peachy : `` No Place to Hide '' , `` A.D.I.D.A.S. '' , and `` Good God '' . All three singles went on the UK Singles Chart . Life Is Peachy features such themes as drugs , social encounters , sex , and revenge . The album 's cover art was designed by Martin Riedl and its name is credited to Korn 's bassist Reginald `` Fieldy '' Arvizu .   Life Is Peachy was certified gold on January 8 , 1997 and was later certified platinum on December 9 , 1997 . Following the success of Korn 's 1994 self-titled debut album , Life Is Peachy was certified double platinum on November 10 , 1999 . Life Is Peachy debuted and peaked at number three on the Billboard 200 and peaked at number one in New Zealand . In its first week of being released , the album sold 106,000 copies . Critical reception for Life Is Peachy was mainly mixed , with critics praising the album 's songwriting and sound quality .   Before the release of Life Is Peachy , Korn toured with many bands . Initially , Korn joined the Sick of It All Tour . Following the Sick of It All Tour , Korn joined the Danzig 4 Tour . Korn also toured with Megadeth , Fear Factory , and Flotsam and Jetsam . After the release of Life Is Peachy , Korn toured solo , and headlined and often sold out shows . Korn also toured in the Lollapalooza summer tour .

Han begyndte sin karriere på 2000 tv-serien Opposite Sex , og har siden optrådt i en række film , såsom ikke en anden Teen Movie , Sunshine , Scott Pilgrim vs Verden , Snowpiercer og Begavede . evidence_en: Christopher Robert Evans -LRB- born June 13 , 1981 -RRB- is an American actor and filmmaker . Evans is known for his superhero roles as the Marvel Comics characters Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and the Human Torch in Fantastic Four and its 2007 sequel .   He began his career on the 2000 television series Opposite Sex , and has since appeared in a number of films , such as Not Another Teen Movie , Sunshine , Scott Pilgrim vs. the World , Snowpiercer and Gifted . In 2014 , Evans made his directorial debut with the drama film Before We Go , in which he also starred .

evidence_en: Brooks Wackerman -LRB- born February 15 , 1977 -RRB- is an American musician , currently the drummer for the American heavy metal bands Avenged Sevenfold and Mass Mental , also known as the former drummer for Bad Religion , and is the younger brother of John Bob , and Chad Wackerman -LRB- formerly a member of Frank Zappa 's band -RRB- . He is the son of Chuck Wackerman , an educator in the Los Alamitos California Unified School District . Wackerman is also a former student of Murray Spivack and Chuck Flores . Fondens mission er at dyrke en generel offentlighed , der er informeret af videnskaben , inspireret af dens undren , overbevist om dens værdi og parat til at engagere sig i dens konsekvenser for fremtiden .
evidence_en: The World Science Festival is an annual science festival produced by the World Science Foundation , a 501 -LRB- c -RRB- -LRB- 3 -RRB- non-profit organization headquartered in New York City .   The foundation 's mission is to cultivate a general public informed by science , inspired by its wonder , convinced of its value , and prepared to engage with its implications for the future .

evidence_en: Alessia Caracciolo -LRB- -LSB- aˈlɛssja kaˈrattʃolo -RSB- ; born July 11 , 1996 -RRB- , professionally known as Alessia Cara , is a Canadian singer and songwriter . She is signed to EP Entertainment and Def Jam Recordings and released her debut single , `` Here '' , from the debut studio album , Know-It-All , released November 13 , 2015 . A sleeper hit , the song reached the top five in the United States and the top 20 in Canada . Prior to her work for Def Jam , she produced acoustic covers on YouTube .   In 2016 , her single `` Scars to Your Beautiful '' reached the top ten on the Billboard Hot 100 and topped the US pop radio charts . In 2017 , Cara collaborated with producer Zedd to create the single `` Stay '' , which has since reached number 7 on the Billboard Hot 100 , making it her third top ten song .

evidence_da: Spider-Man er en amerikansk superheltefilm fra 2002 instrueret af Sam Raimi . Baseret på Marvel Comics karakter af samme navn , filmen stjerner Tobey Maguire som Peter Parker , en gymnasieelev, der bor i New York City , der vender sig til kriminalitetsbekæmpelse efter at have udviklet spider-lignende superkræfter . Spider-Man også stjerner Kirsten Dunst som Peter 's kærlighed interesse Mary Jane Watson , Willem Dafoe som Norman Osborn / Green Goblin , Rosemary Harris og Cliff Robertson som tante maj og onkel Ben , og James Franco som hans bedste ven Harry Osborn .   Efter fremskridt på filmen gået i stå i næsten 25 år , det var licenseret til en verdensomspændende udgivelse af Sony Pictures Entertainment i 1999, efter at det erhvervede muligheder fra MGM på alle tidligere scripts udviklet af Cannon Films , Carolco og New Cannon . Udøver sin mulighed på blot to elementer fra multi-script erhvervelse-LRB- en anden manuskript blev skrevet af James Cameron , Ted Newsom , John Brancato , Barney Cohen og '' Joseph Goldman '' -RRB-, Sony hyret David Koepp at skabe en arbejdsgruppe manuskript -LRB-krediteret som Cameron 's -RRB-, og Koepp modtaget eneste kredit i endelig fakturering . Direktører Roland Emmerich , Ang Lee , Chris Columbus , Jan de Bont , M. Night Shyamalan , Tony Scott og David Fincher blev anset for at lede projektet, før Raimi blev ansat som direktør i 2000 . Den Koepp script blev omskrevet af Scott Rosenberg under overproduktion og modtog en dialog polish fra Alvin Sargent under produktionen .   Optagelserne fandt sted i Los Angeles , og New York City fra januar 8 til juni 30 , 2001 . Spider-Man havde premiere i Filippinerne april 30 , 2002 , og havde sin generelle udgivelse i USA maj 3 , 2002 . Det blev en kritisk og økonomisk succes . På det tidspunkt var det den eneste film , der nåede 100 millioner dollars i sin første weekend , havde den største åbningsweekend brutto nogensinde , og var den mest succesfulde film baseret på en tegneserie . Med $ 821.7 millioner på verdensplan , det var 2002 's tredje-højest indtjenende film og er den 56.-højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film af hele tiden -LRB- syvende på tidspunktet for frigivelse-RRB-. Filmen blev nomineret ved 75th Academy Awards ceremoni for bedste visuelle effekter og bedste lydblanding . På grund af succesen med filmen , Columbia Pictures og Marvel udgivet to fortsættelser , Spider-Man 2 i 2004 , og Spider-Man 3 i 2007 .
evidence_en: Spider-Man is a 2002 American superhero film directed by Sam Raimi . Based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name , the film stars Tobey Maguire as Peter Parker , a high school student living in New York City , who turns to crimefighting after developing spider-like super powers . Spider-Man also stars Kirsten Dunst as Peter 's love interest Mary Jane Watson , Willem Dafoe as Norman Osborn/Green Goblin , Rosemary Harris and Cliff Robertson as Aunt May and Uncle Ben , and James Franco as his best friend Harry Osborn .   After progress on the film stalled for nearly 25 years , it was licensed for a worldwide release by Sony Pictures Entertainment in 1999 after it acquired options from MGM on all previous scripts developed by Cannon Films , Carolco and New Cannon . Exercising its option on just two elements from the multi-script acquisition -LRB- a different screenplay was written by James Cameron , Ted Newsom , John Brancato , Barney Cohen and `` Joseph Goldman '' -RRB- , Sony hired David Koepp to create a working screenplay -LRB- credited as Cameron 's -RRB- , and Koepp received sole credit in final billing . Directors Roland Emmerich , Ang Lee , Chris Columbus , Jan de Bont , M. Night Shyamalan , Tony Scott and David Fincher were considered to direct the project before Raimi was hired as director in 2000 . The Koepp script was rewritten by Scott Rosenberg during preproduction and received a dialogue polish from Alvin Sargent during production .   Filming took place in Los Angeles , and New York City from January 8 to June 30 , 2001 . Spider-Man premiered in the Philippines on April 30 , 2002 , and had its general release in the United States on May 3 , 2002 . It became a critical and financial success . At the time , it was the only film to reach $ 100 million in its first weekend , had the largest opening weekend gross of all time , and was the most successful film based on a comic book . With $ 821.7 million worldwide , it was 2002 's third-highest-grossing film and is the 56th-highest-grossing film of all time -LRB- seventh at the time of release -RRB- . The film was nominated at the 75th Academy Awards ceremony for Best Visual Effects and Best Sound Mixing . Due to the success of the film , Columbia Pictures and Marvel released two sequels , Spider-Man 2 in 2004 , and Spider-Man 3 in 2007 .
