evidence_en: Kwon Ji-yong -LRB- ; born August 18 , 1988 -RRB- , better known by his stage name G-Dragon , is a South Korean rapper , singer-songwriter , record producer , and fashion icon . After six years as a trainee under the record label YG Entertainment , G-Dragon rose to fame in the mid-2000s as one of two rappers in the South Korean hip hop boy band Big Bang . Despite initial lukewarm receptions , the group became one of the best-selling digital group of all-time in Asia and one of the best-selling boy bands in the world .   G-Dragon debuted as a solo artist with the release of Heartbreaker in 2009 . The album was a commercial success and earned the Mnet Asian Music Awards for Album of the Year , while the single of the same name became a number-one hit . G-Dragon later formed a duo with fellow Big Bang member T.O.P to record and release the album GD & TOP -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , which contained the top-five hits `` High High '' , `` Oh Yeah '' , and `` Knock Out '' on the Gaon Digital Chart , while the album peaked at number-one . His first EP One of a Kind -LRB- 2012 -RRB- was critically acclaimed and yielded `` One of a Kind '' , `` Crayon '' , and the number-one `` That XX '' , earning Record of the Year at the 22nd Seoul Music Awards . The EP became the highest-selling album by a Korean soloist since his own Heartbreaker . In 2013 , he embarked on his first worldwide tour as a solo artist , which included a four-dome tour in Japan , making him the first Korean soloist to do a dome tour . G-Dragon was awarded Artist of the Year at the 15th Mnet Asian Music Awards following the success of his second studio album Coup d'Etat -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , in addition to the awards of World 's Best Entertainer and World 's Best Album at the 2014 World Music Awards .   Recognized as one of the most influential leaders in music and fashion in his country and labelled as an `` K-pop icon '' , G-Dragon was named by Forbes the most influential person under 30 in Asia 's entertainment and sports . Producing not only for his band but also for his and his bandmates ' solo releases , G-Dragon has written 22 number one songs .

evidence_da: Little Miss Sunshine er en amerikansk komedie-drama road film fra 2006 og instruktørdebut af jonathan Daytonog Valerie Faris . Manuskriptet er skrevet af førstegangsforfatteren Michael Arndt . Filmen stjerner Greg Kinnear , Steve Carell , Toni Collette , Paul Dano , Abigail Breslin og Alan Arkin , og blev produceret af Big Beach Films på et budget på US $ 8 millioner . Optagelserne begyndte juni 6 , 2005 og fandt sted over 30 dage i Arizona og det sydlige Californien .   Filmen havde premiere på Sundance Film Festival on January 20 , 2006 , og dens distributionsrettigheder blev købt af Fox Searchlight Pictures for en af de største tilbud i historien om festivalen . Filmen havde en begrænset udgivelse i USA juli 26 , 2006 , og senere udvidet til en bredere udgivelse starter august 18 .   Little Miss Sunshine havde en international box office brutto på $ 100,5 millioner . Filmen blev nomineret til fire Academy Awards , herunder Best Picture , og vandt to : Bedste originale manuskript til Michael Arndt og bedste mandlige birolle for Alan Arkin . Det vandt også Independent Spirit Award for Best Feature og modtog mange andre udmærkelser .
evidence_en: Little Miss Sunshine is a 2006 American comedy-drama road film and the directorial debut of the husband-wife team of Jonathan Dayton and Valerie Faris . The screenplay was written by first-time writer Michael Arndt . The film stars Greg Kinnear , Steve Carell , Toni Collette , Paul Dano , Abigail Breslin and Alan Arkin , and was produced by Big Beach Films on a budget of US$ 8 million . Filming began on June 6 , 2005 and took place over 30 days in Arizona and Southern California .   The film premiered at the Sundance Film Festival on January 20 , 2006 , and its distribution rights were bought by Fox Searchlight Pictures for one of the biggest deals made in the history of the festival . The film had a limited release in the United States on July 26 , 2006 , and later expanded to a wider release starting on August 18 .   Little Miss Sunshine had an international box office gross of $ 100.5 million . The film was nominated for four Academy Awards , including Best Picture , and won two : Best Original Screenplay for Michael Arndt and Best Supporting Actor for Alan Arkin . It also won the Independent Spirit Award for Best Feature and received numerous other accolades .

evidence_da: Antinukleare antistoffer -LRB- ANA'er , også kendt som antinuklear faktor eller ANF -RRB - er autoantistoffer, der binder sig til indholdet af cellekernen . Hos normale individer producerer immunsystemet antistoffer mod fremmede proteiner -LRB- antigener -RRB- men ikke til menneskelige proteiner -LRB- autoantigener -RRB- . Hos nogle individer fremstilles antistoffer mod humane antigener .   Der findes mange undertyper af ANA'er såsom anti-ro antistoffer, anti-La antistoffer, anti-Sm antistoffer, anti-nRNP antistoffer , antistoffer mod Scl-70 , anti-dsDNA antistoffer, anti-histone antistoffer, antistoffer mod nukleare pore komplekser, anti-centromere antistoffer og anti-sp100 antistoffer. Hver af disse antistofundertyper binder sig til forskellige proteiner eller proteinkomplekser i kernen. De findes i mange sygdomme, herunder autoimmunitet, kræft og infektion, med forskellige prævalenser af antistoffer afhængigt af tilstanden. Dette gør det muligt at anvende ANA'er til diagnosticering af visse autoimmune sygdomme , herunder systemisk lupus erythematosus , Sjögrens syndrom, sklerodermi , blandet bindevævssygdom , polymyositis , dermatomyositis , autoimmun hepatitis og narkotikainduceret lupus .   ANA-testen registrerer de autoantistoffer, der findes i en persons blodserum. De almindelige test, der anvendes til påvisning og kvantificering af ANA'er, er indirekte immunfluorescens og enzymrelateret immunorbentassay -LRB- ELISA -RRB- . Ved immunfluorescens rapporteres niveauet af autoantistoffer som en titer . Dette er den højeste fortynding af det serum, hvor autoantistoffer stadig kan påvises. Positive autoantistoftititeter ved fortynding svarende til eller større end 1:160 betragtes normalt som klinisk signifikante . Positive titres på under 1:160 er til stede i op til 20 % af den raske befolkning , især de ældre . Selv om positive titers på 1:160 eller højere er stærkt forbundet med autoimmune sygdomme , findes de også hos 5 % af raske personer . Autoantistof screening er nyttig i diagnosticering af autoimmune sygdomme og overvågningsniveauer hjælper med at forudsige udviklingen af sygdommen. En positiv ANA-test er sjældent nyttig, hvis andre kliniske data eller laboratoriedata, der understøtter en diagnose, ikke er til stede .
evidence_en: Antinuclear antibodies -LRB- ANAs , also known as antinuclear factor or ANF -RRB- are autoantibodies that bind to contents of the cell nucleus . In normal individuals , the immune system produces antibodies to foreign proteins -LRB- antigens -RRB- but not to human proteins -LRB- autoantigens -RRB- . In some individuals , antibodies to human antigens are produced .   There are many subtypes of ANAs such as anti-Ro antibodies , anti-La antibodies , anti-Sm antibodies , anti-nRNP antibodies , anti-Scl-70 antibodies , anti-dsDNA antibodies , anti-histone antibodies , antibodies to nuclear pore complexes , anti-centromere antibodies and anti-sp100 antibodies . Each of these antibody subtypes binds to different proteins or protein complexes within the nucleus . They are found in many disorders including autoimmunity , cancer and infection , with different prevalences of antibodies depending on the condition . This allows the use of ANAs in the diagnosis of some autoimmune disorders , including systemic lupus erythematosus , Sjögren 's syndrome , scleroderma , mixed connective tissue disease , polymyositis , dermatomyositis , autoimmune hepatitis and drug induced lupus .   The ANA test detects the autoantibodies present in an individual 's blood serum . The common tests used for detecting and quantifying ANAs are indirect immunofluorescence and enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay -LRB- ELISA -RRB- . In immunofluorescence , the level of autoantibodies is reported as a titre . This is the highest dilution of the serum at which autoantibodies are still detectable . Positive autoantibody titres at a dilution equal to or greater than 1:160 are usually considered as clinically significant . Positive titres of less than 1:160 are present in up to 20 % of the healthy population , especially the elderly . Although positive titres of 1:160 or higher are strongly associated with autoimmune disorders , they are also found in 5 % of healthy individuals . Autoantibody screening is useful in the diagnosis of autoimmune disorders and monitoring levels helps to predict the progression of disease . A positive ANA test is seldom useful if other clinical or laboratory data supporting a diagnosis are not present .

evidence_da: Naver -LRB- Hangul :出出出出-RRB- er en populær webportal i Sydkorea , ejet af Naver Corporation . Naver blev lanceret i juni 1999 af tidligere Samsung medarbejdere , og det debuterede som den første webportal i Japan, der brugte sin egen proprietære søgemaskine . Blandt Naver 's funktioner er '' Omfattende Søg '' , lanceret i 2000 , som giver resultater fra flere kategorier på en enkelt side . Den har siden tilføjet nye tjenester som "vidensøgning" , der blev lanceret i 2002 . Det giver også internettjenester, herunder en nyhedstjeneste , en e-mail-tjeneste , en akademisk afsen søgetjeneste, og en børns portal . I 2005 lancerede Naver Happybean , verdens første online donationsportal , som giver brugerne mulighed for at finde oplysninger og give donationer til over 20.000 civilsamfunds - og sociale velfærdsorganisationer .   Ifølge pitchone håndterede Naver kun 48 % af websøgninger i Sydkorea i 2016 . -LRB- Ifølge techforkorea , Naver håndteret 77 % af alle websøgninger i Sydkorea i juli 2014 -RRB- Naver er den femte mest anvendte søgemaskine i verden , efter Google-søgning , Yahoo! , Baidu og Bing . Mere end 25 millioner koreanere har Naver som standard browser startside .  Naver lancerede sin tjeneste i Japan i 2009 , hvilket markerer deres første udvidelse ud af Korea .   I 2013 , Lee Hae-jin , formanden og chefstrategi Naver , så hans aktiepost værdi svæver over 1 billion vandt -LRB- US $ 939.4 millioner -RRB - på bagsiden af sin messenger service LINE .
evidence_en: Naver -LRB- Hangul : 네이버 -RRB- is a popular Web portal in South Korea , owned by Naver Corporation . Naver was launched in June 1999 by ex-Samsung employees , and it debuted as the first Web portal in Japan that used its own proprietary search engine . Among Naver 's features is `` Comprehensive Search '' , launched in 2000 , which provides results from multiple categories on a single page . It has since added new services such as `` Knowledge Search '' , launched in 2002 . It also provides Internet services including a news service , an e-mail service , an academic thesis search service , and a children 's portal . In 2005 , Naver launched Happybean , the world 's first online donation portal , which allows users to find information and make donations to over 20,000 civil society and social welfare organizations .   According to pitchone , Naver handled only 48 % of websearches in South Korea in 2016 . -LRB- According to techforkorea , Naver handled 77 % of all web searches in South Korea in July 2014 -RRB- Naver is the fifth most used search engine in the world , following Google search , Yahoo! , Baidu and Bing . More than 25 million Koreans have Naver as the default browser start page .  Naver launched its service in Japan in 2009 , marking their first expansion out of Korea .   In 2013 , Lee Hae-jin , the chairman and chief strategy of Naver , saw his stake value hover above 1 trillion won -LRB- US$ 939.4 million -RRB- on the back of its messenger service LINE .

evidence_da: Tyrkiet -LRB- Türkiye Cumhuriyeti -LSB- -----tycije dķumhuיijeti -RSB- -RRB- er et transkontinentalt land i Eurasien - primært i Anatolien i Det Vestlige Asien , med en mindre del på Balkanhalvøen i Sydøsteuropa . Tyrkiet er en demokratisk , sekulær , enhedsrepublik med en mangfoldig kulturarv . Tyrkiet grænser op til otte lande : Grækenland og Bulgarien mod nordvest; Georgien mod nordøst; Armenien , den aserbajdsjanske eksklave nakhchivan og Iran mod øst ; Irak og Syrien mod syd . Landet er omgivet af have på tre sider: Det Ægæiske Hav ligger mod vest , Sortehavet mod nord og Middelhavet mod syd . Bosporus , Marmarahavet og Dardanellerne , som tilsammen udgør de tyrkiske stræder , deler Thrakien og Anatolien ; de adskiller også Europa og Asien. Ankara er hovedstaden, mens Istanbul er landets største by og vigtigste kulturelle og kommercielle centrum. Ca. 70-80 % af landets borgere identificerer sig som etniske tyrkere . Andre etniske grupper omfatter juridisk anerkendte -LRB- armeniere , grækere , jøder -RRB- og ikke-anerkendte -LRB- kurdere , arabere , circassians , albanere , bosniere , georgiere, etc. -RRB- mindretal . Kurderne er den største etniske minoritetsgruppe , der udgør ca .   Området I Tyrkiet har været beboet siden palæolitisk af forskellige gamle anatoliske civilisationer, samt assyrere , grækere , thracians , phrygians , urartians og armeniere . Efter Alexander den Store 's erobring , området var helleniseret , en proces, der fortsatte under romerriget og dets overgang til det byzantinske imperium . Seljuk tyrkerne begyndte at migrere ind i området i 1100-tallet , og startede turkificationsprocessen , som blev fremskyndet af Seljuk-sejren over byzantinerne i slaget ved Manzikert i 1071 . Seljuk Sultanatet rûm regerede Anatolien indtil den mongolske invasion i 1243 , da den gik i opløsning i små tyrkiske beyliks.   I midten af 1400-tallet begyndte osmannerne at forene Anatolien og skabte et imperium, der omfattede store dele af Sydøsteuropa , Vestasien og Nordafrika , og blev en stor magt i Eurasien og Afrika i den tidlige moderne periode . Århundredet nåede toppen af sin magt i 1500-tallet , især under regeringstid -LRB- 1520 - 1566 -RRB - af Suleiman den Storslåede . Det forblev stærkt og indflydelsesrigt i yderligere to århundreder , indtil vigtige tilbageslag i 1600 - og 1700-tallet tvang den til at afstå strategiske områder i Europa , hvilket signalerer tabet af dets tidligere militære styrke og rigdom . Efter det osmanniske statskup i 1913, som effektivt satte landet under kontrol af de tre Pashas besluttede det osmanniske rige at slutte sig til centralmagterne under Første Verdenskrig, som i sidste ende blev besejret af de allierede magter . Under krigen begik den osmanniske regering folkedrab mod sine armenske , assyriske og pavelige græske borgere .   Efter krigen blev konglomeratet af territorier og folk , der tidligere bestod af det osmanniske rige , opdelt i flere nye stater . Den tyrkiske uafhængighedskrig -LRB- 1919 - 1922 -RRB- indledt af Mustafa Kemal Atatürk og hans kolleger mod de besatte allierede , resulterede i afskaffelsen af monarkiet i 1922 og oprettelsen af Republikken Tyrkiet i 1923 , med Atatürk som sin første præsident . Atatürk har gennemført en lang række reformer , hvoraf mange indarbejdet forskellige aspekter af vestlige tanker , filosofi og skikke i den nye form for tyrkisk regering .   Tyrkiet er chartermedlem af FN , et tidligt medlem af NATO og stiftende medlem af OECD , OSCE , OIC og G20 . Efter at være blevet et af europarådets første medlemmer i 1949 blev Tyrkiet associeret medlem af EF i 1963 , blev medlem af EU's toldunion i 1995 og indledte tiltrædelsesforhandlinger med Den Europæiske Union i 2005 . Tyrkiets voksende økonomi og diplomatiske initiativer har ført til landets anerkendelse som en regional magt , mens dets placering har givet landet geopolitisk og strategisk betydning gennem historien .   Tyrkiets nuværende regering under ledelse af præsident Tayyip Erdoğan har vendt mange af landets tidligere reformer, som havde været på plads siden grundlæggelsen af den moderne republik Tyrkiet , såsom Pressefrihed , et lovgivningssystem for kontrol og Balancer og et sæt standarder for sekularisme i regeringen , som først vedtaget af Atatürk .
evidence_en: Turkey -LRB- Türkiye Cumhuriyeti -LSB- ˈtyɾcije d͡ʒumˈhuɾijeti -RSB- -RRB- , is a transcontinental country in Eurasia , mainly in Anatolia in Western Asia , with a smaller portion on the Balkan peninsula in Southeast Europe . Turkey is a democratic , secular , unitary , parliamentary republic with a diverse cultural heritage . Turkey is bordered by eight countries : Greece and Bulgaria to the northwest ; Georgia to the northeast ; Armenia , the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan and Iran to the east ; Iraq and Syria to the south . The country is encircled by seas on three sides : the Aegean Sea is to the west , the Black Sea to the north , and the Mediterranean Sea to the south . The Bosphorus , the Sea of Marmara , and the Dardanelles , which together form the Turkish Straits , divide Thrace and Anatolia ; they also separate Europe and Asia . Ankara is the capital while Istanbul is the country 's largest city and main cultural and commercial centre . Approximately 70-80 % of the country 's citizens identify themselves as ethnic Turks . Other ethnic groups include legally recognised -LRB- Armenians , Greeks , Jews -RRB- and unrecognised -LRB- Kurds , Arabs , Circassians , Albanians , Bosniaks , Georgians , etc. -RRB- minorities . Kurds are the largest ethnic minority group , making up approximately 20 % of the population .   The area of Turkey has been inhabited since the Paleolithic by various ancient Anatolian civilisations , as well as Assyrians , Greeks , Thracians , Phrygians , Urartians and Armenians . After Alexander the Great 's conquest , the area was Hellenized , a process which continued under the Roman Empire and its transition into the Byzantine Empire . The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century , starting the process of Turkification , which was accelerated by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071 . The Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion in 1243 , when it disintegrated into small Turkish beyliks .   In the mid-14th century the Ottomans started uniting Anatolia and created an empire encompassing much of Southeast Europe , West Asia and North Africa , becoming a major power in Eurasia and Africa during the early modern period . The empire reached the peak of its power in the 16th century , especially during the reign -LRB- 1520 -- 1566 -RRB- of Suleiman the Magnificent . It remained powerful and influential for two more centuries , until important setbacks in the 17th and 18th century forced it to cede strategic territories in Europe , signalling the loss of its former military strength and wealth . After the 1913 Ottoman coup d'état which effectively put the country under the control of the Three Pashas the Ottoman Empire decided to join the Central Powers during World War I which were ultimately defeated by the Allied Powers . During the war , the Ottoman government committed genocides against its Armenian , Assyrian and Pontic Greek citizens .   Following the war , the conglomeration of territories and peoples that formerly comprised the Ottoman Empire was partitioned into several new states . The Turkish War of Independence -LRB- 1919 -- 1922 -RRB- , initiated by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues against the occupying Allies , resulted in the abolition of monarchy in 1922 and the establishment of the Republic of Turkey in 1923 , with Atatürk as its first president . Atatürk enacted numerous reforms , many of which incorporated various aspects of Western thought , philosophy , and customs into the new form of Turkish government .   Turkey is a charter member of the UN , an early member of NATO , and a founding member of the OECD , OSCE , OIC and G-20 . After becoming one of the first members of the Council of Europe in 1949 , Turkey became an associate member of the EEC in 1963 , joined the EU Customs Union in 1995 and started accession negotiations with the European Union in 2005 . Turkey 's growing economy and diplomatic initiatives have led to its recognition as a regional power while its location has given it geopolitical and strategic importance throughout history .   Turkey 's current administration headed by president Tayyip Erdoğan has reversed many of the country 's earlier reforms which had been in place since the founding of the modern republic of Turkey , such as Freedom of the Press , a Legislative System of Checks and Balances , and a set of standards for secularism in government , as first enacted by Atatürk .

evidence_en: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio -LRB- -LSB- dᵻˈkæpri.oʊ -RSB- born November 11 , 1974 -RRB- is an American actor , film producer , and environmental activist . DiCaprio began his career by appearing in television commercials in the early 1990s , after which he had recurring roles in various television series such as the soap opera Santa Barbara and the sitcom Growing Pains . He began his film career by starring as Josh in Critters 3 -LRB- 1991 -RRB- . He starred in the film adaptation of the memoir This Boy 's Life -LRB- 1993 -RRB- , and was praised for his supporting role in What 's Eating Gilbert Grape -LRB- 1993 -RRB- . He gained public recognition with leading roles in The Basketball Diaries -LRB- 1995 -RRB- and the romantic drama Romeo + Juliet -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , before achieving international fame with James Cameron 's epic romance Titanic -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , which became the highest-grossing film of all time until Cameron 's science fiction film Avatar -LRB- 2009 -RRB- overtook it .   Since 2000 , DiCaprio has received critical acclaim for his work in a wide range of film genres . DiCaprio 's subsequent films include The Man in the Iron Mask -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , the biographical crime drama Catch Me If You Can -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , and the epic historical drama Gangs of New York -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , which marked his first of many collaborations with director Martin Scorsese . He was acclaimed for his performances in the political war thriller Blood Diamond -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , the neo-noir crime drama The Departed -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , the espionage thriller Body of Lies -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , the drama Revolutionary Road -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , the psychological thriller Shutter Island -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , the science fiction thriller Inception -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , the biographical film J. Edgar -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , the western Django Unchained -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , and the period drama The Great Gatsby -LRB- 2013 -RRB- .   DiCaprio 's portrayals of Howard Hughes in The Aviator -LRB- 2004 -RRB- and Hugh Glass in The Revenant -LRB- 2015 -RRB- won him the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor -- Motion Picture Drama , and his role as Jordan Belfort in The Wolf of Wall Street -LRB- 2013 -RRB- won him the award for Best Actor -- Motion Picture Musical or Comedy . He also won his first Academy Award and BAFTA Award for his performance in The Revenant . DiCaprio is the founder of his own production company , Appian Way Productions .

evidence_da: Terminator Genisys er en amerikansk science fiction-actionfilm fra 2015 instrueret af Alan Taylor og skrevet af Laeta Kalogridis og Patrick Lussier . Den femte rate i Terminator franchise, det tjener som en blød genstart til filmserien, der indeholder hovedpersonerne fra de to første film , portrætteret af en ny stemmer med undtagelse af Arnold Schwarzenegger , der reprises sin rolle som eponyme Karakter. Filmen stjerner Schwarzenegger , Jason Clarke , Emilia Clarke og Jai Courtney . Plottet følger soldat Kyle Reese i krigen mod Skynet; Kyle sendes fra år 2029 til 1984 af John Connor , leder af den menneskelige modstandsbevægelse , for at beskytte Connor 's mor Sarah fra Skynet 's Android agent . Når Kyle ankommer i fortiden , opdager han, at tidslinjen er blevet ændret, og Sarah er blevet rejst af hans stenbrud 's omprogrammerede faksimile , og skal rejse til 2017 for at stoppe en farlig ordning fra Skynet og står over for sin avancerede håndhæver , T-3000 , med sin nye allie S.   Megan Ellison og hendes produktionsselskab , Annapurna Pictures , erhvervede franchiserettigheder i maj 2011 . Det følgende år blev produktionen af en anden rate i serien oprettet i samarbejde med Skydance Productions -LRB- ejet af Ellisons bror, David -RRB- . Den Ellisons hørt Terminator skaberen James Cameron i håb om at vende tilbage til ånden i den oprindelige film , The Terminator , og dens efterfølger , Terminator 2 : Dommedag . Principal fotografering var primært i New Orleans , med nogle i on-screen indstilling af San Francisco . Seks virksomheder håndterede filmens visuelle effekter; dens protese make-up og animatronics blev skabt af Legacy Effects , et studie grundlagt af Terminator veteran Stan Winston .   Filmen blev udgivet af Paramount Pictures juli 1 , 2015 , i standard digitalt format , RealD 3D , og IMAX 3D . Terminator Genisys blev ikke godt modtaget af kritikere , der fandt historien og forestillinger utilfredsstillende , selv om Schwarzenegger 's tilbagevenden til franchisen blev rost . Det indtjente over $ 440 millioner på verdensplan, hvilket gør det til den næsthøjeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film af franchisen og Schwarzenegger 's karriere-LRB- efter Terminator 2 : Dommedag -RRB- .
evidence_en: Terminator Genisys is a 2015 American science fiction action film directed by Alan Taylor and written by Laeta Kalogridis and Patrick Lussier . The fifth installment in the Terminator franchise , it serves as a soft reboot to the film series that features the main characters from the first two films , portrayed by a new cast with the exception of Arnold Schwarzenegger , who reprises his role as the eponymous character . The film stars Schwarzenegger , Jason Clarke , Emilia Clarke and Jai Courtney . The plot follows soldier Kyle Reese in the war against Skynet ; Kyle is sent from the year 2029 to 1984 by John Connor , leader of the Human Resistance , to protect Connor 's mother Sarah from Skynet 's android agent . When Kyle arrives in the past , he discovers that the timeline has been altered and Sarah has been raised by his quarry 's reprogrammed facsimile , and must travel to 2017 to stop a dangerous scheme from Skynet and face its advanced enforcer , the T-3000 , with his new allies .   Megan Ellison and her production company , Annapurna Pictures , acquired the franchise rights in May 2011 . The following year , production of another installment in the series was set up in collaboration with Skydance Productions -LRB- owned by Ellison 's brother , David -RRB- . The Ellisons consulted Terminator creator James Cameron in the hope of returning to the spirit of the original film , The Terminator , and its sequel , Terminator 2 : Judgment Day . Principal photography was primarily in New Orleans , with some in the on-screen setting of San Francisco . Six companies handled the film 's visual effects ; its prosthetic make-up and animatronics were created by Legacy Effects , a studio founded by Terminator veteran Stan Winston .   The film was released by Paramount Pictures on July 1 , 2015 , in standard digital format , RealD 3D , and IMAX 3D . Terminator Genisys was not well received by critics , who found the story and performances unsatisfactory , although Schwarzenegger 's return to the franchise was praised . It grossed over $ 440 million worldwide , making it the second-highest-grossing film of the franchise and Schwarzenegger 's career -LRB- after Terminator 2 : Judgment Day -RRB- .

evidence_da: William McKinley Jr. -LRB- January 29 , 1843 - September 14 , 1901 -RRB- var en amerikansk politiker og advokat, der fungerede som den 25. McKinley førte nationen til sejr i den spanske - Amerikanske krig , rejste beskyttende toldsatser for at fremme den amerikanske industri , og fastholdt nationen på guldstandarden i en afvisning af inflationære forslag .   McKinley var den sidste præsident, der havde tjent i den amerikanske borgerkrig , og den eneste, der har startet krigen som en hyret soldat , der begynder som en privat i Unionens hær og slutter som en midlertidig major . Efter krigen , slog han sig ned i Canton , Ohio , hvor han praktiserede jura og giftede sig med Ida Saxton . I 1876 blev han valgt til Kongressen , hvor han blev det republikanske partis ekspert i den beskyttende tarif , som han lovede ville skabe velstand . Hans McKinley Tariff fra 1890 var meget kontroversiel; som sammen med en demokratisk omfordeling havde til formål at gerrymandering ham ud af kontoret , førte til hans nederlag i den demokratiske jordskred i 1890 . Han blev valgt ohio 's guvernør i 1891 og 1893 , styre en moderat kurs mellem kapital og arbejdskraft interesser . Med hjælp fra sin nære rådgiver Mark Hanna , sikrede han den republikanske nominering til præsident i 1896 , midt i en dyb økonomisk depression . Han besejrede sin demokratiske rival, William Jennings Bryan , efter en front-veranda kampagne, hvor han gik ind for '' lyd penge '' -LRB- guldstandarden, medmindre ændret ved international aftale -RRB- og lovede, at høje takster ville genoprette velstanden .   Den hurtige økonomiske vækst markerede McKinleys formandskab . Han fremmede Dingley-tariffen fra 1897 for at beskytte producenter og fabriksarbejdere mod udenlandsk konkurrence , og i 1900 sikrede han sig vedtagelsen af Gold Standard Act . McKinley håbede at overtale Spanien til at give uafhængighed til oprørske Cuba uden konflikt , men da forhandlingerne mislykkedes , førte han nationen ind i den spanske - amerikanske krig i 1898 ; den amerikanske sejr var hurtig og afgørende . Som en del af fredsaftalen overgav Spanien til USA sine vigtigste oversøiske kolonier puertorico , Guam og Filippinerne ; Cuba blev lovet uafhængighed , men på det tidspunkt forblev under kontrol af den amerikanske hær . USA annekterede den uafhængige Republik Hawaii i 1898, og det blev et amerikansk territorium .   Historikere betragter McKinleys sejr i 1896 som et realigningsvalg , hvor stillingens politiske dødvande - borgerkrigen gav plads til det republikansk dominerede fjerdepartisystem , som begyndte med den progressive æra . McKinley besejrede Bryan igen i 1900 præsidentvalget , i en kampagne med fokus på imperialisme , protektionisme , og gratis sølv . September 1901 af Leon Czolgosz , en anden generation polsk-amerikansk med anarkistiske hælder ; McKinley døde otte dage senere , og blev efterfulgt af sin vicepræsident Theodore Roosevelt . Som en innovator af amerikansk interventionisme og pro-business følelser , McKinley 's formandskab er generelt betragtes over gennemsnittet , selv om hans universelt positive offentlige opfattelse blev snart overskygget af Roosevelt .
evidence_en: William McKinley Jr. -LRB- January 29 , 1843 -- September 14 , 1901 -RRB- was an American politician and lawyer who served as the 25th President of the United States from March 4 , 1897 until his assassination in September 1901 , six months into his second term . McKinley led the nation to victory in the Spanish -- American War , raised protective tariffs to promote American industry , and maintained the nation on the gold standard in a rejection of inflationary proposals .   McKinley was the last president to have served in the American Civil War , and the only one to have started the war as an enlisted soldier , beginning as a private in the Union Army and ending as a brevet major . After the war , he settled in Canton , Ohio , where he practiced law and married Ida Saxton . In 1876 , he was elected to Congress , where he became the Republican Party 's expert on the protective tariff , which he promised would bring prosperity . His 1890 McKinley Tariff was highly controversial ; which together with a Democratic redistricting aimed at gerrymandering him out of office , led to his defeat in the Democratic landslide of 1890 . He was elected Ohio 's governor in 1891 and 1893 , steering a moderate course between capital and labor interests . With the aid of his close adviser Mark Hanna , he secured the Republican nomination for president in 1896 , amid a deep economic depression . He defeated his Democratic rival , William Jennings Bryan , after a front-porch campaign in which he advocated `` sound money '' -LRB- the gold standard unless altered by international agreement -RRB- and promised that high tariffs would restore prosperity .   Rapid economic growth marked McKinley 's presidency . He promoted the 1897 Dingley Tariff to protect manufacturers and factory workers from foreign competition , and in 1900 , he secured the passage of the Gold Standard Act . McKinley hoped to persuade Spain to grant independence to rebellious Cuba without conflict , but when negotiation failed , he led the nation into the Spanish -- American War of 1898 ; the U.S. victory was quick and decisive . As part of the peace settlement , Spain turned over to the United States its main overseas colonies of Puerto Rico , Guam , and the Philippines ; Cuba was promised independence , but at that time remained under the control of the U.S. Army . The United States annexed the independent Republic of Hawaii in 1898 and it became a U.S. territory .   Historians regard McKinley 's 1896 victory as a realigning election , in which the political stalemate of the post -- Civil War era gave way to the Republican-dominated Fourth Party System , which began with the Progressive Era . McKinley defeated Bryan again in the 1900 presidential election , in a campaign focused on imperialism , protectionism , and free silver . However , his legacy was quickly cut short when he was shot on September 6 , 1901 by Leon Czolgosz , a second-generation Polish-American with anarchist leanings ; McKinley died eight days later , and was succeeded by his Vice President Theodore Roosevelt . As an innovator of American interventionism and pro-business sentiment , McKinley 's presidency is generally considered above average , though his universally positive public perception was soon overshadowed by Roosevelt .

evidence_da: Sindh -LSB- sיnd -RSB- -LRB- سنי ; -LSB- -RRB- er en af de fire provinser i Pakistan , i den sydøstlige del af landet . Historisk hjemsted for Sindhi-folket er det også lokalt kendt som Mehran . Det var tidligere kendt som Sind indtil 1956 . Sindh er den tredjestørste provins i Pakistan efter område , og næststørste provins efter befolkning efter Punjab . Sindh er omgivet af Balochistan-provinsen mod vest , og Punjab provinsen mod nord . Sindh grænser også op til de indiske stater Gujarat og Rajasthan mod øst og Det Arabiske Hav mod syd . Sindh 's landskab består for det meste af alluvial sletter flankerende Indus-floden , Thar ørkenen i den østlige del af provinsen tættest på grænsen til Indien, og Kirthar-bjergene i den vestlige del af Sindh . Sindh 's klima er kendt for varme somre og milde vintre . Provinshovedstaden I Sindh er Pakistans største by og finansielle knudepunkt , Karachi .   Sindh har Pakistans næststørste økonomi med Karachi er dens hovedstad, der er vært for hovedkvarteret for flere multinationale banker . Sindh er hjemsted for en stor del af Pakistans industrisektor og indeholder to af Pakistans kommercielle søhavne - Port Bin Qasim og Karachi Port . Resten af Sindh har en landbrugsbaseret økonomi og producerer frugt , fødevarer , forbrugsvarer og grøntsager til forbrug andre dele af landet . Sindh er også centrum for Pakistans farmaceutiske industri .   Sindh er kendt for sin særskilte kultur, som er stærkt påvirket af sufisme , en vigtig markør for Sindhi identitet for begge hinduer -LRB- Sindh har Pakistans højeste procentdel af hinduistiske beboere-RRB-. muslimer i provinsen. Flere vigtige Sufi helligdomme er placeret i hele provinsen, som tiltrækker millioner af årlige hengivne . Sindhs hovedstad, Karachi , er Pakistans mest etnisk mangfoldige by , med Muhajirs eller efterkommere af dem , der migrerede til Pakistan fra Indien efter 1947 og i hele 1950'erne og 1960'erne , og som udgør størstedelen af befolkningen . Karachi og andre bycentre i Sindh har oplevet etniske spændinger mellem de indfødte Sindhis og Muhajirs koge over i vold ved flere lejligheder . Sindh er hjemsted for to UNESCO World Heritage Sites - de historiske monumenter i Makli og de arkæologiske ruiner på Moenjodaro.
evidence_en: Sindh -LSB- sɪnd -RSB- -LRB- سنڌ ; -LSB- -RRB- is one of the four provinces of Pakistan , in the southeast of the country . Historically home to the Sindhi people , it is also locally known as the Mehran . It was formerly known as Sind until 1956 . Sindh is the third largest province of Pakistan by area , and second largest province by population after Punjab . Sindh is bordered by Balochistan province to the west , and Punjab province to the north . Sindh also borders the Indian states of Gujarat and Rajasthan to the east , and Arabian Sea to the south . Sindh 's landscape consists mostly of alluvial plains flanking the Indus River , the Thar desert in the eastern portion of the province closest to the border with India , and the Kirthar Mountains in the western part of Sindh . Sindh 's climate is noted for hot summers and mild winters . The provincial capital of Sindh is Pakistan 's largest city and financial hub , Karachi .   Sindh has Pakistan 's second largest economy with Karachi being its capital that hosts the headquarters of several multinational banks . Sindh is home to a large portion of Pakistan 's industrial sector and contains two of Pakistan 's commercial seaports -- Port Bin Qasim and the Karachi Port . The remainder of Sindh has an agriculture based economy , and produces fruit , food consumer items , and vegetables for the consumption other parts of the country . Sindh is also the centre of Pakistan 's pharmaceutical industry .   Sindh is known for its distinct culture which is strongly influenced by Sufism , an important marker of Sindhi identity for both Hindus -LRB- Sindh has Pakistan 's highest percentage of Hindu residents -RRB- . and Muslims in the province . Several important Sufi shrines are located throughout the province which attract millions of annual devotees . Sindh 's capital , Karachi , is Pakistan 's most ethnically diverse city , with Muhajirs , or descendants of those who migrated to Pakistan from India after 1947 and throughout the 1950s and 1960s , making up the majority of the population . Karachi and other urban centres of Sindh have seen ethnic tensions between the native Sindhis and the Muhajirs boil over into violence on several occasions . Sindh is home to two UNESCO World Heritage Sites - the Historical Monuments at Makli , and the Archaeological Ruins at Moenjodaro .

evidence_da: Leati Joseph '' Joe '' Anoa'i -LRB- født 25 maj , 1985 -RRB- er en amerikansk professionel wrestler , tidligere professionel canadisk fodboldspiller og medlem af Anoa'i familien . Han er underskrevet til WWE , hvor han udfører på Raw mærke under ringnavnet Roman Reigns .   Efter at have spillet kollegialt fodbold for Georgia Tech , Anoa'i startede sin professionelle fodboldkarriere med korte off-season stints med Minnesota Vikings og Jacksonville Jaguars af National Football League-LRB- NFL-RRB- i 2007 . Han spillede en hel sæson for den canadiske Football League 's-LRB- CFL -RRB- Edmonton Eskimos i 2008, før hans løsladelse og pensionering fra fodbold .   Anoa'i derefter forfulgte en karriere i professionel brydning og blev underskrevet af WWE i 2010 , rapportering til deres udviklingsmæssige område Florida Championship Wrestling -LRB- FCW -RRB- . Som romerske regeringstid , han fik sin vigtigste tjenesteliste debut i november 2012 sammen med Dean Ambrose og Seth Rollins som The Shield . Trioen gik sammen indtil juni 2014 , hvorefter Reigns deltog singler konkurrence . Reigns er en tre-tiden WWE World Heavyweight Champion , en engangs-USA Champion , en engangs WWE Tag Team Champion -LRB- med Rollins-RRB- , 2015 Royal Rumble vinder og 2014 Superstar of the Year . Han bandt også WWE rekord for de fleste elimineringer i en Survivor Series elimination match med fire i 2013 begivenhed og satte rekord for de fleste elimineringer i en Royal Rumble kamp med 12 i 2014 begivenhed .   Siden 2014 har WWE forsøgt at etablere Reigns som deres næste "" ansigt af selskabet ''. Reigns har overskriften flere store WWE pay-per-view begivenheder , herunder de sidste tre WrestleManias -LRB- 31, 32 og 33 -RRB- - scoring vinder over Triple H og Undertaker . Men regerer ' ascendancy som en verden titel-jagter / bedrift heroiske underdog har været præget af kritikernes misbilligelse og overvældende negative crowd reaktioner . Han blev derfor navngivet 2016 's' Most Hated Wrestler of the Year '' af Pro Wrestling Illustrated , bliver den første babyface wrestler at have været anerkendt som sådan, samt '' Mest overvurderet '' af Wrestling Observer Nyhedsbrev .
evidence_en: Leati Joseph `` Joe '' Anoaʻi -LRB- born May 25 , 1985 -RRB- is an American professional wrestler , former professional Canadian football player and a member of the Anoaʻi family . He is signed to WWE , where he performs on the Raw brand under the ring name Roman Reigns .   After playing collegiate football for Georgia Tech , Anoaʻi started his professional football career with brief off-season stints with the Minnesota Vikings and Jacksonville Jaguars of the National Football League -LRB- NFL -RRB- in 2007 . He then played a full season for the Canadian Football League 's -LRB- CFL -RRB- Edmonton Eskimos in 2008 before his release and retirement from football .   Anoaʻi then pursued a career in professional wrestling and was signed by WWE in 2010 , reporting to their developmental territory Florida Championship Wrestling -LRB- FCW -RRB- . As Roman Reigns , he made his main roster debut in November 2012 alongside Dean Ambrose and Seth Rollins as The Shield . The trio teamed together until June 2014 , after which Reigns entered singles competition . Reigns is a three-time WWE World Heavyweight Champion , a one-time United States Champion , a one-time WWE Tag Team Champion -LRB- with Rollins -RRB- , the 2015 Royal Rumble winner and the 2014 Superstar of the Year . He also tied the WWE record for most eliminations in a Survivor Series elimination match with four in the 2013 event and set the record for most eliminations in a Royal Rumble match with 12 in the 2014 event .   Since 2014 , WWE has attempted to establish Reigns as their next `` face of the company '' . Reigns has headlined multiple major WWE pay-per-view events , including the last three WrestleManias -LRB- 31 , 32 and 33 -RRB- -- scoring wins over Triple H and The Undertaker . However , Reigns ' ascendancy as a world title-chasing/holding heroic underdog has been marked by critics ' disapproval and overwhelmingly negative crowd reactions . He was consequently named 2016 's `` Most Hated Wrestler of the Year '' by Pro Wrestling Illustrated , becoming the first babyface wrestler to have been recognized as such , as well as the `` Most Overrated '' by Wrestling Observer Newsletter .

evidence_da: Marcus David Maron -LRB- -LSB- født September 27 , 1963 -RRB- er en amerikansk stand-up komiker , podcaster , forfatter , skuespiller , musiker , instruktør , og producent .   Han har været vært for The Marc Maron Show og co-host af både Morning Sedition og Breakroom Live , alle politisk orienterede shows produceret af Air America Media . Han var vært Comedy Central 's Short Attention Span Theater i et år, der erstatter Jon Stewart . Maron var en hyppig gæst på Late Show med David Letterman og lavede mere end fyrre optrædener på Late Night med Conan O'Brien , mere end nogen anden standup performer. Han var også en regelmæssig gæst på Tough Crowd med Colin Quinn og var vært for den kortlivede amerikanske version af det britiske spil show Never Mind the Buzzcocks på VH1 .   I september 2009 , Maron begyndte at være vært for en to gange om ugen podcast med titlen WTF med Marc Maron, hvor han interviews komikere og berømtheder . Højdepunkter har inkluderet Conan O'Brien , Robin Williams , og en episode med Louis KK, der blev bedømt # 1 podcast episode af hele tiden af Skifer magasin . I juni 2015 , Maron interviewet usa's præsident , Barack Obama , på hans podcast studie og hjem , i Highland Park , Los Angeles , Californien .   Fra 2013 til 2016 medvirkede han i sin egen TV-komedieserie , Maron , maron , som han også fungerede som executive producer og lejlighedsvis forfatter .
evidence_en: Marcus David Maron -LRB- -LSB- ˈmærən -RSB- ; born September 27 , 1963 -RRB- is an American stand-up comedian , podcaster , writer , actor , musician , director , and producer .   He has been host of The Marc Maron Show and co-host of both Morning Sedition and Breakroom Live , all politically oriented shows produced by Air America Media . He hosted Comedy Central 's Short Attention Span Theater for a year , replacing Jon Stewart . Maron was a frequent guest on the Late Show with David Letterman and made more than forty appearances on Late Night with Conan O'Brien , more than any other standup performer . He was also a regular guest on Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn and hosted the short-lived American version of the British game show Never Mind the Buzzcocks on VH1 .   In September 2009 , Maron began hosting a twice-weekly podcast titled WTF with Marc Maron in which he interviews comedians and celebrities . Highlights have included Conan O'Brien , Robin Williams , and an episode with Louis C.K. that was rated the # 1 podcast episode of all time by Slate magazine . In June 2015 , Maron interviewed the President of the United States , Barack Obama , at his podcast studio and home , in Highland Park , Los Angeles , California .   From 2013 to 2016 , he starred in his own IFC television comedy series , Maron , for which he also served as executive producer and occasional writer .

evidence_da: Red Hot Chili Peppers , også undertiden forkortet til Chili Peppers eller forkortet som RHCP , er en amerikansk alternativ rock / funk rock band dannet i Los Angeles i 1983 . Gruppens musikalske stil består primært af rock med vægt på funk , samt elementer fra andre genrer såsom punk rock og psykedelisk rock . Når spillet live , deres musik indeholder elementer af marmelade band på grund af den improviserede karakter af en stor del af deres forestillinger . I øjeblikket , bandet består af stiftende medlemmer vokalist Anthony Kiedis og bassist Flea , mangeårige trommeslager Chad Smith , og tidligere touring guitarist Josh Klinghoffer . Red Hot Chili Peppers er en af de bedst sælgende bands gennem tiderne med over 80 millioner solgte plader på verdensplan , er blevet nomineret til seksten Grammy Awards , hvoraf de har vundet seks - og er det mest succesfulde band i alternative rock radio historie - i øjeblikket holder optegnelser for de fleste nummer et singler -LRB- 13 -RRB-, mest kumulative uger som nummer et -LRB- 85 -RRB- og de fleste top-ti sange -LRB- 25 -RRB- på Billboard Alternative Songs chart . I 2012 blev de optaget i Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .   Bandets oprindelige line-up , oprindeligt opkaldt Tony Flow og mirakuløst Majestic Masters of Mayhem , featured guitarist Hillel Slovakisk og trommeslager Jack Irons , sammen med Kiedis og Flea . På grund af forpligtelser til andre bands , har slovakker og Irons ikke spillet på bandets selvbetitlede debutalbum -LRB- 1984 -RRB- . Slovakisk udført på andet og tredje album , Freaky Styley -LRB- 1985 -RRB- og The Uplift Mofo Party Plan -LRB- 1987 -RRB-, men han døde af en heroin overdosis i 1988 . Som et resultat af sin vens død valgte Irons at forlade gruppen . Efter kortvarige udskiftninger på guitar og trommer , John Frusciante og Chad Smith tiltrådte i 1988 . Line-up af Flea , Kiedis , Frusciante , og Smith var den længstvarende og indspillede fem studiealbum begynder med Mother 's Milk -LRB- 1989 -RRB- . I 1990 skrev gruppen kontrakt med Warner Bros. . Plader og indspillede albummet Blood Sugar Sex Magik -LRB- 1991 -RRB- under producer Rick Rubin . Dette album blev bandets første kommercielle succes , men Frusciante blev utilpas med det og forlod brat i 1992 i midten af Blood Sugar Sex Magik Tour .   Efter to midlertidige guitarister , Dave Navarro sluttede sig til gruppen i 1993 og spillede på deres efterfølgende album , One Hot Minute -LRB- 1995 -RRB- . Selv om det er kommercielt vellykket , kunne albummet ikke matche den kritiske eller populære anerkendelse af Blood Sugar Sex Magik , der solgte mindre end halvt så meget som sin forgænger . Navarro blev fyret fra bandet i 1998 . Frusciante , frisk ud af rehabilitering af narkotika , vendte tilbage til bandet samme år på Flea 's anmodning. Den genforenede kvartet vendte tilbage til studiet for at optage Californication -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , som blev bandets største kommercielle succes med 16 millioner eksemplarer på verdensplan . Dette album blev efterfulgt tre år senere af By the Way -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , og derefter fire år senere af det dobbelte album Stadium Arcadium -LRB- 2006 -RRB-, deres første nummer et album i Amerika . Efter en verdensturné gik gruppen på en udvidet pause. Frusciante meddelte, at han var i mindelighed forlader bandet i 2009 for at fokusere på sin solo karriere . Klinghoffer , der havde arbejdet både som sidemand for bandet på deres Stadium Arcadium tour og på Frusciante 's solo projekter , erstattet ham . Bandets tiende studiealbum , I'm with You , blev udgivet i 2011 og toppede hitlisterne i 18 forskellige lande . Bandet udgav deres ellevte studiealbum , The Getaway , i 2016 . Albummet blev produceret af Danger Mouse , der markerer første gang siden 1989 's Mother 's Milk, at Red Hot Chili Peppers ikke havde arbejdet med Rubin , og toppede hitlisterne i ti forskellige lande .
evidence_en: Red Hot Chili Peppers , also sometimes shortened to The Chili Peppers or abbreviated as RHCP , are an American alternative rock/funk rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1983 . The group 's musical style primarily consists of rock with an emphasis on funk , as well as elements from other genres such as punk rock and psychedelic rock . When played live , their music incorporates elements of jam band due to the improvised nature of much of their performances . Currently , the band consists of founding members vocalist Anthony Kiedis and bassist Flea , longtime drummer Chad Smith , and former touring guitarist Josh Klinghoffer . Red Hot Chili Peppers are one of the best-selling bands of all time with over 80 million records sold worldwide , have been nominated for sixteen Grammy Awards , of which they have won six , and are the most successful band in alternative rock radio history , currently holding the records for most number-one singles -LRB- 13 -RRB- , most cumulative weeks at number one -LRB- 85 -RRB- and most top-ten songs -LRB- 25 -RRB- on the Billboard Alternative Songs chart . In 2012 , they were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .   The band 's original line-up , originally named Tony Flow and the Miraculously Majestic Masters of Mayhem , featured guitarist Hillel Slovak and drummer Jack Irons , alongside Kiedis and Flea . Because of commitments to other bands , Slovak and Irons did not play on the band 's self-titled debut album -LRB- 1984 -RRB- . Slovak performed on the second and third albums , Freaky Styley -LRB- 1985 -RRB- and The Uplift Mofo Party Plan -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , but he died from a heroin overdose in 1988 . As a result of his friend 's death , Irons chose to leave the group . After short-lived replacements at guitar and drums , John Frusciante and Chad Smith joined in 1988 . The line-up of Flea , Kiedis , Frusciante , and Smith was the longest-lasting and recorded five studio albums beginning with Mother 's Milk -LRB- 1989 -RRB- . In 1990 , the group signed with Warner Bros. . Records and recorded the album Blood Sugar Sex Magik -LRB- 1991 -RRB- under producer Rick Rubin . This album became the band 's first commercial success , but Frusciante grew uncomfortable with it and left abruptly in 1992 in the middle of the Blood Sugar Sex Magik Tour .   After two temporary guitarists , Dave Navarro joined the group in 1993 and played on their subsequent album , One Hot Minute -LRB- 1995 -RRB- . Although commercially successful , the album failed to match the critical or popular acclaim of Blood Sugar Sex Magik , selling less than half as much as its predecessor . Navarro was fired from the band in 1998 . Frusciante , fresh out of drug rehabilitation , rejoined the band that same year at Flea 's request . The reunited quartet returned to the studio to record Californication -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , which became the band 's biggest commercial success with 16 million copies worldwide . That album was followed three years later by By the Way -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , and then four years later by the double album Stadium Arcadium -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , their first number-one album in America . After a world tour , the group went on an extended hiatus . Frusciante announced he was amicably leaving the band in 2009 to focus on his solo career . Klinghoffer , who had worked both as a sideman for the band on their Stadium Arcadium tour and on Frusciante 's solo projects , replaced him . The band 's tenth studio album , I 'm with You , was released in 2011 and topped the charts in 18 different countries . The band released their eleventh studio album , The Getaway , in 2016 . The album was produced by Danger Mouse , marking the first time since 1989 's Mother 's Milk that the Red Hot Chili Peppers had not worked with Rubin , and topped the charts in ten different countries .

evidence_da: Alphonse Gabriel Capone -LRB- -LSB- æl_kəיpoķn -RSB- January 17 , 1899 -- January 25 , 1947 -RRB- , undertiden kendt under tilnavnet Scarface , var en amerikansk gangster, der opnåede berømmelse under forbudsæraen som medstifter og chef for Chicago Outfit . Hans syv-årige regeringstid som kriminalitet boss sluttede, da han var 33 år gammel .   Capone blev født i Brooklyn i New York City til italienske indvandrere . Han blev betragtet som en Five Points Gang medlem, der blev en udsmider i organiseret kriminalitet lokaler såsom bordeller . I begyndelsen af tyverne flyttede han til Chicago og blev bodyguard og stolede factotum for Johnny Torrio , leder af et kriminelt syndikat, der ulovligt leverede alkohol - forløberen for Outfit - og det var politisk beskyttet gennem Unione Siciliana . En konflikt med North Side Gang var medvirkende til Capone 's stigning og fald . Torrio gik på pension efter North Side bevæbnede mænd næsten dræbte ham , overdrage kontrol til Capone . Capone udvidet bootlegging forretning gennem stadig mere voldelige midler, men hans gensidigt rentable relationer med borgmester William Hale Thompson og byens politi betød, at Capone syntes sikkert fra retshåndhævelse .   Capone tilsyneladende svælgede i opmærksomhed, såsom jubel fra tilskuere, da han dukkede op på boldspil . Han gav donationer til forskellige velgørende organisationer og blev af mange anset for at være en '' moderne Robin Hood ''. Men Saint Valentine 's Day Massacre af banderivaler , hvilket resulterer i drabet på syv mænd ved højlys dag , beskadiget Chicago 's image - samt Capone 's - hvilket får indflydelsesrige borgere til at kræve statslig handling og aviser til at narre ham '' Public Enemy Nr. 1 '' .   De føderale myndigheder blev opsat på at fængsle Capone , og de retsforfølgede ham for skatteunddragelse i 1931 , en føderal forbrydelse og en ny strategi i den æra . Under den meget omtalte sag , indrømmede dommeren som bevis Capone 's indlæggelser af hans indkomst og ubetalte skatter under tidligere-LRB- og i sidste ende mislykkede-RRB- forhandlinger til at betale regeringen nogen tilbage skatter , han skyldte . Capone blev dømt og idømt 11 års fængsel. Efter domfældelsen erstattede han sit gamle forsvar med eksperter i skatteret , og hans begrundelse for appel blev styrket af en højesteretsafgørelse , men hans appel mislykkedes i sidste ende .   Han var allerede viser tegn på syfilitisk demens tidligt i sin sætning , og han blev mere og mere svækkede, før de blev løsladt efter otte år . Januar 25 , 1947 , Capone døde af hjertestop efter at have lidt et slagtilfælde .
evidence_en: Alphonse Gabriel Capone -LRB- -LSB- æl_kəˈpoʊn -RSB- January 17 , 1899 -- January 25 , 1947 -RRB- , sometimes known by the nickname Scarface , was an American gangster who attained fame during the Prohibition era as the co-founder and boss of the Chicago Outfit . His seven-year reign as crime boss ended when he was 33 years old .   Capone was born in Brooklyn in New York City to Italian immigrants . He was considered a Five Points Gang member who became a bouncer in organized crime premises such as brothels . In his early twenties , he moved to Chicago and became bodyguard and trusted factotum for Johnny Torrio , head of a criminal syndicate that illegally supplied alcohol -- the forerunner of the Outfit -- and that was politically protected through the Unione Siciliana . A conflict with the North Side Gang was instrumental in Capone 's rise and fall . Torrio went into retirement after North Side gunmen almost killed him , handing control to Capone . Capone expanded the bootlegging business through increasingly violent means , but his mutually profitable relationships with mayor William Hale Thompson and the city 's police meant that Capone seemed safe from law enforcement .   Capone apparently reveled in attention , such as the cheers from spectators when he appeared at ball games . He made donations to various charities and was viewed by many to be a `` modern-day Robin Hood '' . However , the Saint Valentine 's Day Massacre of gang rivals , resulting in the killing of seven men in broad daylight , damaged Chicago 's image -- as well as Capone 's -- leading influential citizens to demand governmental action and newspapers to dub him `` Public Enemy No. 1 '' .   The federal authorities became intent on jailing Capone , and they prosecuted him for tax evasion in 1931 , a federal crime and a novel strategy during the era . During the highly publicized case , the judge admitted as evidence Capone 's admissions of his income and unpaid taxes during prior -LRB- and ultimately abortive -RRB- negotiations to pay the government any back taxes he owed . Capone was convicted and sentenced to 11 years in federal prison . After conviction , he replaced his old defense team with experts in tax law , and his grounds for appeal were strengthened by a Supreme Court ruling , but his appeal ultimately failed .   He was already showing signs of syphilitic dementia early in his sentence , and he became increasingly debilitated before being released after eight years . On January 25 , 1947 , Capone died of cardiac arrest after suffering a stroke .

evidence_da: Neymar da Silva Santos Júnior -LRB- -LSB- nejיmaי dיsiwvיsķ̃tus יייייייייייייייי -RSB- ; født 5 Februar 1992 -RRB-, almindeligvis kendt som Neymar eller Neymar Jr. , er en brasiliansk professionel fodboldspiller, der spiller som angriber for den spanske klub FC Barcelona og Brasilienlandshold .   Neymar kom i forgrunden i en tidlig alder på Santos , hvor han fik sin professionelle debut i alderen 17 . Han hjalp klubben vinde to på hinanden følgende Campeonato Paulista mesterskaber , en Copa do Brasil , og 2011 Copa Libertadores , Santos 'første kontinentale titel siden 1963 . Neymar blev to gange kåret som den sydamerikanske fodboldspiller of the Year , i 2011 og 2012 , før han flyttede til Europa for at slutte sig til Barcelona . Som en del af Barça 's angribende trio med Lionel Messi og Luis Suárez , han vandt den kontinentale diskant af La Liga , Copa del Rey , og UEFA Champions League i 2014 - 15 sæsonen , efterfulgt det næste år af den indenlandske dobbelt . Han blev nummer tre for FIFA Ballon d'Or i 2015 .   Med 52 mål i 77 kampe for Brasilien siden debut i en alder af 18 , Neymar er den fjerde-højeste målscorer for sit landshold . Han var en nøglespiller i Brasiliens sejre ved South American Youth Championship 2011 , som han sluttede som den førende målscorer , og 2013 FIFA Confederations Cup , hvor han vandt Golden Ball som spiller i turneringen . Hans deltagelse i 2014 FIFA World Cup og 2015 Copa América blev afkortet af henholdsvis skade og en suspension , men det næste år han kaptajn Brasilien til deres første olympiske guldmedalje i mænds fodbold ved Sommer-OL 2016 .   Kendt for sin drible, efterbehandling, og evne med begge fødder , Neymar har tjent sammenligninger med tidligere Brasilien og Santos frem Pelé . Uden for banen , han rangerer blandt verdens mest fremtrædende sportsfolk ; SportsPro kaldte ham den mest salgbare atlet i verden i 2012 og 2013 , og ESPN citerede ham som verdens fjerdemest berømte atlet i 2016 .
evidence_en: Neymar da Silva Santos Júnior -LRB- -LSB- nejˈmaʁ dɐ ˈsiwvɐ ˈsɐ̃tus ˈʒũɲoʁ -RSB- ; born 5 February 1992 -RRB- , commonly known as Neymar or Neymar Jr. , is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Spanish club FC Barcelona and the Brazil national team .   Neymar came into prominence at an early age at Santos , where he made his professional debut aged 17 . He helped the club win two successive Campeonato Paulista championships , a Copa do Brasil , and the 2011 Copa Libertadores , Santos ' first continental title since 1963 . Neymar was twice named the South American Footballer of the Year , in 2011 and 2012 , before relocating to Europe to join Barcelona . As part of Barça 's attacking trio with Lionel Messi and Luis Suárez , he won the continental treble of La Liga , the Copa del Rey , and the UEFA Champions League in the 2014 -- 15 season , followed the next year by the domestic double . He came third for the FIFA Ballon d'Or in 2015 .   With 52 goals in 77 matches for Brazil since debuting at age 18 , Neymar is the fourth-highest goalscorer for his national team . He was a key player in Brazil 's victories at the 2011 South American Youth Championship , which he finished as the leading goalscorer , and the 2013 FIFA Confederations Cup , where he won the Golden Ball as player of the tournament . His participation in the 2014 FIFA World Cup and 2015 Copa América was cut short by injury and a suspension respectively , but the next year he captained Brazil to their first Olympic gold medal in men 's football at the 2016 Summer Olympics .   Known for his dribbling , finishing , and ability with both feet , Neymar has earned comparisons to former Brazil and Santos forward Pelé . Off the pitch , he ranks among the world 's most prominent sportsmen ; SportsPro named him the most marketable athlete in the world in 2012 and 2013 , and ESPN cited him as the world 's fourth-most famous athlete in 2016 .

evidence_da: Ajay Devgan -LRB- født Vishal Veeru Devgan den 2. Han er bredt betragtet som en af de mest populære aktører i Hindi biograf , der har optrådt i over hundrede Hindi film . Devgan har vundet adskillige udmærkelser , herunder to National Film Awards og fire Filmfare Awards . I 2016 blev han hædret af den indiske regering med Padma Shri , den fjerdehøjeste civile ære i landet .   Devgan begyndte sin professionelle karriere med Phool Aur Kaante i 1991 og modtog en Filmfare Award for bedste mandlige debut for sin præstation . Han medvirkede derefter i succesfulde film som Jigar -LRB- 1992 -RRB- , Dilwale -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , Suhaag -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , Naajayaz -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , Diljale -LRB- 1996 -RRB- og Ishq -LRB- 1997 -RRB- . I 1998 optrådte han i en kritikerrost præstation i Mahesh Bhatts drama Zakhm , og han modtog sin første National Film Award for bedste mandlige hovedrolle for sin rolle i filmen . I 1999 , hans mest omtalte film var Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam, hvor han spillede Vanraj , en mand, der forsøger at forene sin kone med sin elsker .   I begyndelsen af 2000'erne gav han kritikerroste forestillinger i Ram Gopal Varma 's fiktive eksponere af Mumbai underverden Company . Han spillede karakter af en gangster , som han vandt Filmfare Critics Award for bedste mandlige hovedrolle . Samme år gav han en anden kritikerroste præstation i Deewangee, som han modtog Filmfare Best Villain Award . I 2003 vandt han sin anden National Film Award for bedste mandlige hovedrolle for sin skildring af Bhagat Singh i Rajkumar Santoshi 's biopic The Legend of Bhagat Singh . Gennem hele sin karriere har han optrådt i mange kritisk og kommercielt succesfulde film, herunder Raincoat -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , '' Gangajal , -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , Yuva -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , Apaharan -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , Omkara -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Golmaal: 2006 -RRB-, Golmaal Returns -LRB- 2008 -RRB-, Alle de bedste: Sjov Begynder -LRB- 2009 -RRB-, Once Upon a Time i Mumbaai -LRB- 2010 -RRB-, Golmaal 3 --LRB- 2010 -RRB-, Raajneeti -LRB- 2010 -RRB-, Singham -LRB- 2011 -RRB-, Bachchan -LRB- 2012 -RRB-, Søn af Sardaar -LR B- 2012 -RRB- , Singham Returns -LRB- 2014 -RRB- og Drishyam -LRB- 2015 -RRB- . Han har medvirket i mere end hundrede Hindi film . Efter at have gjort det , etablerede han sig som en af de førende aktører i Hindi biograf .   Derudover ejer Devgn et produktionsselskab Ajay Devgn FFilms , som blev etableret i 2000 . I 2008 debuterede han som filminstruktør hos U Me Aur Hum . Han er gift med film skuespillerinde , Kajol siden 1999 og parret har to børn . I august 2009 ændrede Devgn sit efternavn fra Devgan til Devgn på anmodning af sin familie .
evidence_en: Ajay Devgan -LRB- born Vishal Veeru Devgan on 2 April 1969 -RRB- , also credited as Ajay Devgn , is an Indian film actor , director and producer . He is widely considered as one of the most popular actors of Hindi cinema , who has appeared in over a hundred Hindi films . Devgan has won numerous accolades , including two National Film Awards and four Filmfare Awards . In 2016 , he was honoured by the Government of India with the Padma Shri , the fourth highest civilian honour of the country .   Devgan began his professional career with Phool Aur Kaante in 1991 and received a Filmfare Award for Best Male Debut for his performance . He then starred in successful films such as Jigar -LRB- 1992 -RRB- , Dilwale -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , Suhaag -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , Naajayaz -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , Diljale -LRB- 1996 -RRB- and Ishq -LRB- 1997 -RRB- . In 1998 , he appeared in a critically acclaimed performance in Mahesh Bhatt 's drama Zakhm and he received his first National Film Award for Best Actor for his role in the movie . In 1999 , his most-talked-about film was Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam in which he played Vanraj , a man who tries to unite his wife with her lover .   In the early 2000s , he gave critically acclaimed performances in Ram Gopal Varma 's fictional expose of Mumbai underworld Company . He played the character of a gangster , for which he won Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actor . The same year he gave another critically acclaimed performance in Deewangee for which he received the Filmfare Best Villain Award . In 2003 , he won his second National Film Award for Best Actor for his portrayal of Bhagat Singh in Rajkumar Santoshi 's biopic The Legend of Bhagat Singh . Throughout his career he has performed in many critically and commercially successful films including Raincoat -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , '' Gangajal , -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , Yuva -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , Apaharan -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , Omkara -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Golmaal : Fun Unlimited -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Golmaal Returns -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , All the Best : Fun Begins -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Golmaal 3 -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Raajneeti -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Singham -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , Bol Bachchan -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Son of Sardaar -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Singham Returns -LRB- 2014 -RRB- and Drishyam -LRB- 2015 -RRB- . He has starred in more than hundred Hindi films . Having done so , he established himself as one of the leading actors of Hindi cinema .   In addition , Devgn owns a production company Ajay Devgn FFilms which was established in 2000 . In 2008 , he debuted as a film director with U Me Aur Hum . He is married to film actress , Kajol since 1999 and the couple have two children . In August 2009 , Devgn changed his surname from Devgan to Devgn on the request of his family .

evidence_da: Daft Punk er en fransk elektronisk musik duo dannet i 1993 af Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo og Thomas Bangalter . Duoen opnåede betydelig popularitet i slutningen af 1990'erne som en del af den franske husbevægelse og havde fortsat succes i årene efter , der kombinerer elementer af husmusik med funk , techno , disco , rockmusik og synthpop påvirkninger . De er også kendt for deres visuelle stilisering og forklædninger forbundet med deres musik; duoen har båret udsmykkede hjelme og handsker til at påtage sig robot personas i de fleste af deres offentlige optrædener siden 2001 og sjældent give interviews eller vises på tv . Duoen blev forvaltet fra 1996 til 2008 af Pedro Winter -LRB- også kendt som Busy P-RRB- , lederen af Ed Banger Records .   Bangalter og de Homem-Christo var oprindeligt kortvarigt i et indie rockband ved navn Darlin ' . Da gruppen gik i opløsning , overlod den de to til at eksperimentere musikalsk med trommemaskiner og synthesizere . Duoen udgav deres debut studiealbum Homework through Virgin Records i 1997 til meget positive anmeldelser . Duoens næste album Discovery -LRB- 2001 -RRB - var endnu mere vellykket , drevet af udgivelsen af hitsinglerne '' One More Time '', '' Digital Love '' og '' Harder , Better , Faster , Stærkere ''. I marts 2005 udgav duoen deres tredje album Human After All til blandede anmeldelser . Singlerne »Robot Rock« og »Technologic« opnåede imidlertid betydelig succes i Det Forenede Kongerige .   Daft Punk turnerede i hele 2006 og 2007 og udgav livealbummet Alive 2007 , som vandt en Grammy Award for Bedste Elektronisk / Dance Album . Duoen komponerede senere scoren for Disney-filmen Tron : Legacy i 2010 , og udgav sit soundtrackalbum samme år . I januar 2013 forlod Daft Punk Virgin for Columbia Records og udgav deres næste album Random Access Memories i 2013 til verdensomspændende kritikerros . Albummets leadsingle '' Get Lucky '' blev en international succes , der toppede på top 10-hitlister i 32 lande . Random Access Memories vandt fem Grammy Awards i 2014 , herunder Album of the Year og Record of the Year for '' Get Lucky ''. Daft Punk fik senere deres første nummer et på Billboard Hot 100 med sangen '' Starboy '', et samarbejde med The Weeknd .
evidence_en: Daft Punk are a French electronic music duo formed in 1993 by Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo and Thomas Bangalter . The duo achieved significant popularity in the late 1990s as part of the French house movement and had continuous success in the years following , combining elements of house music with funk , techno , disco , rock music and synthpop influences . They are also known for their visual stylization and disguises associated with their music ; the duo have worn ornate helmets and gloves to assume robot personas in most of their public appearances since 2001 and rarely grant interviews or appear on television . The duo were managed from 1996 to 2008 by Pedro Winter -LRB- also known as Busy P -RRB- , the head of Ed Banger Records .   Bangalter and de Homem-Christo were originally briefly in an indie rock band named Darlin ' . When the group disbanded , it left the two to experiment musically with drum machines and synthesisers . The duo released their debut studio album Homework through Virgin Records in 1997 to highly positive reviews . The duo 's next album Discovery -LRB- 2001 -RRB- was even more successful , driven by the release of the hit singles `` One More Time '' , `` Digital Love '' and `` Harder , Better , Faster , Stronger '' . In March 2005 , the duo released their third album Human After All to mixed reviews . However , the singles `` Robot Rock '' and `` Technologic '' achieved considerable success in the United Kingdom .   Daft Punk toured throughout 2006 and 2007 and released the live album Alive 2007 , which won a Grammy Award for Best Electronic/Dance Album . The duo later composed the score for the Disney film Tron : Legacy in 2010 , and released its soundtrack album that same year . In January 2013 , Daft Punk left Virgin for Columbia Records , and released their next album Random Access Memories in 2013 to worldwide critical acclaim . The album 's lead single `` Get Lucky '' became an international success , peaking on top 10 charts in 32 countries . Random Access Memories won five Grammy Awards in 2014 , including Album of the Year and Record of the Year for `` Get Lucky '' . Daft Punk later gained their first number one on the Billboard Hot 100 with the song `` Starboy '' , a collaboration with The Weeknd .

evidence_da: Kimberly '' Kim '' Kardashian West -LRB-født Kimberly Noel Kardashian ; 21 oktober , 1980 -RRB- er en amerikansk reality tv-personlighed , socialite , skuespiller , forretningskvinde og model . Kardashian først fik mediernes opmærksomhed som en ven og stylist af Paris Hilton, men fik bredere varsel efter en 2003 sex tape med sin tidligere kæreste Ray J blev lækket i 2007 . Senere samme år , hun og hendes familie begyndte at dukke op i E! reality tv-serie Holde op med Kardashians . Dens succes snart førte til oprettelsen af spin-offs herunder Kourtney og Kim Take New York og Kourtney og Khloé Take Miami . Kardashian 's personlige liv blev hurtigt genstand for udbredt medieopmærksomhed .   I de seneste år har Kardashian vokset en indflydelsesrig online og sociale medier tilstedeværelse , herunder snesevis af millioner af tilhængere på Twitter og Instagram . Hun har udgivet en række produkter bundet til hendes navn , herunder den vellykkede 2014 mobile spil Kim Kardashian : Hollywood , en række tøj og produkter , og 2015 fotobog Selfish . Hendes forhold til rapperen Kanye West har også fået betydelig mediedækning ; parret blev gift i 2014, og de har to børn sammen.   Time Magazine inkluderede Kardashian på deres liste over 2015 's 100 mest indflydelsesrige mennesker, mens Vogue beskrev hende i 2016 som et '' popkulturfænomen. '' Kritikere og beundrere har beskrevet hende som eksemplificere begrebet at være berømt for at være berømt . Hun blev rapporteret at være den højest betalte reality tv-personlighed i 2015 , med hendes samlede indtjening overstiger US $ 53 millioner .
evidence_en: Kimberly `` Kim '' Kardashian West -LRB- born Kimberly Noel Kardashian ; October 21 , 1980 -RRB- is an American reality television personality , socialite , actress , businesswoman and model . Kardashian first gained media attention as a friend and stylist of Paris Hilton , but received wider notice after a 2003 sex tape with her former boyfriend Ray J was leaked in 2007 . Later that year , she and her family began to appear in the E! reality television series Keeping Up with the Kardashians . Its success soon led to the creation of spin-offs including Kourtney and Kim Take New York and Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami . Kardashian 's personal life soon became subject to widespread media attention .   In recent years , Kardashian has grown an influential online and social media presence , including tens of millions of followers on Twitter and Instagram . She has released a variety of products tied to her name , including the successful 2014 mobile game Kim Kardashian : Hollywood , a variety of clothing and products , and the 2015 photo book Selfish . Her relationship with rapper Kanye West has also received significant media coverage ; the couple married in 2014 and they have two children together .   Time magazine included Kardashian on their list of 2015 's 100 most influential people , while Vogue described her in 2016 as a `` pop culture phenomenon . '' Critics and admirers have described her as exemplifying the notion of being famous for being famous . She was reported to be the highest-paid reality television personality of 2015 , with her total earnings exceeding US$ 53 million .
