evidence_da: Indtil Dawn er et interaktivt drama survival horror adventure videospil udviklet af Supermassive Games og udgivet af Sony Computer Entertainment til PlayStation 4 . Det var oprindeligt planlagt til at blive frigivet på PlayStation 3 og funktionen PlayStation Move support, men i august 2014 spillet blev genindført som en PlayStation 4 eksklusiv , og blev udgivet over hele verden i august 2015 .   Set i det vestlige Canada , Indtil Dawn centre omkring en gruppe på otte teenagere, der beslutter at ferie for en nat i en hytte på den fiktive Blackwood Mountain , præcis et år efter forsvinden af to piger , tvillingesøstrene af et medlem af deres gruppe . Kort efter ankomsten , banden befinder sig under angreb af en psykopat, og skal forsøge at overleve indtil solopgang . Gennem hele eventyret skifter spillerne mellem alle otte tegn , træffer kritiske beslutninger , efterhånden som historien skrider frem , hvilket drastisk påvirker spillets resultat , hvilket fører til hundredvis af forskellige scenarier .   Indtil Dawn blev mødt med en positiv kritisk reaktion ved udgivelsen , med ros rettet mod det visuelle , ' valg ' mekaniker, horror elementer, musik, tegn, stemme skuespil , og gameplay design . Det meste af kritikken spillet trak vedrørte den anden halvdel af historien , kameravinkler, karakter bevægelse, og spillets delvist lineærplot .
evidence_en: Until Dawn is an interactive drama survival horror adventure video game developed by Supermassive Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation 4 . It was originally scheduled to be released on the PlayStation 3 and feature PlayStation Move support , but in August 2014 the game was reintroduced as a PlayStation 4 exclusive , and was released worldwide in August 2015 .   Set in Western Canada , Until Dawn centers around a group of eight teenagers who decide to vacation for a night in a cabin on the fictional Blackwood Mountain , exactly one year after the disappearance of two girls , the twin sisters of a member of their group . Shortly after arriving , the gang find themselves under attack by a psychopath , and must attempt to survive until sunrise . Throughout the adventure , players alternate between all eight characters , making critical decisions as the story advances which drastically affects the game 's outcome , leading to hundreds of different scenarios .   Until Dawn was met with a positive critical response upon release , with praise directed at the visuals , ` choice ' mechanic , horror elements , music , characters , voice acting , and gameplay design . Most of the criticism the game drew concerned the second half of the story , the camera angles , character movement , and the game 's partially linear plot .

evidence_da: Kill Bill : Bind 2 er en amerikansk kampsportfilm fra 2004 skrevet og instrueret af Quentin Tarantino . Det stjerner Uma Thurman som Bride , der fortsætter sin kampagne for hævn mod Deadly Viper Assassination Squad-LRB- Lucy Liu , Michael Madsen , Daryl Hannah og Vivica A. Fox -RRB- og deres leder Bill-LRB- David Carradine-RRB-, der forsøgte at dræbe hende og hendes unb eller norbarn.   Tarantino udtænkt Kill Bill som en hyldest til '' grindhouse '' biograf, herunder kampsport film, samurai biograf, blaxploitation film, og spaghetti westerns . Det er den anden af to Kill Bill film produceret samtidig; den første , Kill Bill : Bind 1 , blev udgivet i 2003 . Filmene blev oprindeligt sat til en enkelt udgivelse , men filmen , med en runtime på over fire timer , blev delt i to . Ligesom bind 1 fik bind 2 positive anmeldelser og var en kommerciel succes .
evidence_en: Kill Bill : Volume 2 is a 2004 American martial arts film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino . It stars Uma Thurman as the Bride , who continues her campaign of revenge against the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad -LRB- Lucy Liu , Michael Madsen , Daryl Hannah and Vivica A. Fox -RRB- and their leader Bill -LRB- David Carradine -RRB- , who tried to kill her and her unborn child .   Tarantino conceived Kill Bill as a homage to `` grindhouse '' cinema including martial arts films , samurai cinema , blaxploitation films , and spaghetti westerns . It is the second of two Kill Bill films produced simultaneously ; the first , Kill Bill : Volume 1 , was released in 2003 . The films were originally set for a single release , but the film , with a runtime of over four hours , was divided in two . Like Volume 1 , Volume 2 received positive reviews and was a commercial success .

evidence_en: Gabrielle Monique Union -LRB- born October 29 , 1972 -RRB- is an American actress . She began her career in 1990s , appearing on television sitcoms , before landing supporting roles in teen comedy films She 's All That and 10 Things I Hate About You -LRB- 1999 -RRB- . Her breakthrough role was in the 2000 teen comedy film Bring It On , after which she was female lead in the short-lived CBS medical drama series City of Angels later that year .   Union is best known for her performances in the romantic comedy films The Brothers -LRB- 2001 -RRB- , Deliver Us from Eva -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , Daddy 's Little Girls -LRB- 2007 -RRB- , Think Like a Man -LRB- 2012 -RRB- and Think Like a Man Too -LRB- 2014 -RRB- . She also had starring roles in Bad Boys II -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , Cradle 2 the Grave -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , the critically acclaimed Neo Ned -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , Cadillac Records -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , and Top Five -LRB- 2014 -RRB- . In 2013 , Union began starring as lead character in the BET drama series Being Mary Jane , for which she has received critical acclaim and an NAACP Image Award . She co-starred in film The Birth of a Nation -LRB- 2016 -RRB- , and next appeared in Almost Christmas -LRB- 2016 -RRB- and Sleepless -LRB- 2017 -RRB- .

evidence_da: John Adams -LRB- 30 oktober -LSB- O.S. 19 oktober -RSB- 1735 -- 4 juli , 1826 -RRB- var en amerikansk patriot, der fungerede som den anden præsident for USA -LRB- 1797 -- 1801 -RRB- og den første vicepræsident -LRB- 1789 -- 97 -RRB- . Han var advokat , diplomat , statsmand , politisk etotør og som grundlægger , leder af bevægelsen for amerikansk uafhængighed fra Storbritannien . Han var også en dedikeret diarist og korrespondent , især med sin kone og nærmeste rådgiver Abigail .   Han samarbejdede med sin fætter , revolutionære leder Samuel Adams , men han etablerede sin egen fremtrædende før den amerikanske revolution . Efter Boston Massacre , han gav en vellykket -LRB- men upopulær -RRB-juridisk forsvar af de anklagede britiske soldater , i lyset af alvorlige lokale anti-britiske følelser og drevet af hans hengivenhed til retten til rådgivning og '' beskytte-LSB-ion-RSB- af uskyld ''. Adams var delegeret fra Massachusetts til den kontinentale kongres , hvor han spillede en ledende rolle i at overtale Kongressen til at erklære uafhængighed . Han hjalp Thomas Jefferson med at udarbejde uafhængighedserklæringen i 1776 , og var dens førende fortaler i Kongressen . Som diplomat i Europa hjalp han med at forhandle den endelige fredsaftale med Storbritannien og erhvervede vitale statslige lån fra bankfolk i Amsterdam . Adams var den primære forfatter til Massachusetts forfatning i 1780, som påvirkede amerikansk politisk teori , som gjorde hans tidligere Tanker om regeringen -LRB- 1776-RRB- .   Adams ' legitimationsoplysninger som en revolutionær sikret for ham to perioder som præsident George Washington 's vicepræsident-LRB- 1789 til 1797 -RRB- og også hans eget valg i 1796 som den anden præsident . I sin enkelt periode som præsident , han stødte på hård kritik fra Jeffersonian Republikanerne , samt den dominerende fraktion i sit eget føderalistiske parti , ledet af hans rival Alexander Hamilton . Adams underskrev den kontroversielle Alien and Sedition Acts , og opbyggede hæren og flåden i lyset af en sort flåde '' Quasi-War '' med Frankrig . Den store gennemførelse af hans formandskab var en fredelig løsning på konflikten over for Hamiltons opposition . På grund af sin stærke holdning til forsvar , Adams er '' ofte kaldes far til den amerikanske flåde ''. Han var den første amerikanske præsident til at opholde sig i den udøvende palæ , nu kendt som Det Hvide Hus .   I 1800 tabte Adams genvalg til Thomas Jefferson og trak sig tilbage til Massachusetts . Han til sidst genoptaget sit venskab med Jefferson på sidstnævntes egen pensionering ved at indlede en korrespondance, der varede fjorten år . Han og hans kone etablerede en familie af politikere , diplomater og historikere, der nu omtales som Adams politiske familie . Adams var far til John Quincy Adams , den sjette præsident for USA . Han døde på 50-årsdagen for vedtagelsen af uafhængighedserklæringen , og samme dag som Jefferson . Moderne historikere i den samlede har positivt rangeret hans administration .
evidence_en: John Adams -LRB- October 30 -LSB- O.S. October 19 -RSB- 1735 -- July 4 , 1826 -RRB- was an American patriot who served as the second President of the United States -LRB- 1797 -- 1801 -RRB- and the first Vice President -LRB- 1789 -- 97 -RRB- . He was a lawyer , diplomat , statesman , political theorist , and , as a Founding Father , a leader of the movement for American independence from Great Britain . He was also a dedicated diarist and correspondent , particularly with his wife and closest advisor Abigail .   He collaborated with his cousin , revolutionary leader Samuel Adams , but he established his own prominence prior to the American Revolution . After the Boston Massacre , he provided a successful -LRB- though unpopular -RRB- legal defense of the accused British soldiers , in the face of severe local anti-British sentiment and driven by his devotion to the right to counsel and the `` protect -LSB- ion -RSB- of innocence '' . Adams was a delegate from Massachusetts to the Continental Congress , where he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence . He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776 , and was its foremost advocate in the Congress . As a diplomat in Europe , he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with Great Britain , and acquired vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers . Adams was the primary author of the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780 which influenced American political theory , as did his earlier Thoughts on Government -LRB- 1776 -RRB- .   Adams 's credentials as a revolutionary secured for him two terms as President George Washington 's vice president -LRB- 1789 to 1797 -RRB- and also his own election in 1796 as the second president . In his single term as president , he encountered fierce criticism from the Jeffersonian Republicans , as well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party , led by his rival Alexander Hamilton . Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and built up the army and navy in the face of an undeclared naval `` Quasi-War '' with France . The major accomplishment of his presidency was a peaceful resolution of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition . Due to his strong posture on defense , Adams is `` often called the father of the American Navy '' . He was the first U.S. president to reside in the executive mansion , now known as the White House .   In 1800 , Adams lost re-election to Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts . He eventually resumed his friendship with Jefferson upon the latter 's own retirement by initiating a correspondence which lasted fourteen years . He and his wife established a family of politicians , diplomats , and historians now referred to as the Adams political family . Adams was the father of John Quincy Adams , the sixth President of the United States . He died on the fiftieth anniversary of the adoption of the Declaration of Independence , and the same day as Jefferson . Modern historians in the aggregate have favorably ranked his administration .

evidence_da: Passagerer er en amerikansk science fiction-film fra 2016 instrueret af Morten Tyldum og skrevet af Jon Spaihts . Det stjerner Jennifer Lawrence , Chris Pratt , Michael Sheen , og Laurence Fishburne . Historien skildrer tre mennesker, der vækkes omkring 90 år for tidligt fra en induceret dvale på et rumskib på vej til en ny planet .   Filmen blev udgivet i USA december 21 , 2016 , i 2D og RealD 3D af Columbia Pictures . Det indtjente 303 millioner dollars på verdensplan . Filmen blev nomineret til Bedste Originale Score og Bedste Produktion Design ved 89th Academy Awards .
evidence_en: Passengers is a 2016 American science fiction film directed by Morten Tyldum and written by Jon Spaihts . It stars Jennifer Lawrence , Chris Pratt , Michael Sheen , and Laurence Fishburne . The story depicts three people who are awakened some 90 years too soon from an induced hibernation on a spaceship bound for a new planet .   The film was released in the United States on December 21 , 2016 , in 2D and RealD 3D by Columbia Pictures . It grossed $ 303 million worldwide . The film was nominated for Best Original Score and Best Production Design at the 89th Academy Awards .

evidence_da: Diane Ernestine Earle Ross -LRB- født marts 26 , 1944 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , sangskriver , skuespiller , og pladeproducer . Født og opvokset i Detroit , Michigan , Ross steg til berømmelse som forsanger i vokalgruppen The Supremes , som i løbet af 1960'erne , blev Motown 's mest succesfulde handling , og er den dag i dag USA 'mest succesfulde vokal gruppe , samt en af verden ' s bedst sælgende pige grupper af hele tiden. Ross ' succes som forsanger i The Supremes gjorde det muligt for fremtidige afrikansk-amerikanske R&B og soul handlinger for at finde mainstream succes . Gruppen udgivet en rekord-indstilling tolv nummer et hit singler på den amerikanske Billboard Hot 100 , herunder '' Hvor gjorde vores kærlighed Go '', '' Baby Love '', '' Come See About Me '', '' Stop ! I Kærlighedens Navn '' , '' You Ca n't Hurry Love '', '' You Keep Me Hangin ' On '' , '' Love Child '' og '' En dag vil vi 'll være sammen ''.   Efter sin afgang fra The Supremes i 1970 udgav Ross sit soloalbum fra The Ponymous samme år , som indeholdt Top 20 Pop-hittet '' Reach Out and Touch -LRB- Somebody 's Hand -RRB- '' og nummer et Pop hit '' Ai n't No Mountain High Enough ''. Hun udgav senere albummet Touch Me in the Morning i 1973 ; dens titelspor nåede nummer 1 , som hendes andet solo hit . Samme år , hendes album '' Lady Sings The Blues '', som var den oprindelige soundtrack af hendes film baseret på livet af jazz sanger Billie Holiday , gik til nr. 1 på Billboard Hot 200 Albums Chart , der sælger mere end 300.000 eksemplarer inden for sine første 8 dage efter udgivelsen .  I 1975 , Mahogni soundtracket omfattede hendes tredje nummer et hit , '' Tema fra Mahogni-LRB- Ved du, hvor du 're Going To -RRB- ''. Hendes eponyme album fra 1976 inkluderede hendes fjerde nummer et hit , '' Love Hangover ''. I 1979 udgav Ross albummet The Boss . Hendes 1980 semi-eponyme album Diana nåede nummer 2 på den amerikanske Billboard albums chart , og opfostrede nummer et hit '' Upside Down '' , og det internationale hit '' I 'm Coming Out ''. Efter at have forladt Motown , Ross opnået sin sjette og sidste amerikanske nummer et Pop hit , med duet '' Endless Love '', komponeret til Brooke Shields film af samme navn , af og udføres med tidligere Commodores frontmand , Lionel Richie . Ross og Richie optrådte med sangen på telecastet til 54th Academy Awards , hvor sangen blev nomineret i kategorien '' Best Song ''.   Ross har også vovet sig ind i handler , med en Golden Globe Award og Academy Award-nominerede præstation for hendes præstation i filmen Lady Sings the Blues-LRB- 1972 -RRB- . Hun medvirkede også i to andre film , Mahogni-LRB- 1975 -RRB- og The Wiz-LRB- 1978 -RRB- , senere handler i tv-film Out of Darkness -LRB- 1994 -RRB-, som hun også var nomineret til en Golden Globe Award , og Double Platinum-LRB- 1999 -RRB- . Ross blev udnævnt til '' Female Entertainer of the Century '' af Billboard Magazine . I 1993 erklærede Guinness Book of World Records Ross den mest succesfulde kvindelige musikkunstner i historien - på grund af hendes succes i USA og Storbritannien for at have flere hits end nogen kvindelig kunstner på hitlisterne - med en karriere på i alt 70 hitsingler med h er arbejde med Supremes og som en solo kunstner . Ross har solgt mere end 100 millioner plader på verdensplan, når hendes udgivelser med Supremes og som solokunstner er optalt . I 1988 blev Ross optaget i Rock and Roll Hall of Fame som medlem af Supremes , sammen med Mary Wilson og Florence Ballard . Hun var modtager af Kennedy Center Honors i 2007 , og præsidentens Frihedsmedalje i 2016 . Hun er en 12-tiden Grammy kandidat , aldrig tjener en konkurrencedygtig ære , men senere blev modtager af Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award i 2012 . I december 2016 kaldte Billboard Magazine hende for den 50.
evidence_en: Diane Ernestine Earle Ross -LRB- born March 26 , 1944 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter , actress , and record producer . Born and raised in Detroit , Michigan , Ross rose to fame as the lead singer of the vocal group The Supremes , which , during the 1960s , became Motown 's most successful act , and is to this day the United States ' most successful vocal group , as well as one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time . Ross ' success as lead singer of The Supremes made it possible for future African-American R&B and soul acts to find mainstream success . The group released a record-setting twelve number-one hit singles on the US Billboard Hot 100 , including `` Where Did Our Love Go '' , `` Baby Love '' , `` Come See About Me '' , `` Stop ! In the Name of Love '' , `` You Ca n't Hurry Love '' , `` You Keep Me Hangin ' On '' , `` Love Child '' , and `` Someday We 'll Be Together '' .   Following her departure from The Supremes in 1970 , Ross released her eponymous debut solo album that same year , which contained the Top 20 Pop hit `` Reach Out and Touch -LRB- Somebody 's Hand -RRB- '' and the number-one Pop hit `` Ai n't No Mountain High Enough '' . She later released the album Touch Me in the Morning in 1973 ; its title track reached number 1 , as her second solo hit . That same year , her album `` Lady Sings The Blues '' , which was the original soundtrack of her film based on the life of jazz singer Billie Holiday , went to no. 1 on the Billboard Hot 200 Albums Chart , selling more than 300,000 copies within its first 8 days of release . By 1975 , the Mahogany soundtrack included her third number-one hit , `` Theme from Mahogany -LRB- Do You Know Where You 're Going To -RRB- '' . Her eponymous 1976 album included her fourth number-one hit , `` Love Hangover '' . In 1979 , Ross released the album The Boss . Her 1980 semi-eponymous album Diana reached number 2 on the US Billboard albums chart , and spawned the number-one hit `` Upside Down '' , and the international hit `` I 'm Coming Out '' . After leaving Motown , Ross achieved her sixth and final US number-one Pop hit , with the duet `` Endless Love '' , composed for the Brooke Shields film of the same name , by and performed with former Commodores front man , Lionel Richie . Ross and Richie performed the song on the telecast for the 54th Academy Awards , where the song was nominated in the category of `` Best Song '' .   Ross has also ventured into acting , with a Golden Globe Award and Academy Award-nominated performance for her performance in the film Lady Sings the Blues -LRB- 1972 -RRB- . She also starred in two other films , Mahogany -LRB- 1975 -RRB- and The Wiz -LRB- 1978 -RRB- , later acting in the television films Out of Darkness -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , for which she also was nominated for a Golden Globe Award , and Double Platinum -LRB- 1999 -RRB- . Ross was named the `` Female Entertainer of the Century '' by Billboard magazine . In 1993 , the Guinness Book of World Records declared Ross the most successful female music artist in history , due to her success in the United States and United Kingdom for having more hits than any female artist in the charts , with a career total of 70 hit singles with her work with the Supremes and as a solo artist . Ross has sold more than 100 million records worldwide , when her releases with the Supremes and as a solo artist are tallied . In 1988 , Ross was inducted to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame as member of the Supremes , alongside Mary Wilson and Florence Ballard . She was the recipient of the Kennedy Center Honors in 2007 , and the Presidential Medal of Freedom in 2016 . She is a 12-time Grammy nominee , never earning a competitive honor , but later became the recipient of the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award in 2012 . In December 2016 , Billboard magazine named her the 50th most successful dance artist of all time .

evidence_da: Subhas Chandra Bose -LRB- 23 Januar 1897 - 18 August 1945 -RRB - var en indisk nationalist, hvis trodsige patriotisme gjorde ham til en helt i Indien, men hvis forsøg under Anden Verdenskrig at befri Indien af britisk styre med hjælp fra Nazityskland og Kejserlige Japan efterlod en urolig  Arv. Den ærefulde Netaji -LRB- Hindustani : '' Respekteret leder '' -RRB-, første gang anvendt i begyndelsen af 1942 til Bose i Tyskland af de indiske soldater i Indische Legion og af de tyske og indiske embedsmænd i Special Bureau for Indien i Berlin , blev senere brugt i hele I Ndia.   Bose havde været leder af den yngre , radikale fløj af den indiske nationalkongres i slutningen af 1920'erne og 1930'erne , stigende til at blive Kongressens præsident i 1938 og 1939 . Men , han blev fortrængt fra Kongressens ledende stillinger i 1939 efter forskelle med Mahatma Gandhi og Kongressenoverkommando . Han blev efterfølgende sat i husarrest af briterne, før han flygtede fra Indien i 1940 .   Bose ankom til Tyskland i april 1941 , hvor ledelsen tilbød uventet , om end undertiden ambivalent , sympati for årsagen til Indiens uafhængighed , i skarp kontrast til sine holdninger til andre koloniserede folk og etniske samfund . I november 1941 blev der med tyske midler oprettet et frit indien-center i Berlin og snart en Free India Radio , som Bose udsendte hver aften . En 3.000-stærk Free India Legion , bestående af indianere fanget af Erwin Rommel 's Afrika Korps , blev også dannet for at støtte i en eventuel fremtidig tysk landinvasion af Indien . I foråret 1942 blev en tysk invasion af Indien umuliggøreider i lyset af japanske sejre i Sydøstasien og ændrede tyske prioriteter . Adolf Hitler , under sit eneste møde med Bose i slutningen af maj 1942 , foreslog det samme , og tilbød at sørge for en ubåd . I løbet af denne tid Bose blev også en far; hans kone , eller følgesvend , Emilie Schenkl , som han havde mødt i 1934 , fødte en lille pige i november 1942 . I stærk tificering med aksemagterne og ikke længere undskyldende gik Bose om bord på en tysk ubåd i februar 1943 . I Madagaskar blev han overført til en japansk ubåd , hvorfra han gik fra borde i det japansk ejede Sumatra i maj 1943 .   Med japansk støtte moderniserede Bose den indiske nationale hær -LRB- INA -RRB- og derefter bestående af indiske soldater fra den britiske indiske hær , som var blevet taget til fange i slaget ved Singapore . Til disse , efter Bose 's ankomst , blev tilføjet hverve indiske civile i Malaya og Singapore . Japanerne var kommet for at støtte en række marionet - og midlertidige regeringer i de erobrede regioner , f.eks . Inden længe blev den provisoriske regering i Det Frie Indien , ledet af Bose , dannet på de japansk besatte Andaman - og Nicobarøerne . Bose havde stor drive og karisma - at skabe populære indiske slogans , såsom '' Jai Hind , '' - og INA under Bose var en model for mangfoldighed efter region, etnicitet, religion, og endda køn . Bose blev dog af japanerne betragtet som militært ufaglært , og hans militære indsats var kortvarig . I slutningen af 1944 og begyndelsen af 1945 standsede den britiske indiske hær først og vendte derefter det japanske angreb på Indien. Næsten halvdelen af de japanske styrker og fuldt halvdelen af det deltagende INA-kontingent blev dræbt . INA blev drevet ned malay halvøen , og overgav sig med generobringen af Singapore . Bose havde tidligere valgt ikke at overgive sig med sine styrker eller med japanerne, men snarere at flygte til Manchuriet med henblik på at søge en fremtid i Sovjetunionen, som han mente var ved at vende anti-britiske . Han døde af tredje grad forbrændinger modtaget, da hans fly styrtede ned i Taiwan . Nogle indianere mente dog ikke , at styrtet var sket , og mange af dem , især i Bengalen , mente, at Bose ville vende tilbage for at vinde Indiens uafhængighed .   Indiske National Congress , det vigtigste instrument i indisk nationalisme , roste Boses patriotisme, men tog afstand fra hans taktik og ideologi , især hans samarbejde med fascismen . Den britiske Raj , men aldrig alvorligt truet af INA , opkrævet 300 INA officerer med forræderi i INA forsøg , men i sidste ende tilbagesporet i lyset af både populære følelser og sin egen ende .
evidence_en: Subhas Chandra Bose -LRB- 23 January 1897 -- 18 August 1945 -RRB- was an Indian nationalist whose defiant patriotism made him a hero in India , but whose attempt during World War II to rid India of British rule with the help of Nazi Germany and Imperial Japan left a troubled legacy . The honorific Netaji -LRB- Hindustani : `` Respected Leader '' -RRB- , first applied in early 1942 to Bose in Germany by the Indian soldiers of the Indische Legion and by the German and Indian officials in the Special Bureau for India in Berlin , was later used throughout India .   Bose had been a leader of the younger , radical , wing of the Indian National Congress in the late 1920s and 1930s , rising to become Congress President in 1938 and 1939 . However , he was ousted from Congress leadership positions in 1939 following differences with Mahatma Gandhi and the Congress high command . He was subsequently placed under house arrest by the British before escaping from India in 1940 .   Bose arrived in Germany in April 1941 , where the leadership offered unexpected , if sometimes ambivalent , sympathy for the cause of India 's independence , contrasting starkly with its attitudes towards other colonised peoples and ethnic communities . In November 1941 , with German funds , a Free India Centre was set up in Berlin , and soon a Free India Radio , on which Bose broadcast nightly . A 3,000-strong Free India Legion , comprising Indians captured by Erwin Rommel 's Afrika Korps , was also formed to aid in a possible future German land invasion of India . By spring 1942 , in light of Japanese victories in southeast Asia and changing German priorities , a German invasion of India became untenable , and Bose became keen to move to southeast Asia . Adolf Hitler , during his only meeting with Bose in late May 1942 , suggested the same , and offered to arrange for a submarine . During this time Bose also became a father ; his wife , or companion , Emilie Schenkl , whom he had met in 1934 , gave birth to a baby girl in November 1942 . Identifying strongly with the Axis powers , and no longer apologetically , Bose boarded a German submarine in February 1943 . In Madagascar , he was transferred to a Japanese submarine from which he disembarked in Japanese-held Sumatra in May 1943 .   With Japanese support , Bose revamped the Indian National Army -LRB- INA -RRB- , then composed of Indian soldiers of the British Indian army who had been captured in the Battle of Singapore . To these , after Bose 's arrival , were added enlisting Indian civilians in Malaya and Singapore . The Japanese had come to support a number of puppet and provisional governments in the captured regions , such as those in Burma , the Philippines and Manchukuo . Before long the Provisional Government of Free India , presided by Bose , was formed in the Japanese-occupied Andaman and Nicobar Islands . Bose had great drive and charisma -- creating popular Indian slogans , such as `` Jai Hind , '' -- and the INA under Bose was a model of diversity by region , ethnicity , religion , and even gender . However , Bose was regarded by the Japanese as being militarily unskilled , and his military effort was short-lived . In late 1944 and early 1945 the British Indian Army first halted and then devastatingly reversed the Japanese attack on India . Almost half the Japanese forces and fully half the participating INA contingent were killed . The INA was driven down the Malay Peninsula , and surrendered with the recapture of Singapore . Bose had earlier chosen not to surrender with his forces or with the Japanese , but rather to escape to Manchuria with a view to seeking a future in the Soviet Union which he believed to be turning anti-British . He died from third degree burns received when his plane crashed in Taiwan . Some Indians , however , did not believe that the crash had occurred , with many among them , especially in Bengal , believing that Bose would return to gain India 's independence .   Indian National Congress , the main instrument of Indian nationalism , praised Bose 's patriotism but distanced itself from his tactics and ideology , especially his collaboration with Fascism . The British Raj , though never seriously threatened by the INA , charged 300 INA officers with treason in the INA trials , but eventually backtracked in the face both of popular sentiment and of its own end .

evidence_da: Tardigrades -LRB- -LSB- De blev først opdaget af den tyske zoolog Johann August Ephraim Goeze i 1773 . Navnet Tardigrada -LRB- der betyder '' langsom stepper '' -RRB- blev givet tre år senere af den italienske biolog Lazzaro Spallanzani . De er blevet fundet overalt fra bjergtoppe til det dybe hav, mudder vulkaner, og fra tropiske regnskove til Antarktis.   Tardigrades er et af de mest modstandsdygtige dyr kendt : de kan overleve ekstreme forhold, der ville være hurtigt dødelig for næsten alle andre kendte livsformer . De kan modstå temperaturintervaller fra 1 K -LRB- tæt på absolut nul -RRB- til omkring 420 K i flere minutter, tryk omkring seks gange større end dem, der findes i de dybeste ocean skyttegrave , ioniserende stråling ved doser hundredvis af gange højere end den dødelige dosis for et menneske og vakuum af det ydre rum. De kan gå uden mad eller vand i mere end 30 år , udtørring til det punkt , hvor de er 3 % eller mindre vand , kun for at rehydrere , foder og reproducere . Tardigrades lever under barske forhold gennemgå en årlig proces af cyclomorphosis .   De betragtes ikke som ekstremofile , fordi de ikke er tilpasset til at udnytte disse betingelser . Det betyder , at deres chancer for at dø stiger, jo længere de udsættes for de ekstreme miljøer , mens sande extremophiles trives i et fysisk eller geokemisk ekstreme miljø , der ville skade de fleste andre organismer .   Normalt er tardigrades ca. 0,5 mm lange , når de er fuldt udvokset . De er korte og buttede med fire par ben , hver med fire til otte kløer også kendt som '' diske ''. De første tre par ben er rettet ventrolaterally og er de primære midler til bevægelse , mens det fjerde par er rettet posteriort på terminalen segment af stammen og bruges primært til at forstå substratet . Tardigrades er fremherskende i mos og lav og foder på planteceller , alger og små hvirvelløse dyr . Når de indsamles , kan de ses under et meget energibesparende mikroskop , hvilket gør dem tilgængelige for studerende og amatørforskere .   Tardigrades danner phylum Tardigrada , en del af superphylum Ecdysozoa . Det er en gammel gruppe , med fossiler stammer fra 530 millioner år siden , i den kambriske periode . Omkring 1.150 arter af tardigrades er blevet beskrevet . Tardigrades kan findes i hele verden, fra Himalaya -LRB- over 6000 m -RRB-, til det dybe hav -LRB- under 4000 m -RRB- og fra polarområderne til ækvator .
evidence_en: Tardigrades -LRB- -LSB- ˈtɑrdᵻˌgreɪd -RSB- also known as water bears , space bears , or moss piglets -RRB- are water-dwelling , eight-legged , segmented micro-animals . They were first discovered by the German zoologist Johann August Ephraim Goeze in 1773 . The name Tardigrada -LRB- meaning `` slow stepper '' -RRB- was given three years later by the Italian biologist Lazzaro Spallanzani . They have been found everywhere from mountaintops to the deep sea , mud volcanoes , and from tropical rain forests to the Antarctic .   Tardigrades are one of the most resilient animals known : they can survive extreme conditions that would be rapidly fatal to nearly all other known life forms . They can withstand temperature ranges from 1 K -LRB- close to absolute zero -RRB- to about 420 K for several minutes , pressures about six times greater than those found in the deepest ocean trenches , ionizing radiation at doses hundreds of times higher than the lethal dose for a human , and the vacuum of outer space . They can go without food or water for more than 30 years , drying out to the point where they are 3 % or less water , only to rehydrate , forage , and reproduce . Tardigrades living in harsh conditions undergo an annual process of cyclomorphosis .   They are not considered extremophilic because they are not adapted to exploit these conditions . This means that their chances of dying increase the longer they are exposed to the extreme environments , whereas true extremophiles thrive in a physically or geochemically extreme environment that would harm most other organisms .   Usually , tardigrades are about 0.5 mm long when they are fully grown . They are short and plump with four pairs of legs , each with four to eight claws also known as `` disks '' . The first three pairs of legs are directed ventrolaterally and are the primary means of locomotion , while the fourth pair is directed posteriorly on the terminal segment of the trunk and is used primarily for grasping the substrate . Tardigrades are prevalent in mosses and lichens and feed on plant cells , algae , and small invertebrates . When collected , they may be viewed under a very low-power microscope , making them accessible to students and amateur scientists .   Tardigrades form the phylum Tardigrada , part of the superphylum Ecdysozoa . It is an ancient group , with fossils dating from 530 million years ago , in the Cambrian period . About 1,150 species of tardigrades have been described . Tardigrades can be found throughout the world , from the Himalayas -LRB- above 6000 m -RRB- , to the deep sea -LRB- below 4000 m -RRB- and from the polar regions to the equator .

evidence_da: Greenwich -LRB- -LSB- יrķnķtķ -RSB- , -LSB- יrייייייd -RSB- -LSB- ייrķייtķ -RSB- eller -LS B- יrķnķdķ -RSB- -RRB- er et tidligt etableret distrikt i det sydøstlige London , England , centreret 5,5 miles -LRB- 8,9 km -RRB- øst sydøst for Charing Cross . Byen låner sit navn til Royal Borough of Greenwich .   Byen giver sit navn til en af de fem bydele i London Docklands, og er forbundet med områder med havne i London historisk ved floden og i dag til Canary Wharf og andre distrikter ved Docklands Light Railway .   Greenwich er kendt for sin maritime historie og for at give sit navn til Greenwich Meridian-LRB- 0 ° længdegrad -RRB- og Greenwich Mean Time . Byen blev stedet for et kongeligt palads, Palace of Placentia fra 1500-tallet, og var fødestedet for mange Tudors , herunder Henry VIII og Elizabeth I. Slottet faldt i forfald under den engelske borgerkrig og blev genopbygget som Royal Naval Hospital for Sejlere af Sir Christopher Wren og hans assistent Nicholas Hawksmoor . Disse bygninger blev Royal Naval College i 1873 , og de forblev en virksomhed for militær uddannelse indtil 1998, da de gik i hænderne på Greenwich Foundation . De historiske værelser i disse bygninger forbliver åbne for offentligheden; andre bygninger bruges af University of Greenwich og Trinity Laban Conservatoire af musik og dans.   byen blev et populært feriested i 1700-tallet, og der blev bygget mange store huse der, såsom Vanbrugh Castle -LRB- 1717 -RRB - etableret på Maze Hill, ved siden af parken. Fra den georgiske periode godser af huse blev bygget over byens centrum. De maritime forbindelser greenwich blev fejret i det 20 . Greenwich var en del af Kent indtil 1889, da County of London blev oprettet .
evidence_en: Greenwich -LRB- -LSB- ˈɡrɛnɪtʃ -RSB- , -LSB- ˈɡrɪnɪdʒ -RSB- , -LSB- ˈɡrɪnɪtʃ -RSB- or -LSB- ˈɡrɛnɪdʒ -RSB- -RRB- is an early-established district of south east London , England , centred 5.5 miles -LRB- 8.9 km -RRB- east south-east of Charing Cross . The town lends its name to the Royal Borough of Greenwich .   The town gives its name to one of the five boroughs of the London Docklands , and is connected to areas with docks of London historically by river and today to Canary Wharf and other districts by the Docklands Light Railway .   Greenwich is notable for its maritime history and for giving its name to the Greenwich Meridian -LRB- 0 ° longitude -RRB- and Greenwich Mean Time . The town became the site of a royal palace , the Palace of Placentia from the 15th century , and was the birthplace of many Tudors , including Henry VIII and Elizabeth I . The palace fell into disrepair during the English Civil War and was rebuilt as the Royal Naval Hospital for Sailors by Sir Christopher Wren and his assistant Nicholas Hawksmoor . These buildings became the Royal Naval College in 1873 , and they remained an establishment for military education until 1998 when they passed into the hands of the Greenwich Foundation . The historic rooms within these buildings remain open to the public ; other buildings are used by University of Greenwich and Trinity Laban Conservatoire of Music and Dance .   The town became a popular resort in the 18th century and many grand houses were built there , such as Vanbrugh Castle -LRB- 1717 -RRB- established on Maze Hill , next to the park . From the Georgian period estates of houses were constructed above the town centre . The maritime connections of Greenwich were celebrated in the 20th century , with the siting of the Cutty Sark and Gipsy Moth IV next to the river front , and the National Maritime Museum in the former buildings of the Royal Hospital School in 1934 . Greenwich formed part of Kent until 1889 when the County of London was created .

evidence_da: England er et land, der er en del af Det Forenede Kongerige . Det deler landegrænser med Skotland mod nord og Wales mod vest . Det Irske Hav ligger nordvest for England, og Det Keltiske Hav ligger mod sydvest. England er adskilt fra det kontinentale Europa af Nordsøen mod øst og Den Engelske Kanal mod syd. Landet dækker fem ottendedele af øen Storbritannien -LRB- som ligger i Nordatlanten -RRB - i centrum og syd; og omfatter over 100 mindre øer såsom øerne Scilly og Isle of Wight .   Området nu kaldet England blev først beboet af moderne mennesker i den øvre palæolitiske periode, men tager sit navn fra vinklerne , en af de germanske stammer, der bosatte sig i løbet af det femte og sjette århundrede. England blev en forenet stat i 1000-tallet , og siden Discovery-alderen , som begyndte i løbet af 1500-tallet , har haft en betydelig kulturel og juridisk indvirkning på resten af verden . Det engelske sprog , den anglikanske kirke og engelsk ret - grundlaget for common law retssystemerne i mange andre lande rundt om i verden - udviklet i England , og landets parlamentariske regeringssystem er blevet bredt vedtaget af andre nationer . Den industrielle revolution begyndte i 1700-tallets England , hvilket ændrede sit samfund til verdens første industrialiserede nation .   Englands terræn består for det meste af lave bakker og sletter , især i det centrale og sydlige England . Men der er højland i nord -LRB - for eksempel det bjergrige Lake District , og Pennines-RRB- og i sydvest -LRB- for eksempel Dartmoor og Cotswolds -RRB- . Hovedstaden er London , som er det største storbyområde i både Det Forenede Kongerige og Den Europæiske Union.Ifølge Det Europæiske Statistiske Agentur er London den største større byzone i EU , et mål for hovedstadsområdet, som omfatter en bys bykerne samt den omgivende pendlingszone. Londons kommunale befolkning er også den største i EU . Englands befolkning på over 53 millioner udgør 84 % af befolkningen i Det Forenede Kongerige , stort set koncentreret omkring London , sydøst , og byområder i Midlands , nordvest - den nordøstlige del af landet , som hver især udviklede sig som store industrer regioner i løbet af 1800-tallet.   Kongeriget England - som efter 1535 omfattede Wales - ophørte med at være en særskilt suveræn stat den 1.  at skabe Kongeriget Storbritannien . I 1801 blev Storbritannien forenet med Kongeriget Irland gennem endnu en unionslov om at blive Det Forenede Kongerige Storbritannien og Irland . I 1922 løsrev den irske fristat sig fra Det Forenede Kongerige , hvilket førte til , at sidstnævnte blev omdøbt til Det Forenede Kongerige Storbritannien og Nordirland .
evidence_en: England is a country that is part of the United Kingdom . It shares land borders with Scotland to the north and Wales to the west . The Irish Sea lies northwest of England and the Celtic Sea lies to the southwest . England is separated from continental Europe by the North Sea to the east and the English Channel to the south . The country covers five-eighths of the island of Great Britain -LRB- which lies in the North Atlantic -RRB- in its centre and south ; and includes over 100 smaller islands such as the Isles of Scilly , and the Isle of Wight .   The area now called England was first inhabited by modern humans during the Upper Palaeolithic period , but takes its name from the Angles , one of the Germanic tribes who settled during the 5th and 6th centuries . England became a unified state in the 10th century , and since the Age of Discovery , which began during the 15th century , has had a significant cultural and legal impact on the wider world . The English language , the Anglican Church , and English law -- the basis for the common law legal systems of many other countries around the world -- developed in England , and the country 's parliamentary system of government has been widely adopted by other nations . The Industrial Revolution began in 18th-century England , transforming its society into the world 's first industrialised nation .   England 's terrain mostly comprises low hills and plains , especially in central and southern England . However , there are uplands in the north -LRB- for example , the mountainous Lake District , and the Pennines -RRB- and in the southwest -LRB- for example , Dartmoor and the Cotswolds -RRB- . The capital is London , which is the largest metropolitan area in both the United Kingdom and the European Union.According to the European Statistical Agency , London is the largest Larger Urban Zone in the EU , a measure of metropolitan area which comprises a city 's urban core as well as its surrounding commuting zone . London 's municipal population is also the largest in the EU . England 's population of over 53 million comprises 84 % of the population of the United Kingdom , largely concentrated around London , the South East , and conurbations in the Midlands , the North West , the North East , and Yorkshire , which each developed as major industrial regions during the 19th century .   The Kingdom of England -- which after 1535 included Wales -- ceased being a separate sovereign state on 1 May 1707 , when the Acts of Union put into effect the terms agreed in the Treaty of Union the previous year , resulting in a political union with the Kingdom of Scotland to create the Kingdom of Great Britain . In 1801 , Great Britain was united with the Kingdom of Ireland through another Act of Union to become the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland . In 1922 the Irish Free State seceded from the United Kingdom , leading to the latter being renamed the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland .

evidence_da: Up All Night er debutstudiealbummet af den engelsk-irske gruppe One Direction , udgivet af Syco Records i november 2011 i Irland og Det Forenede Kongerige , efterfulgt af en verdensomspændende udgivelse i løbet af 2012 . Fire måneder efter at have afsluttet tredje i den syvende serie af britiske reality sang konkurrence The X Factor i december 2010 , One Direction begyndte at indspille albummet i Sverige , Uk og USA , der arbejder med en række forfattere og producenter . Albummet er overvejende en pop musik album, der orienterer sig i pop rock, dance-pop , teen pop og power pop . Albummets lyriske indhold handler om at være ung , relationer , hjertesorg og empowerment . Iscenesat til støtte for albummet , One Direction udført albummets sange live på tv-shows , ved prisuddelinger , og under deres verdensomspændende Up All Night Tour .   Albummet fik generelt positive anmeldelser fra moderne musikkritikere - hvoraf mange satte pris på albummets kombination af melodisk sanghåndværk og iørefaldende , poporienteret materiale, der - mens det blev produceret smart - undgik den kommercielle kynisme og voksne moderne poseren af nogle af deres 80'ere og 90'er forfædre . En international succes , albummet toppede hitlisterne i seksten lande og har i december 2012 solgt over 4,5 millioner eksemplarer på verdensplan . Albummet bøjede sig som nummer to på UK Albums Chart og i sidste ende blev storbritanniens hurtigst sælgende debut album af 2011 . Up All Night debuterede til nummer et på den amerikanske Billboard 200 , der sælger 176.000 eksemplarer i sin første uge . Ifølge International Federation of the Phonographic Industry -LRB- IFPI -RRB- var Up All Night det tredje globale bedst sælgende album i 2012 med et salg på 4,5 millioner eksemplarer .   One Direction sluttede 2012 med to af dette års top fem bedst sælgende albums i USA; Up All Night på nummer tre og deres andet studiealbum , Take Me Home , som nummer fem , hvilket gør boybandet til første akt, der placerer to albums i årets udgang i Nielsen SoundScan-æraen . Hertil kommer , Up All Night blev den bedst sælgende album af en gruppe og den tredje bedst sælgende debut album af 2012 . Fire singler blev udgivet fra albummet , herunder uk Singles Chart top ti hits '' Hvad gør dig smuk '' , '' Got ta Be You '' , og '' One Thing ''.
evidence_en: Up All Night is the debut studio album by English-Irish group One Direction , released by Syco Records in November 2011 in Ireland and the United Kingdom , followed by a worldwide release during 2012 . Four months after finishing third in the seventh series of British reality singing contest The X Factor in December 2010 , One Direction began recording the album in Sweden , UK and the United States , working with a variety of writers and producers . The album is predominantly a pop music album which orientates into pop rock , dance-pop , teen pop and power pop . The album 's lyrical content regards being young , relationships , heartbreak and empowerment . Staged in support of the album , One Direction performed the album 's songs live on televised shows , at awards ceremonies , and during their worldwide Up All Night Tour .   The album received generally favourable reviews from contemporary music critics , many of whom appreciated the album 's combination of melodic song craft and catchy , pop-oriented material that , while slickly produced , avoided the commercial cynicism and adult contemporary posturing of some of their '80s and '90s forebears . An international success , the album topped the charts in sixteen countries and , by December 2012 , has sold over 4.5 million copies worldwide . The album bowed at number two on the UK Albums Chart and ultimately became the UK 's fastest-selling debut album of 2011 . Up All Night debuted to number one on the United States Billboard 200 , selling 176,000 copies in its first week . According to the International Federation of the Phonographic Industry -LRB- IFPI -RRB- , Up All Night was the third global best-selling album of 2012 with sales of 4.5 million copies .   One Direction finished 2012 with two of that year 's top five best-selling albums in the United States ; Up All Night at number three and their second studio album , Take Me Home , at number five , making the boy band the first act to place two albums in the year-end top five in the Nielsen SoundScan era . In addition , Up All Night became the best-selling album by a group and the third best-selling debut album of 2012 . Four singles were released from the album , including the UK Singles Chart top ten hits `` What Makes You Beautiful '' , `` Got ta Be You '' , and `` One Thing '' .

evidence_da: One Direction -LRB- almindeligvis forkortet som 1D -RRB - er en engelsk-irsk pop boy band baseret i London , sammensat af Niall Horan , Liam Payne , Harry Styles , Louis Tomlinson , og tidligere , Zayn Malik indtil sin afgang fra bandet på 25 Marts 2015 . Gruppen underskrev med Simon Cowell 's pladeselskab Syco Records efter at have dannet og sluttede på tredjepladsen i den syvende serie af den britiske tv-sang konkurrence The X Factor i 2010 . Fremdrives til international succes af sociale medier , One Direction 's fem albums , Up All Night -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , Take Me Home -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Midnight Memories -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , Four -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , og Made in the A.M. -LRB- 2015 -RRB- toppede hitlisterne på de fleste større markeder og genererede hitsingler, herunder '' Hvad gør dig smuk '', '' Live While We 're Young', '' Best Song Ever '', '' Story of My Life '' og '' Drag Me Down ''.   Deres priser omfatter seks Brit Awards , fire MTV Video Music Awards , elleve MTV Europe Music Awards , syv American Music Awards -LRB- herunder Artist of the Year i 2014 og 2015 -RRB- og 27 Teen Choice Awards , blandt mange andre . Ifølge Nick Gatfield , formanden og administrerende direktør for Sony Music Entertainment UK , One Direction repræsenterede en $ 50 millioner business imperium i juni 2012 . De blev proklameret 2012 's' '' Top New Artist '' af Billboard . Ifølge Sunday Times Rich List , i april 2013 , havde de en anslået personlig samlet formue på # 25 millioner -LRB- $ 41,2 m -RRB- hvilket gør dem til den næstrigeste musikere i Storbritannien under 30 år . I 2014 , Forbes opført dem den næsthøjeste indtjening berømtheder under 30 , med gruppen tjener en anslået 75 millioner dollars fra juni 2013 til juni 2014 . I juni 2015 , Forbes opført deres indtjening på $ 130 millioner for de foregående tolv måneder , og rangeret dem den fjerde højest tjenende berømtheder i verden . I 2016 forbes rangeret dem verdens næsthøjeste indtjening berømtheder .   Efter udgivelsen af Four , One Direction blev det første band i den amerikanske Billboard 200 historie at have deres første fire albums debut som nummer et . Deres tredje album , Midnight Memories , var det bedst sælgende album på verdensplan i 2013 på trods af at blive udgivet i slutningen af november . Bandet 's Where We Are Tour til støtte for Midnight Memories and Four , var den højest indtjenende koncertturné i 2014 , og den højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren tour nogensinde af en vokal gruppe , genererer $ 282 millioner . I 2014 , Billboard opkaldt One Direction Artist of the Year . Bandet er i øjeblikket på en pause , der begyndte i januar 2016 , så alle medlemmer til at forfølge andre projekter .
evidence_en: One Direction -LRB- commonly abbreviated as 1D -RRB- are an English-Irish pop boy band based in London , composed of Niall Horan , Liam Payne , Harry Styles , Louis Tomlinson , and previously , Zayn Malik until his departure from the band on 25 March 2015 . The group signed with Simon Cowell 's record label Syco Records after forming and finishing third in the seventh series of the British televised singing competition The X Factor in 2010 . Propelled to international success by social media , One Direction 's five albums , Up All Night -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , Take Me Home -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Midnight Memories -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , Four -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , and Made in the A.M. -LRB- 2015 -RRB- , topped charts in most major markets , and generated hit singles including `` What Makes You Beautiful '' , `` Live While We 're Young '' , `` Best Song Ever '' , `` Story of My Life '' , and `` Drag Me Down '' .   Their awards include six Brit Awards , four MTV Video Music Awards , eleven MTV Europe Music Awards , seven American Music Awards -LRB- including Artist of the Year in 2014 and 2015 -RRB- , and 27 Teen Choice Awards , among many others . According to Nick Gatfield , the chairman and chief executive of Sony Music Entertainment UK , One Direction represented a $ 50 million business empire by June 2012 . They were proclaimed 2012 's `` Top New Artist '' by Billboard . According to the Sunday Times Rich List , by April 2013 , they had an estimated personal combined wealth of # 25 million -LRB- $ 41.2 m -RRB- making them the second-wealthiest musicians in the UK under 30 years of age . In 2014 , Forbes listed them the second-highest earning celebrities under 30 , with the group earning an estimated $ 75 million from June 2013 to June 2014 . In June 2015 , Forbes listed their earnings at $ 130 million for the previous twelve months , and ranked them the fourth highest earning celebrities in the world . In 2016 Forbes ranked them the world 's second highest earning celebrities .   After the release of Four , One Direction became the first band in the US Billboard 200 history to have their first four albums debut at number one . Their third album , Midnight Memories , was the biggest-selling album worldwide of 2013 despite being released in late November . The band 's Where We Are Tour in support of Midnight Memories and Four , was the highest-grossing concert tour in 2014 , and the highest-grossing tour ever by a vocal group , generating $ 282 million . In 2014 , Billboard named One Direction Artist of the Year . The band is currently on a hiatus that began in January 2016 , allowing all members to pursue other projects .

evidence_da: Irland -LRB- -LSB- יaərlənd -RSB- Éire -LSB- יייjə -RSB- ; Ulster-Scots : Airlann -LSB- - scoיייrlən -RSB- -RRB- er en ø i Nordatlanten . Det er adskilt fra Storbritannien mod øst af Den Nordlige Kanal , Det Irske Hav , og St George 's Channel . Irland er den næststørste ø på de britiske øer , den tredjestørste i Europa og den 20. største på Jorden .   Politisk er Irland delt mellem Republikken Irland -LRB , officielt kaldet Irland -RRB - som dækker fem sjettedele af øen , og Nordirland , som er en del af Det Forenede Kongerige , i den nordøstlige del af øen . I 2011 var befolkningen i Irland omkring 6,4 millioner , hvilket rangerede den næstmest folkerige ø i Europa efter Storbritannien . Knap 4,6 millioner bor i Irland og bor lidt over 1,8 millioner i Nordirland .   Øens geografi består af relativt lavtliggende bjerge omkring en central slette, med flere sejlbare floder, der strækker sig ind i landet. Øen har frodig vegetation, et produkt af sin milde, men foranderlige klima, som undgår ekstremer i temperatur . Tykke skove dækkede øen indtil middelalderen. Siden 2013 udgør den mængde jord , der er skovbeklædt i Irland , ca . Der er seksogtyve bevarede pattedyrarter hjemmehørende i Irland. Det irske klima er meget moderat og klassificeret som oceaniske . Som følge heraf er vintrene mildere end forventet for et så nordligt område . Somrene er dog køligere end i det kontinentale Europa . Nedbør og skydække er rigelige .   De tidligste beviser for menneskelig tilstedeværelse i Irland er dateret til 10.500 f.Kr. Gælisk Irland var opstået ved det 1. Øen blev kristne fra det femte århundrede og fremefter. Efter den normanniske invasion i 1100-tallet krævede England suverænitet over Irland . Men det engelske styre strakte sig ikke over hele øen før 1500-tallets Tudor-erobring , hvilket førte til kolonisering af bosættere fra Storbritannien . I 1690'erne var et system med protestantisk engelsk styre designet til at stille det katolske flertal og protestantiske afvigere væsentligt ringere og blev forlænget i løbet af 1700-tallet . Med Unionsakterne i 1801 blev Irland en del af Det Forenede Kongerige . En uafhængighedskrig i begyndelsen af 1900-tallet blev efterfulgt af øens deling , hvorved den irske fristat , som blev mere og mere suveræn i de følgende årtier , og Nordirland , som forblev en del af Det Forenede Kongerige . Nordirland oplevede megen uroligheder fra slutningen af 1960'erne til 1990'erne . Dette aftog efter en politisk aftale i 1998 . I 1973 tiltrådte Republikken Irland Det Europæiske Økonomiske Fællesskab , mens Det Forenede Kongerige og Nordirland som en del af det gjorde det samme .   Den irske kultur har haft en betydelig indflydelse på andre kulturer , især på litteraturområdet . Ud over mainstream vestlige kultur , en stærk indfødte kultur eksisterer, som udtrykt gennem gælisk spil , irsk musik , og det irske sprog . Øens kultur deler også mange funktioner med storbritanniens , herunder det engelske sprog, og sportsgrene som foreningsfodbold , rugby , hestevæddeløb og golf .
evidence_en: Ireland -LRB- -LSB- ˈaɪərlənd -RSB- Éire -LSB- ˈeːɾʲə -RSB- ; Ulster-Scots : Airlann -LSB- - scoˈɑːrlən -RSB- -RRB- is an island in the North Atlantic . It is separated from Great Britain to its east by the North Channel , the Irish Sea , and St George 's Channel . Ireland is the second-largest island of the British Isles , the third-largest in Europe , and the twentieth-largest on Earth .   Politically , Ireland is divided between the Republic of Ireland -LRB- officially named Ireland -RRB- , which covers five-sixths of the island , and Northern Ireland , which is part of the United Kingdom , in the northeast of the island . In 2011 , the population of Ireland was about 6.4 million , ranking it the second-most populous island in Europe after Great Britain . Just under 4.6 million live in the Republic of Ireland and just over 1.8 million live in Northern Ireland .   The island 's geography comprises relatively low-lying mountains surrounding a central plain , with several navigable rivers extending inland . The island has lush vegetation , a product of its mild but changeable climate which avoids extremes in temperature . Thick woodlands covered the island until the Middle Ages . As of 2013 , the amount of land that is wooded in Ireland is about 11 % of the total , compared with a European average of 35 % . There are twenty-six extant mammal species native to Ireland . The Irish climate is very moderate and classified as oceanic . As a result , winters are milder than expected for such a northerly area . However , summers are cooler than those in Continental Europe . Rainfall and cloud cover are abundant .   The earliest evidence of human presence in Ireland is dated at 10,500 BC . Gaelic Ireland had emerged by the 1st century CE . The island was Christianised from the 5th century onward . Following the Norman invasion in the 12th century , England claimed sovereignty over Ireland . However , English rule did not extend over the whole island until the 16th -- 17th century Tudor conquest , which led to colonisation by settlers from Britain . In the 1690s , a system of Protestant English rule was designed to materially disadvantage the Catholic majority and Protestant dissenters , and was extended during the 18th century . With the Acts of Union in 1801 , Ireland became a part of the United Kingdom . A war of independence in the early 20th century was followed by the partition of the island , creating the Irish Free State , which became increasingly sovereign over the following decades , and Northern Ireland , which remained a part of the United Kingdom . Northern Ireland saw much civil unrest from the late 1960s until the 1990s . This subsided following a political agreement in 1998 . In 1973 the Republic of Ireland joined the European Economic Community while the United Kingdom , and Northern Ireland , as part of it , did the same .   Irish culture has had a significant influence on other cultures , especially in the fields of literature . Alongside mainstream Western culture , a strong indigenous culture exists , as expressed through Gaelic games , Irish music , and the Irish language . The culture of the island also shares many features with that of Great Britain , including the English language , and sports such as association football , rugby , horse racing , and golf .

evidence_da: Ellen Lee DeGeneres -LRB- -LSB- dķdķnər -RSB- født 26. januar - 1958 -RRB- er en amerikansk komiker , tv-vært , skuespiller , forfatter og producer . DeGeneres medvirkede i den populære sitcom Ellen fra 1994 til 1998 og har været vært for hendes syndikerede tv-talkshow , The Ellen DeGeneres Show , siden 2003 .   Hendes stand-up karriere startede i begyndelsen af 1980'erne , og omfattede en 1986 optræden på The Tonight Show Stjernespækket Johnny Carson . Som en film skuespiller , DeGeneres medvirkede i Mr. Wrong -LRB- 1996 -RRB-, dukkede op i EDtv -LRB- 1999 -RRB- og The Love Letter -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , og forudsat stemme Dory i Pixar animerede film Finding Nemo -LRB- 2003 -RRB- og Finding Dory -LRB- 2016 -RRB- for Nemo , hun blev tildelt Saturn Award for bedste kvindelige birolle , første gang en skuespiller vandt en Saturn Award for en stemme præstation . I 2010 , hun var en dommer på American Idol for sin niende sæson .   Hun medvirkede i to tv-sitcoms , Ellen fra 1994 til 1998 , og The Ellen Show fra 2001 til 2002 . I løbet af den fjerde sæson af Ellen i 1997 , hun kom ud som lesbisk i en optræden på The Oprah Winfrey Show . Hendes karakter , Ellen Morgan , kom også ud til en terapeut spillet af Winfrey , og serien gik på at udforske forskellige LGBT spørgsmål , herunder den kommende-out proces . Dette gjorde hende den første åbent lesbisk skuespiller til at spille en åbent lesbisk karakter på tv . I 2008 giftede hun sig med sin mangeårige kæreste Portia de Rossi .   DeGeneres har været vært for Academy Awards , Grammy Awards , og Primetime Emmys . Hun har forfattet tre bøger og startede sit eget pladeselskab , Eleveneleven . Hun har vundet 29 Emmys , 20 People 's Choice Awards -LRB- mere end nogen anden person -RRB-, og mange andre priser for hendes arbejde og velgørende indsats . I 2016 modtog hun præsidentens frihedsmedalje .
evidence_en: Ellen Lee DeGeneres -LRB- -LSB- dᵻˈdʒɛnərᵻs -RSB- born January 26 , 1958 -RRB- is an American comedian , television host , actress , writer , and producer . DeGeneres starred in the popular sitcom Ellen from 1994 to 1998 and has hosted her syndicated TV talk show , The Ellen DeGeneres Show , since 2003 .   Her stand-up career started in the early 1980s , and included a 1986 appearance on The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson . As a film actress , DeGeneres starred in Mr. Wrong -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , appeared in EDtv -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , and The Love Letter -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , and provided the voice of Dory in the Pixar animated films Finding Nemo -LRB- 2003 -RRB- and Finding Dory -LRB- 2016 -RRB- ; for Nemo , she was awarded the Saturn Award for Best Supporting Actress , the first time an actress won a Saturn Award for a voice performance . In 2010 , she was a judge on American Idol for its ninth season .   She starred in two television sitcoms , Ellen from 1994 to 1998 , and The Ellen Show from 2001 to 2002 . During the fourth season of Ellen in 1997 , she came out as a lesbian in an appearance on The Oprah Winfrey Show . Her character , Ellen Morgan , also came out to a therapist played by Winfrey , and the series went on to explore various LGBT issues , including the coming-out process . This made her the first openly lesbian actress to play an openly lesbian character on television . In 2008 , she married her longtime girlfriend Portia de Rossi .   DeGeneres has hosted the Academy Awards , Grammy Awards , and the Primetime Emmys . She has authored three books and started her own record company , Eleveneleven . She has won 29 Emmys , 20 People 's Choice Awards -LRB- more than any other person -RRB- , and numerous other awards for her work and charitable efforts . In 2016 , she received the Presidential Medal of Freedom .

evidence_da: The Promise er en amerikansk historisk dramafilm fra 2016 instrueret af Terry George med Oscar Isaac , Charlotte Le Bon og Christian Bale , der foregår i det osmanniske riges sidste år . September 2016 , på Toronto International Film Festival og blev udgivet i USA april 21 , 2017 , af Open Road Films .   Løftet handler om en kærlighed trekant, der udvikler sig mellem armenske medicinskstuderende Mikael-LRB- Isaac-RRB-, en amerikansk journalist baseret i Paris ved navn Chris-LRB- Bale-RRB- og en armensk-født kvinde opvokset i Frankrig , Ana-LRB- Le Bon -RRB-, i løbet af de sidste år af det osmanniske rige , og under det armenske folkedrab. Filmen var en box office bombe , opregning kun $ 8 millioner mod sin 90 millioner dollars budget , selv om studiet bemærkede hovedformålet med filmen var at henlede opmærksomheden på historien, ikke tjene penge .
evidence_en: The Promise is a 2016 American historical drama film directed by Terry George and starring Oscar Isaac , Charlotte Le Bon and Christian Bale , set in the final years of the Ottoman Empire . The film premiered on September 11 , 2016 , at the Toronto International Film Festival and was released in the United States on April 21 , 2017 , by Open Road Films .   The Promise is about a love triangle that develops between Armenian medical student Mikael -LRB- Isaac -RRB- , an American journalist based in Paris named Chris -LRB- Bale -RRB- and an Armenian-born woman raised in France , Ana -LRB- Le Bon -RRB- , during the final years of the Ottoman Empire , and during the Armenian Genocide . The film was a box office bomb , grossing just $ 8 million against its $ 90 million budget , although the studio noted the main purpose of the film was to bring attention to the story , not make money .

evidence_da: Gemini er en indisk indisk-sproget actionfilm fra 2002, skrevet og instrueret af Saran og produceret af AVM Productions. Filmen indeholder Vikram i titelrollen af en lille tid kriminel og håbefulde don, der - efter at være blevet forelsket , beslutter at afstå fra kriminalitet ; Kiran Rathod spiller sin kærlighed interesse . Murali stjerner som Singaperumal , en politibetjent, der inspirerer og guider Gemini i hans forsøg på at reformere . De stemmer omfatter Kalabhavan Mani som den vigtigste antagonist, mens Vinu Chakravarthy , Manorama og Thennavan skildre betydelige roller . Baseret på bandekrige i Chennai , filmen dykker ned i livet for fredløse og de roller, politiet og samfundet spiller i deres rehabilitering og accept .   I begyndelsen af 2001 reformerede rivaliserende gangstere '' Vellai '' Ravi og Chera sig med protektion af en politibetjent . Saran var inspireret af denne hændelse og scripted en historie baseret på det . Filmen var oprindeligt titlen Erumugam med Ajith Kumar beregnet til at spille hovedrollen, men projektet blev lagt på hylden efter en uges skyde, når Ajith mistet interessen og venstre . Saran omarbejdet scriptet , omdøbt produktionen Gemini og kaste de nye kundeemner . Det genoplivede projekt blev annonceret i august 2001 . Produktionen begyndte kort tid efter i december samme år og var afsluttet i marts 2002 . Filmen blev skudt primært på AVM Studios i Chennai , mens to sang sekvenser blev filmet i Schweiz . Filmen havde filmvidenskab af A. Venkatesh og redigering af Suresh Urs, mens soundtracket blev scoret af Bharathwaj .   Filmens soundtrack blev godt modtaget , med sangen '' O Podu '' bliver en sensation i Tamil Nadu . Gemini blev udgivet to dage før det tamilske nytår den 12. Filmen , der blev fremstillet til en anslået pris på , og som blev årets mest indbringende tamilske film . Filmens succes , i vid udstrækning tilskrives populariteten af '' O Podu '' , genoplivet den tamilske filmindustri , som havde problemer efter en række box office fiaskoer . Filmen vandt tre Filmfare Awards , tre ITFA Awards og fire Cinema Express Awards . Senere samme år , Saran genskabt filmen i Telugu som Gemeni .
evidence_en: Gemini is a 2002 Indian Tamil-language action film written and directed by Saran and produced by AVM Productions . The film features Vikram in the title role of a small-time criminal and aspiring don who , after falling in love , decides to refrain from crime ; Kiran Rathod plays his love interest . Murali stars as Singaperumal , a police officer who inspires and guides Gemini in his attempts to reform . The cast includes Kalabhavan Mani as the principal antagonist while Vinu Chakravarthy , Manorama and Thennavan portray significant roles . Based on gang wars in Chennai , the film delves into the lives of outlaws and the roles the police and society play in their rehabilitation and acceptance .   In early 2001 , rival gangsters `` Vellai '' Ravi and Chera reformed themselves with the patronage of a police officer . Saran was inspired by this incident and scripted a story based on it . The film was initially entitled Erumugam with Ajith Kumar intended to play the lead role , but the project was shelved after a week 's shoot when Ajith lost interest and left . Saran reworked the script , retitled the production Gemini and cast the new leads . The revived project was announced in August 2001 . Production began shortly afterwards in December the same year and was completed by March 2002 . The film was shot mainly at the AVM Studios in Chennai , while two song sequences were filmed in Switzerland . The film had cinematography by A. Venkatesh and editing by Suresh Urs while the soundtrack was scored by Bharathwaj .   The film 's soundtrack was well received , with the song `` O Podu '' becoming a sensation in Tamil Nadu . Gemini was released two days ahead of the Tamil New Year on 12 April 2002 and received mixed reviews from critics , with praise directed towards the performances of Vikram and Mani but criticism towards Saran 's script . Made at an estimated cost of , the film earned at the box office and became the highest-grossing Tamil film of the year . The film 's success , largely attributed to the popularity of `` O Podu '' , resurrected the Tamil film industry , which was experiencing difficulties after a series of box office failures . The film won three Filmfare Awards , three ITFA Awards and four Cinema Express Awards . Later that same year , Saran remade the film in Telugu as Gemeni .

evidence_da: Jacqueline Ruth '' Jacki '' Weaver , AO -LRB- født 25 Maj 1947 -RRB- er en australsk teater , film , og tv-skuespiller . Hun er kendt internationalt for sine præstationer i Animal Kingdom -LRB- 2010 -RRB- og Silver Linings Playbook -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , som begge gav hende en nominering til en Oscar for bedste kvindelige birolle .   Weaver opstod i 1970'erne som et symbol på den australske New Wave gennem hendes arbejde i Ozploitation film som Stork -LRB- 1971 -RRB- , Alvin Purple -LRB- 1973 -RRB- og Petersen -LRB- 1974 -RRB- . I 2005 udgav hun sin selvbiografi med titlen Much Love , Jac .
evidence_en: Jacqueline Ruth `` Jacki '' Weaver , AO -LRB- born 25 May 1947 -RRB- is an Australian theatre , film , and television actress . She is known internationally for her performances in Animal Kingdom -LRB- 2010 -RRB- and Silver Linings Playbook -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , both of which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress .   Weaver emerged in the 1970s as a symbol of the Australian New Wave through her work in Ozploitation films such as Stork -LRB- 1971 -RRB- , Alvin Purple -LRB- 1973 -RRB- and Petersen -LRB- 1974 -RRB- . In 2005 , she released her autobiography titled Much Love , Jac .

evidence_da: Animal Kingdom er en australsk krimifilm fra 2010 skrevet og instrueret af David Michôd og med Ben Mendelsohn , Joel Edgerton , Guy Pearce , James Frecheville , Luke Ford , Jacki Weaver og Sullivan Stapleton i hovedrollerne .   Michôd 's script var inspireret af begivenheder, der involverede Pettingill kriminelle familie i Melbourne , Australien . I 1991 , to brødre Trevor Pettingill og Victor Peirce-LRB- sammen med to andre mænd : Anthony Leigh Farrell og Peter David McEvoy-RRB- blev frikendt i 1988 skyde mord på to victorianske politibetjente .   Animal Kingdom blev kritikerrost . Det modtog 36 priser og 39 nomineringer , og Jacki Weaver modtaget flere priser for hendes præstation , herunder en Academy Award nominering for bedste kvindelige birolle .
evidence_en: Animal Kingdom is a 2010 Australian crime film written and directed by David Michôd , and starring Ben Mendelsohn , Joel Edgerton , Guy Pearce , James Frecheville , Luke Ford , Jacki Weaver , and Sullivan Stapleton .   Michôd 's script was inspired by events which involved the Pettingill criminal family of Melbourne , Australia . In 1991 , two brothers Trevor Pettingill and Victor Peirce -LRB- along with two other men : Anthony Leigh Farrell and Peter David McEvoy -RRB- were acquitted in the 1988 shooting murder of two Victorian police officers .   Animal Kingdom was critically acclaimed . It received 36 awards and 39 nominations , and Jacki Weaver received multiple awards for her performance , including an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress .

evidence_da: Interpersonel psykoterapi -LRB- IPT-RRB- er en kort, vedhæftet fil-fokuseret psykoterapi, der centrerer sig om at løse interpersonelle problemer og symptomatisk genopretning. Det er en empirisk understøttet behandling -LRB- EST -RRB- der følger en meget struktureret og tidsbegrænset tilgang og er beregnet til at blive afsluttet inden for 12 - 16 uger . IPT er baseret på princippet om, at relationer og livsbegivenheder påvirker humør, og at det modsatte også er tilfældet . Det blev udviklet af Gerald Klerman og Myrna Weissman for svær depression i 1970'erne og er siden blevet tilpasset til andre psykiske lidelser . IPT er en empirisk valideret intervention for depressive lidelser, og er mere effektiv, når de anvendes i kombination med psykiatrisk medicin . Sammen med kognitiv adfærdsterapi -LRB- CBT -RRB-, IPT anbefales i behandling retningslinjer som en psykosocial behandling af valg, og IPT og CBT er de eneste psykosociale indgreb, hvor psykiatri beboere i USA er bemyndiget til at være uddannet til professionel praksis.
evidence_en: Interpersonal psychotherapy -LRB- IPT -RRB- is a brief , attachment-focused psychotherapy that centers on resolving interpersonal problems and symptomatic recovery . It is an empirically supported treatment -LRB- EST -RRB- that follows a highly structured and time-limited approach and is intended to be completed within 12 -- 16 weeks . IPT is based on the principle that relationships and life events impact mood and that the reverse is also true . It was developed by Gerald Klerman and Myrna Weissman for major depression in the 1970s and has since been adapted for other mental disorders . IPT is an empirically validated intervention for depressive disorders , and is more effective when used in combination with psychiatric medications . Along with cognitive behavioral therapy -LRB- CBT -RRB- , IPT is recommended in treatment guidelines as a psychosocial treatment of choice , and IPT and CBT are the only psychosocial interventions in which psychiatry residents in the United States are mandated to be trained for professional practice .

evidence_da: Toy Story er en amerikansk computeranimeret buddy comedy film fra 1995 produceret af Pixar Animation Studios og udgivet af Walt Disney Pictures. Den instruktør debut af John Lasseter , Toy Story var den første feature-længde computer-animerede film og den første teatralske film produceret af Pixar .   Finder sted i en verden, hvor antropomorfe legetøj foregive at være livløs, når mennesker er til stede, filmen 's plot fokuserer på forholdet mellem Woody , en gammeldags pullstring cowboy dukke-LRB-stemme af Tom Hanks-RRB-, og Buzz Lightyear , en astronaut action figur-LRB-stemme af Tim Allen-RRB-, som de udvikler sig fra rivaler konkurrerer om kærlighed andy , deres ejer , til venner, der arbejder sammen om at blive genforenet med Andy som hans familie forbereder sig på at flytte til et nyt hjem . Manuskriptet er skrevet af Joss Whedon , Andrew Stanton , Joel Cohen og Alec Sokolow , baseret på en historie af Lasseter , Pete Docter , Stanton og Joe Ranft . Filmen indeholder musik af Randy Newman , og blev executive-produceret af Steve Jobs og Edwin Catmull .   Pixar , som producerede korte animerede film til at fremme deres computere , blev kontaktet af Disney til at producere en computer-animeret funktion efter succesen med deres kortfilm Tin Toy -LRB- 1988 -RRB-, som er fortalt fra et lille stykke legetøj 's perspektiv . Lasseter , Stanton og Docter skrev tidlige historie behandlinger, som blev smidt ud af Disney , da de ønskede, at filmen skal edgier . Efter katastrofale historie ruller , produktionen blev standset, og scriptet blev omskrevet, bedre afspejler tonen og temaet Pixar ønskede : at '' legetøj dybt ønsker børn til at lege med dem, og at dette ønske driver deres håb , frygt , og handlinger ''. Studiet , der dengang bestod af et relativt lille antal ansatte , producerede filmen under mindre økonomiske begrænsninger .   Udgivet i teatre på November 22 , 1995 , Toy Story var den højest indtjenende film på sin åbningsweekend og tjente over $ 373 millioner på verdensplan . Filmen blev meget rost af kritikere , der roste animationens tekniske innovation , vid og tematisk raffinement af manuskriptet , og opførelser af Hanks og Allen . Det er nu anses af mange kritikere for at være en af de bedste animerede film nogensinde er lavet . Filmen modtog tre Oscar-nomineringer , herunder Bedste Originale Manuskript , Best Original Score , og Bedste originale sang for '' Du 'har fået en ven i mig '' , samt vinde en Special Achievement Academy Award . Det blev optaget i det nationale filmregister som værende "" kulturelt , historisk eller æstetisk signifikant "" i 2005 , det første år for støtteberettigelse .   Ud over hjemmemedier udgivelser og teatralske genudgivelser , Toy Story-inspirerede materiale har kørt farveskala fra legetøj, videospil, forlystelsespark attraktioner, spin-offs, merchandise , og to fortsættelser - Toy Story 2 -LRB- 1999 -RRB- og Toy Story 3 -LRB- 2010 -RRB- -- bot h , som også vundet massiv kommerciel succes og kritikerros , med en tredje efterfølger , Toy Story 4 , dømt til en 2019 udgivelse .
evidence_en: Toy Story is a 1995 American computer-animated buddy comedy adventure film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures . The directorial debut of John Lasseter , Toy Story was the first feature-length computer-animated film and the first theatrical film produced by Pixar .   Taking place in a world where anthropomorphic toys pretend to be lifeless whenever humans are present , the film 's plot focuses on the relationship between Woody , an old-fashioned pullstring cowboy doll -LRB- voiced by Tom Hanks -RRB- , and Buzz Lightyear , an astronaut action figure -LRB- voiced by Tim Allen -RRB- , as they evolve from rivals competing for the affections of Andy , their owner , to friends who work together to be reunited with Andy as his family prepares to move to a new home . The screenplay was written by Joss Whedon , Andrew Stanton , Joel Cohen and Alec Sokolow , based on a story by Lasseter , Pete Docter , Stanton and Joe Ranft . The film features music by Randy Newman , and was executive-produced by Steve Jobs and Edwin Catmull .   Pixar , which produced short animated films to promote their computers , was approached by Disney to produce a computer-animated feature after the success of their short film Tin Toy -LRB- 1988 -RRB- , which is told from a small toy 's perspective . Lasseter , Stanton and Docter wrote early story treatments which were thrown out by Disney , as they wanted the film to be edgier .
