evidence_da: Logi eller feriebolig er en form for bolig. Folk, der rejser og holde sig væk fra huset i mere end en dag har brug for logi for søvn, hvile, mad, sikkerhed, ly for kolde temperaturer eller regn, opbevaring af bagage og adgang til fælles husholdningsfunktioner.   Logi kan være egenforplejning, i hvilket tilfælde der ikke er mad til rådighed, men der er madlavningsfaciliteter til rådighed.   Logi sker på et hotel, motel, hostel eller hostal, et privat hjem -LRB - kommercielle, dvs.
evidence_en: Lodging or a holiday accommodation is a type of residential accommodation . People who travel and stay away from house for more than a day need lodging for sleep , rest , food , safety , shelter from cold temperatures or rain , storage of luggage and access to common household functions .   Lodgings may be self-catering , in which case no food is provided , but cooking facilities are available .   Lodging is done in a hotel , motel , hostel or hostal , a private home -LRB- commercial , i.e. a bed and breakfast , a guest house , a vacation rental , or non-commercially , with members of hospitality services or in the home of friends -RRB- , in a tent , caravan/camper -LRB- often on a campsite -RRB- .

evidence_da: American Broadcasting Company -LRB- ABC -RRB- er et amerikansk engelsksproget kommercielt tv-net, der ejes af Disney - ABC Television Group , et datterselskab af Disney Media Networks division af The Walt Disney Company . Netværket har hovedkvarter på Columbus Avenue og West 66th Street på Manhattan , New York City . Der er yderligere større kontorer og produktionsfaciliteter andre steder i New York City, samt i Los Angeles og Burbank , Californien .   Siden 2007 , da ABC Radio -LRB - også kendt som Cumulus Media Networks -RRB - blev solgt til Citadel Broadcasting , har ABC reduceret sine radio - og tv - næsten udelukkende til tv . Det femteældste store radio- og tv-net i verden og det yngste af de tre store tv-net , ABC er ofte kælenavnet som '' The Alphabet Network '' , som initialismen også repræsenterer de første tre bogstaver i det engelske alfabet , for .   ABC oprindeligt lanceret i oktober 12 , 1943 , som et radionetværk , adskilt fra og tjener som efterfølger til NBC Blue Network , som var blevet købt af Edward J. Noble . Det udvidede sine aktiviteter til tv i 1948 , i fodsporene på etablerede broadcast-netværk CBS og NBC . I midten af 1950'erne fusionerede ABC med United Paramount Theatres , en kæde af biografer , der tidligere fungerede som et datterselskab af Paramount Pictures . Leonard Goldenson , der havde været leder af UPT , gjorde det nye tv-net rentabelt ved at hjælpe med at udvikle og grønt lys mange succesfulde serier . I 1980'erne fusionerede netværkets moderselskab , American Broadcasting Companies , Inc. , fusioneret med Capital Cities Communications , ejer af flere trykte publikationer og tv - og radiostationer . I 1996 blev de fleste af Capital Cities /ABC's aktiver købt af The Walt Disney Company .   Tv-nettet har otte ejede og opererede og over 232 tilknyttede tv-stationer i hele USA og dets territorier . De fleste canadiere har adgang til mindst én amerikansk-baserede ABC affiliate , enten over-the-air-LRB-i områder i nærheden af Canada - USA grænse-RRB- eller via et kabel , satellit eller IPTV udbyder , selv om de fleste ABC-programmer er underlagt samtidige substitutionsregler pålagt af den canadiske Radio-tv og Telekommunikation Kommissionen, der tillader betalings-tv-udbydere til at erstatte en amerikansk station 's signal med foder et canadisk tv-selskab til at beskytte indenlandske programmering rettigheder og reklameindtægter . ABC News leverer nyheder og funktioner indhold til udvalgte radiostationer, der ejes af Citadel Broadcasting , som købte ABC Radio egenskaber i 2007 .
evidence_en: The American Broadcasting Company -LRB- ABC -RRB- is an American English language commercial broadcast television network that is owned by the Disney -- ABC Television Group , a subsidiary of the Disney Media Networks division of The Walt Disney Company . The network is headquartered on Columbus Avenue and West 66th Street in Manhattan , New York City . There are additional major offices and production facilities elsewhere in New York City , as well as in Los Angeles and Burbank , California .   Since 2007 , when ABC Radio -LRB- also known as Cumulus Media Networks -RRB- was sold to Citadel Broadcasting , ABC has reduced its broadcasting operations almost exclusively to television . The fifth-oldest major broadcasting network in the world and the youngest of the Big Three television networks , ABC is often nicknamed as `` The Alphabet Network '' , as its initialism also represents the first three letters of the English alphabet , in order .   ABC originally launched on October 12 , 1943 , as a radio network , separated from and serving as the successor to the NBC Blue Network , which had been purchased by Edward J. Noble . It extended its operations to television in 1948 , following in the footsteps of established broadcast networks CBS and NBC . In the mid-1950s , ABC merged with United Paramount Theatres , a chain of movie theaters that formerly operated as a subsidiary of Paramount Pictures . Leonard Goldenson , who had been the head of UPT , made the new television network profitable by helping develop and greenlight many successful series . In the 1980s , after purchasing an 80 % interest in cable sports channel ESPN , the network 's corporate parent , American Broadcasting Companies , Inc. , merged with Capital Cities Communications , owner of several print publications , and television and radio stations . In 1996 , most of Capital Cities/ABC 's assets were purchased by The Walt Disney Company .   The television network has eight owned-and-operated and over 232 affiliated television stations throughout the United States and its territories . Most Canadians have access to at least one U.S.-based ABC affiliate , either over-the-air -LRB- in areas located within proximity to the Canada -- United States border -RRB- or through a cable , satellite or IPTV provider , although most ABC programs are subject to simultaneous substitution regulations imposed by the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission that allow pay television providers to replace an American station 's signal with the feed of a Canadian broadcaster to protect domestic programming rights and advertising revenue . ABC News provides news and features content for select radio stations owned by Citadel Broadcasting , which purchased the ABC Radio properties in 2007 .

evidence_da: Rodman Edward '' Rod '' Serling-LRB- December 25 , 1924 - Juni 28 , 1975 -RRB- var en amerikansk manuskriptforfatter , dramatiker , tv-producent , og fortælleren kendt for sin live tv-dramaer i 1950'erne og hans science-fiction antologi tv-serie , The Twilight Zone. Serling var aktiv i politik , både på og uden for skærmen , og hjalp med at danne tv-industri standarder . Han var kendt som '' vred ung mand '' i Hollywood , sammenstød med tv-ledere og sponsorer over en bred vifte af spørgsmål, herunder censur, racisme og krig .
evidence_en: Rodman Edward `` Rod '' Serling -LRB- December 25 , 1924 -- June 28 , 1975 -RRB- was an American screenwriter , playwright , television producer , and narrator known for his live television dramas of the 1950s and his science-fiction anthology TV series , The Twilight Zone . Serling was active in politics , both on and off the screen , and helped form television industry standards . He was known as the `` angry young man '' of Hollywood , clashing with television executives and sponsors over a wide range of issues including censorship , racism , and war .

evidence_da: Et ekstremt miljø indeholder forhold, der er svære at overleve for de fleste kendte livsformer. Disse forhold kan være ekstremt høje eller lave temperaturer eller tryk; højt eller lavt indhold af ilt eller kuldioxid i atmosfæren høje niveauer af stråling , surhedsgrad eller alkalinitet ; fravær af vand; vand, der indeholder en høj koncentration af salt eller sukker forekomst af svovl , olie og andre giftige stoffer .   Eksempler på ekstreme miljøer omfatter de geografiske poler, meget tørre ørkener, vulkaner, dybe havskyttegrave, øvre atmosfære, Mt Everest, det ydre rum og miljøet på hver planet i solsystemet undtagen Jorden . Alle organismer , der lever under disse forhold , er ofte meget godt tilpasset deres levevilkår , hvilket normalt er et resultat af den langsigtede udvikling . Fysiologer har længe vidst, at organismer, der lever i ekstreme miljøer er særligt tilbøjelige til at udstille klare eksempler på evolutionær tilpasning på grund af den formentlig intense fortid naturlige udvælgelse, de har oplevet .
evidence_en: An extreme environment contains conditions that are hard to survive for most known life forms . These conditions may be extremely high or low temperature or pressure ; high or low content of oxygen or carbon dioxide in the atmosphere ; high levels of radiation , acidity , or alkalinity ; absence of water ; water containing a high concentration of salt or sugar ; presence of sulphur , petroleum , and other toxic substances .   Examples of extreme environments include the geographical poles , very dry deserts , volcanoes , deep ocean trenches , upper atmosphere , Mt Everest , outer space , and the environments of every planet in the Solar System except the Earth . Any organisms living in these conditions are often very well adapted to their living circumstances , which is usually a result of long-term evolution . Physiologists have long known that organisms living in extreme environments are especially likely to exhibit clear examples of evolutionary adaptation because of the presumably intense past natural selection they have experienced .

evidence_da: Østrig -LRB- lyt -RRB-, er en forbundsrepublik og et indlandsland med over 8,7 millioner mennesker i Centraleuropa . Det grænser op til Tjekkiet og Tyskland mod nord , Ungarn og Slovakiet mod øst , Slovenien og Italien mod syd , og Schweiz og Liechtenstein mod vest . Østrigs område dækker 83879 km2 . Terrænet er meget bjergrigt, liggende i Alperne; kun 32 % af landet er under 500 m , og det højeste punkt er 3798 m . Størstedelen af befolkningen taler lokale bayerske dialekter af tysk som deres modersmål , og østrigsk tysk i sin standardform er landets officielle sprog . Andre lokale officielle sprog er ungarsk, burgenland kroatisk og slovensk .   Oprindelsen af moderne Østrig går tilbage til tidspunktet for det habsburgske dynasti, hvor langt størstedelen af landet var en del af det tysk-romerske imperium. Fra reformationens tid brugte mange nordtyske fyrster , der var utilfredse kejserens autoritet , protestantismen som oprørets flag . Trediveårskrigen - kongeriget Sveriges og Kongeriget Frankrigs indflydelse - kongeriget Preussens fremmarch og Napoleons invasioner svækkede alle kejserens magt i det nordlige Tyskland - men i syd - og i ikke-tyske områder af imperiet . , kejseren og katolicismen opretholdt kontrol . i løbet af 1700- og 1700-tallet beholdt Østrig sin position som en af Europas stormagter , og som svar på Napoleons kroning som kejser af det franske blev det østrigske imperium officielt proklameret i 1804 . Efter Napoleons nederlag viste Preussen sig som Østrigs største konkurrent til reglen om et større Tyskland . Østrigs nederlag til Preussen i slaget ved Königgrätz under den østrig-preussiske krig i 1866 banede vejen for , at Preussen kunne genvinde kontrollen over resten af Tyskland . I 1867 blev imperiet reformeret til Østrig-Ungarn . Efter Frankrigs nederlag i den fransk-preussiske krig i 1870-1 blev Østrig udelukket fra det nye tyske imperium , om end i de følgende årtier , dets politik og dets udenrigspolitik , i stigende grad konvergerede med det preussiske imperiums . juni 1914 erklærede krisen i juli 1914 krig mod Serbien, fordi landet ikke fuldt ud havde overholdt en østrigsk Ultimatum. Østrig var således den første til at gå i krig i juli-krisen , som i sidste ende ville eskalere til Første Verdenskrig.   Efter sammenbruddet af habsburg -LRB- Austro-hungarian -RRB-Empire i 1918 i slutningen af Første Verdenskrig , Østrig vedtaget og brugt navnet Republikken Tysk-Østrig -LRB- Deutschösterreich -RRB-, senere ændret til Österreich , i et forsøg på union med Tyskland , men dette blev forbudt i henhold til traktaten Saint-Germain-en-Laye -LRB- 1919 -RRB- . Den Første Østrigske Republik blev oprettet i 1919 . I 1938 annekterede Nazityskland Østrig i Anschluss . Dette varede indtil slutningen af Anden Verdenskrig i 1945 , hvorefter Tyskland var besat af de allierede , og Østrigs tidligere demokratiske forfatning blev genoprettet . I 1955 genindførte den østrigske statstraktat Østrig som en suveræn stat , der afsluttede besættelsen . Samme år oprettede det østrigske parlament neutralitetserklæringen , hvori det erklærede , at Den Anden Østrigske Republik ville blive permanent neutral .   I dag er Østrig et parlamentarisk repræsentativt demokrati bestående af ni delstater . Hovedstaden og største by , med en befolkning på over 1,7 millioner , er Wien . Andre større byområder i Østrig omfatter Graz , Linz , Salzburg og Innsbruck . Østrig er et af de rigeste lande i verden med et nominelt BNP pr. indbygger på 43.724 dollar . Landet har udviklet en høj levestandard og blev i 2014 rangeret som nummer 21 i verden for sit humanudviklingsindeks. Østrig har været medlem af FN siden 1955 , tiltrådte Den Europæiske Union i 1995 og er grundlægger af OECD . Østrig undertegnede også Schengen-aftalen i 1995 og indførte euroen i 1999 .
evidence_en: Austria -LRB- listen -RRB- , is a federal republic and a landlocked country of over 8.7 million people in Central Europe . It is bordered by the Czech Republic and Germany to the north , Hungary and Slovakia to the east , Slovenia and Italy to the south , and Switzerland and Liechtenstein to the west . The territory of Austria covers 83879 km2 . The terrain is highly mountainous , lying within the Alps ; only 32 % of the country is below 500 m , and its highest point is 3798 m . The majority of the population speaks local Bavarian dialects of German as their native language , and Austrian German in its standard form is the country 's official language . Other local official languages are Hungarian , Burgenland Croatian , and Slovene .   The origins of modern-day Austria date back to the time of the Habsburg dynasty , when the vast majority of the country was a part of the Holy Roman Empire . From the time of the Reformation , many northern German princes , resenting the authority of the Emperor , used Protestantism as a flag of rebellion . The Thirty Years War , the influence of the Kingdom of Sweden and Kingdom of France , the rise of the Kingdom of Prussia , and the Napoleonic invasions all weakened the power of the Emperor in the north of Germany , but in the south , and in non-German areas of the Empire , the Emperor and Catholicism maintained control . During the 17th and 18th centuries , Austria retained its position as one of the great powers of Europe and , in response to the coronation of Napoleon as the Emperor of the French , the Austrian Empire was officially proclaimed in 1804 . Following Napoleon 's defeat , Prussia emerged as Austria 's chief competitor for rule of a greater Germany . Austria 's defeat by Prussia at the Battle of Königgrätz , during the Austro-Prussian War of 1866 , cleared the way for Prussia to assert control over the rest of Germany . In 1867 , the empire was reformed into Austria-Hungary . After the defeat of France in the 1870-1 Franco-Prussian War , Austria was excluded from the new German Empire , although in the following decades , its politics , and its foreign policy , increasingly converged with those of the Prussian-led Empire . During the 1914 July Crisis that followed the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria on June 28 , Austria-Hungary , emboldened by a pledge of German support , on July 28 declared war on Serbia because that country had not fully complied with an Austrian ultimatum . Austria was thus the first to go to war in the July Crisis , which would ultimately escalate into World War I.   After the collapse of the Habsburg -LRB- Austro-Hungarian -RRB- Empire in 1918 at the end of World War I , Austria adopted and used the name the Republic of German-Austria -LRB- Deutschösterreich -RRB- , later changed to Österreich , in an attempt at union with Germany , but this was forbidden under the Treaty of Saint-Germain-en-Laye -LRB- 1919 -RRB- . The First Austrian Republic was established in 1919 . In 1938 Nazi Germany annexed Austria in the Anschluss . This lasted until the end of World War II in 1945 , after which Germany was occupied by the Allies and Austria 's former democratic constitution was restored . In 1955 , the Austrian State Treaty re-established Austria as a sovereign state , ending the occupation . In the same year , the Austrian Parliament created the Declaration of Neutrality which declared that the Second Austrian Republic would become permanently neutral .   Today , Austria is a parliamentary representative democracy comprising nine federal states . The capital and largest city , with a population exceeding 1.7 million , is Vienna . Other major urban areas of Austria include Graz , Linz , Salzburg and Innsbruck . Austria is one of the richest countries in the world , with a nominal per capita GDP of $ 43,724 . The country has developed a high standard of living and in 2014 was ranked 21st in the world for its Human Development Index . Austria has been a member of the United Nations since 1955 , joined the European Union in 1995 , and is a founder of the OECD . Austria also signed the Schengen Agreement in 1995 , and adopted the euro currency in 1999 .

evidence_da: Crash er en amerikansk ensemble dramafilm fra 2004 , der er skrevet , produceret og instrueret af Paul Haggis . Filmen handler om racemæssige og sociale spændinger i Los Angeles . En selvbeskrevet '' passion stykke '' for Haggis , Crash var inspireret af en real-life hændelse , hvor hans Porsche blev carjacked i 1991 uden for en video butik på Wilshire Boulevard .   Flere tegns historier flettes i løbet af to dage i Los Angeles : en sort detektiv fremmedgjort fra sin mor; hans kriminelle lillebror og bandemedarbejder; den hvide distriktadvokat og hans irriterede , forkælede kone; en racistisk hvid politibetjent, der afskyr sin mere idealistiske yngre partner; en afrikansk-amerikansk Hollywood-instruktør, hvis kone skal beskæftige sig med officer; en persisk-indvandrer far, der er på vagt over for andre; og en hårdtarbejdende spansktalende låsesmed familie mand .   Filmen omhandler racisme i en temmelig upartisk tilgang; i stedet for at adskille personerne i ofre og lovovertrædere , viser ofre for racisme sig ofte at være skadet i forskellige sammenhænge og situationer; racistiske bemærkninger og handlinger er ofte vist sig at stamme fra uvidenhed og misforståelse snarere end ondskab .   Filmen indeholder et ensemble stemmer herunder , Sandra Bullock , Don Cheadle , Matt Dillon , Jennifer Esposito , William Fichtner , Brendan Fraser , Terrence Howard , Chris '' Ludacris '' Bridges , Thandie Newton , Michael Peña , og Ryan Phillippe . Matt Dillon blev især rost for sin præstation og modtog Academy Award , BAFTA , Golden Globe og Screen Actors Guild Award nomineringer for bedste mandlige birolle . Derudover vandt skuespillerne Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance af en Cast in a Motion Picture . Filmen modtog seks Oscar-nomineringer , herunder Bedste Billede og bedste instruktør for Paul Haggis , og vandt tre for bedste film , bedste originale manuskript , og bedste filmredigering på 78th Academy Awards . Det var også nomineret til ni BAFTA priser , og vandt to , for bedste originale manuskript og bedste kvindelige birolle for Thandie Newton .
evidence_en: Crash is a 2004 American ensemble drama film co-written , produced , and directed by Paul Haggis . The film is about racial and social tensions in Los Angeles . A self-described `` passion piece '' for Haggis , Crash was inspired by a real-life incident , in which his Porsche was carjacked in 1991 outside a video store on Wilshire Boulevard .   Several characters ' stories interweave during two days in Los Angeles : a black detective estranged from his mother ; his criminal younger brother and gang associate ; the white district attorney and his irritated , pampered wife ; a racist white police officer who disgusts his more idealistic younger partner ; an African-American Hollywood director whose wife must deal with the officer ; a Persian-immigrant father who is wary of others ; and a hard-working Hispanic locksmith family man .   The film deals with racism in a rather impartial approach ; rather than separating the characters into victims and offenders , victims of racism are often shown to be prejudiced themselves in different contexts and situations ; racist remarks and actions are often shown to stem from ignorance and misconception rather than malice .   The film features an ensemble cast including , Sandra Bullock , Don Cheadle , Matt Dillon , Jennifer Esposito , William Fichtner , Brendan Fraser , Terrence Howard , Chris `` Ludacris '' Bridges , Thandie Newton , Michael Peña , and Ryan Phillippe . Matt Dillon was particularly praised for his performance and received Academy Award , BAFTA , Golden Globe and Screen Actors Guild Award nominations for Best Supporting Actor . Additionally , the cast won the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture . The film received six Academy Award nominations , including Best Picture and Best Director for Paul Haggis , and won three for Best Picture , Best Original Screenplay , and Best Film Editing at the 78th Academy Awards . It was also nominated for nine BAFTA awards , and won two , for Best Original Screenplay and Best Supporting Actress for Thandie Newton .

evidence_en: Sandra Annette Bullock -LRB- -LSB- 's ændrə_ˈbʊlək -RSB- born July 26 , 1964 -RRB- is an American actress , producer , and philanthropist .   Bullock made her acting debut with a minor role in the 1987 thriller Hangmen , and made her television debut in the film Bionic Showdown : The Six Million Dollar Man and the Bionic Woman -LRB- 1989 -RRB- , and played the lead role in the short-lived NBC sitcom Working Girl . Her breakthrough role was in the film Demolition Man -LRB- 1993 -RRB- . She subsequently starred in several successful films including Speed -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , While You Were Sleeping -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , The Net -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , A Time to Kill -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , Hope Floats -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , and Practical Magic -LRB- 1998 -RRB- .   Bullock achieved further success in the following decades in Miss Congeniality -LRB- 2000 -RRB- , Two Weeks Notice -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , Crash -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , The Proposal -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , and The Heat -LRB- 2013 -RRB- . She was awarded the Academy Award for Best Actress and the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress in a Drama for playing Leigh Anne Tuohy in The Blind Side -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , and was nominated in the same categories for her performance in Gravity -LRB- 2013 -RRB- . Bullock 's greatest commercial success is the animated comedy film Minions -LRB- 2015 -RRB- , which grossed over US$ 1 billion at the box office . In 2007 , she was one of Hollywood 's highest-paid actresses . She was also named `` Most Beautiful Woman '' by People magazine in 2015 .   In addition to her acting career , Bullock is the founder of the production company Fortis Films . She has produced some of the films in which she starred , including Two Weeks Notice , Miss Congeniality 2 : Armed and Fabulous , and All About Steve . She was an executive producer of the ABC sitcom , George Lopez , and made several appearances during its run .

evidence_en: Harry Edward Styles -LRB- born 1 February 1994 -RRB- is an English singer and songwriter . He is known as a member of the pop boy band One Direction . He made his debut as a singer with his band White Eskimo , who performed locally in Holmes Chapel , Cheshire . In 2010 , Styles auditioned as a solo artist for the British television series The X Factor . After being eliminated as a solo performer , Styles was brought back into the competition , along with four other contestants , Niall Horan , Zayn Malik , Liam Payne and Louis Tomlinson , to form One Direction .   Styles and his bandmates have released the albums Up All Night -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , Take Me Home -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Midnight Memories -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , Four -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , and Made in the A.M. -LRB- 2015 -RRB- . They have also performed on two worldwide tours , one featured on concert film One Direction : This Is Us , and won several awards , including five Brit Awards and four MTV Video Music Awards .   On 23 June 2016 it was reported by Billboard that Styles had signed a three-album solo recording deal with Columbia Records , the same label behind One Direction . Styles will make his acting debut in the war film Dunkirk in July 2017 . Preceded by its first solo single `` Sign of the Times '' , his self-titled debut album was released on 12 May 2017 .

evidence_da: The Sopranos er en amerikansk kriminalitet drama tv-serie skabt af David Chase . Historien drejer sig om den fiktive karakter , New Jersey-baserede italienske amerikanske gangster Tony Soprano-LRB- James Gandolfini-RRB- . Serien skildrer de vanskeligheder, han står over for, da han forsøger at afbalancere de modstridende krav i sit hjem liv og hans kriminelle organisation . Disse er ofte fremhævet under hans terapi sessioner med psykiater Jennifer Melfi-LRB- Lorraine Bracco-RRB-. . Serien indeholder Tony 's familiemedlemmer, mafia kolleger og rivaler , i fremtrædende roller og historie buer , især hans kone Carmela -LRB- Edie Falco-RRB- og protegé Christopher Moltisanti-LRB- Michael Imperioli-RRB-. .   Efter at piloten blev bestilt i 1997 , havde showet premiere på premium kabelnettet HBO i USA den 10 . Serien gik derefter gennem syndikering og er blevet sendt på A&E i USA og internationalt . The Sopranos blev produceret af HBO , Chase Films , og Brad Grey Television . Det blev primært filmet på Silvercup Studios , New York City , og på stedet i New Jersey. De udøvende producenter i hele showets løb var David Chase , Brad Grey , Robin Green , Mitchell Burgess , Ilene S. Landress , Terence Winter , og Matthew Weiner .   The Sopranos er bredt anerkendt som en af de største tv-serie gennem tiderne . Serien vandt også et væld af priser , herunder Peabody Awards for sine første to sæsoner , 21 Primetime Emmy Awards og fem Golden Globe Awards . En fast bestanddel af 2000'erne amerikanske populærkultur , serien har været genstand for kritisk analyse , kontroverser , og parodi . Det har affødt bøger , et videospil , high-charting soundtrack albums , og en stor mængde af diverse merchandise . Flere medlemmer af showets stemmer og besætning, der tidligere var stort set ukendt for offentligheden har haft en vellykket karriere efter The Sopranos . I 2013 , Writers Guild of America opkaldt The Sopranos den bedst skrevne tv-serie af hele tiden , mens TV Guide rangeret det den bedste tv-serie gennem tiderne .
evidence_en: The Sopranos is an American crime drama television series created by David Chase . The story revolves around the fictional character , New Jersey-based Italian American mobster Tony Soprano -LRB- James Gandolfini -RRB- . The series portrays the difficulties he faces as he tries to balance the conflicting requirements of his home life and his criminal organization . These are often highlighted during his therapy sessions with psychiatrist Jennifer Melfi -LRB- Lorraine Bracco -RRB- . The series features Tony 's family members , mafia colleagues and rivals , in prominent roles and story arcs , most notably his wife Carmela -LRB- Edie Falco -RRB- and protégé Christopher Moltisanti -LRB- Michael Imperioli -RRB- .   After the pilot was ordered in 1997 , the show premiered on the premium cable network HBO in the United States on January 10 , 1999 , and ran its six seasons with 86 episodes to June 10 , 2007 . The series then went through syndication and has been broadcast on A&E in the United States and internationally . The Sopranos was produced by HBO , Chase Films , and Brad Grey Television . It was primarily filmed at Silvercup Studios , New York City , and on location in New Jersey . The executive producers throughout the show 's run were David Chase , Brad Grey , Robin Green , Mitchell Burgess , Ilene S. Landress , Terence Winter , and Matthew Weiner .   The Sopranos is widely regarded as one of the greatest television series of all time . The series also won a multitude of awards , including Peabody Awards for its first two seasons , 21 Primetime Emmy Awards and five Golden Globe Awards . A staple of 2000s American popular culture , the series has been the subject of critical analysis , controversy , and parody . It has spawned books , a video game , high-charting soundtrack albums , and a large amount of assorted merchandise . Several members of the show 's cast and crew who were previously largely unknown to the public have had successful careers after The Sopranos . In 2013 , the Writers Guild of America named The Sopranos the best-written TV series of all time , while TV Guide ranked it the best television series of all time .

evidence_da: Sheyi Emmanuel Adebayor -LRB- -LSB- født 26 Februar 1984 -RRB- er en Togolese professionel fodboldspiller, der spiller som angriber for den tyrkiske klub İstanbul Başakşehir . Han har tidligere spillet for engelske klubber Arsenal , Manchester City , Tottenham Hotspur og Crystal Palace , samt franske sider Metz og Monaco og spanske hold Real Madrid . Han blev kåret som Årets Afrikanske Fodboldspiller for 2008 .   Adebayor repræsenterede Togo-landsholdet ved FIFA World Cup i Tyskland i 2006 , landets debut og til dato kun - optræden ved VM . I januar 2010 var Adebayor en af de involverede spillere, da Togo-holdets bus kom under beskydning på vej til Africa Cup of Nations 2010 i Angola , hvorefter han trak sig tilbage fra landsholdets pligt . I 2013 vendte han tilbage til Togo-holdet til African Cup of Nations i Sydafrika i 2013 , hvor han hjalp dem med at kvalificere sig til kvartfinalerne . Han er i øjeblikket Togo 's all-time topscorer med 31 mål .
evidence_en: Sheyi Emmanuel Adebayor -LRB- -LSB- ɛmanɥɛl adəbɛjɔʁ -RSB- ; born 26 February 1984 -RRB- is a Togolese professional footballer who plays as a striker for Turkish club İstanbul Başakşehir . He previously played for English clubs Arsenal , Manchester City , Tottenham Hotspur and Crystal Palace , as well as French sides Metz and Monaco and Spanish team Real Madrid . He was voted African Footballer of the Year for 2008 .   Adebayor represented the Togo national team at the 2006 FIFA World Cup in Germany , the country 's debut , and to date only , appearance at the World Cup . In January 2010 , Adebayor was one of the players involved when the Togo team 's bus came under gunfire on the way to the 2010 Africa Cup of Nations in Angola , after which he retired from national team duty . In 2013 , he returned to the Togo team for the 2013 African Cup of Nations in South Africa , where he helped them to qualify for the quarter-finals . He is currently Togo 's all-time top goalscorer with 31 goals .

evidence_da: Iran -LRB- י , også -RRB- , tidligere kendt som Persia , er en suveræn stat i Det Vestlige Asien . Det grænser mod nordvest af Armenien , den de facto Republikken Artsakh og Aserbajdsjan; mod nord ved Det Kaspiske Hav; mod nordøst ved Turkmenistan; mod øst af Afghanistan og Pakistan; mod syd ved Den Persiske Golf og Omanbugten; og mod vest af Tyrkiet og Irak. Det omfatter et areal på 1648195 km2 , det er det næststørste land i Mellemøsten og det 18. Officielt med 79,93 millioner indbyggere -LRB- Nov 2016 -RRB- er Iran verdens 18. Det er det eneste land med både et Kaspiske Hav og en kyst i Det Indiske Ocean. Landets centrale beliggenhed i Eurasien og Det Vestlige Asien og dets nærhed til Hormuz-strædet gør det af stor geostrategisk betydning . Iran har forskellige landskaber og geografiske forhold . Teheran er landets hovedstad og største by samt dets førende økonomiske og kulturelle centrum .   Iran er hjemsted for en af verdens ældste civilisationer , begyndende med dannelsen af de elamitske riger i det fjerde årtusinde f.Kr. Området blev først forenet og domineret af de iranske Medes i det syvende århundrede f.Kr. Iran nåede sit største omfang under Achaemenid Empire -LRB- First Persian Empire -RRB- grundlagt af Cyrus den Store i det sjette århundrede f.Kr., det største imperium verden endnu havde set , strækker sig fra Østeuropa til Indus Valley . Persien faldt til Alexander den Store i 4th century f.Kr., men dukkede op igen kort tid efter som det parthianske imperium. Under sassanerne blev Persien en førende verdensmagt i de næste fire århundreder .   århundrede e.Kr. erobrede arabere Persien og fortrængte stort set zoroastrianismens og manikæismens oprindelige tro med islams nye religion . Iranerne blev store bidragydere til den islamiske guldalder, der fulgte , producerer mange indflydelsesrige forskere , lærde , kunstnere og tænkere . Efter to århundreder begyndte en periode med forskellige iranske dynastier , selv om disse dynastier senere blev erobret af tyrkere og derefter mongolerne . En iransk national identitet blev dog altid bekræftet , idet der udviklede sig en særskilt kulturel enhed . Fremkomsten af Safavids i 1500-tallet førte til oprettelsen af Twelver Shia Islam som den officielle religion , der markerer et vendepunkt i muslimsk historie . i 1700-tallet havde Iran velsagtens kortvarigt det mest magtfulde militær på det tidspunkt under Nader Shah . Konflikter med det russiske imperium i 1800-tallet førte til betydelige territoriale tab . Folkelig uro kulminerede i den persiske forfatningsrevolution , som etablerede et konstitutionelt monarki og landets første lovgivende organ , Majles . Efter et statskup , som Det Forenede Kongerige og USA iværksatte i 1953 , blev Iran gradvist tæt på linje med Vesten og blev mere og mere autokratisk . Voksende uenighed mod udenlandsk indflydelse og politisk undertrykkelse førte til revolutionen i 1979 og oprettelsen af en islamisk republik , et politisk system, der kombinerer elementer af et parlamentarisk demokrati med et teokrati styret af islamiske jurister under begrebet "" øverste ledelse "". Ifølge internationale observatører er den nuværende iranske regering undertrykkende , idet menneskerettighedskrænkelser er almindeligt almindelige .   Et multikulturelt land bestående af mange etniske og sproglige grupper , de fleste indbyggere i Iran er shiamuslimer og persisk er det officielle sprog . De største etniske grupper i Iran er perserne , azerier , kurdere og lurs .   Iran er stiftende medlem af FN , ECO , NAM , OIC og OPEC . Iran er en stor regional og mellemmagt , og dets store reserver af fossile brændstoffer - som omfatter den største naturgasforsyning i verden og de fjerdestørste dokumenterede oliereserver - udøver betydelig indflydelse på den internationale energisikkerhed og verden Økonomi. Irans rige kulturelle arv afspejles til dels af dets 21 UNESCO World Heritage Sites , det tredjestørste antal i Asien og 11.
evidence_en: Iran -LRB- ɪ , also ɪ -RRB- , formerly known as Persia , is a sovereign state in Western Asia . It is bordered to the northwest by Armenia , the de facto Republic of Artsakh and Azerbaijan ; to the north by the Caspian Sea ; to the northeast by Turkmenistan ; to the east by Afghanistan and Pakistan ; to the south by the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman ; and to the west by Turkey and Iraq . Comprising a land area of 1648195 km2 , it is the second-largest country in the Middle East and the 18th-largest in the world . Officially with 79.93 million inhabitants -LRB- Nov 2016 -RRB- , Iran is the world 's 18th-most-populous country . It is the only country with both a Caspian Sea and an Indian Ocean coastline . The country 's central location in Eurasia and Western Asia , and its proximity to the Strait of Hormuz , make it of great geostrategic importance . Iran has diverse landscapes and geographical conditions . Tehran is the country 's capital and largest city , as well as its leading economic and cultural center .   Iran is home to one of the world 's oldest civilizations , beginning with the formation of the Elamite kingdoms in the 4th millennium BC . The area was first unified and dominated by the Iranian Medes in the 7th century BC . Iran reached its greatest extent during the Achaemenid Empire -LRB- First Persian Empire -RRB- founded by Cyrus the Great in 6th century BC , the largest empire the world had yet seen , stretching from Eastern Europe to the Indus Valley . Persia fell to Alexander the Great in 4th century BC , but reemerged shortly after as the Parthian Empire . Under the Sassanians , Persia became a leading world power for the next four centuries .   In 7th century AD , Arabs conquered Persia and largely displaced the indigenous faiths of Zoroastrianism and Manichaeism with the new religion of Islam . Iranians became major contributors to the Islamic Golden Age that followed , producing many influential scientists , scholars , artists and thinkers . After two centuries , a period of various Iranian dynasties began , although these dynasties were later conquered by Turks and then the Mongols . An Iranian national identity was always reasserted however , developing a distinct cultural entity . The rise of the Safavids in 15th century led to the establishment of Twelver Shia Islam as the official religion , marking a turning point in Muslim history . In the 18th century , Iran arguably possessed briefly the most powerful military at the time under Nader Shah . Conflicts with the Russian Empire in 19th century led to significant territorial losses . Popular unrest culminated in the Persian Constitutional Revolution , which established a constitutional monarchy and the country 's first legislative body , the Majles . Following a coup d'état instigated by the UK and the US in 1953 , Iran gradually became closely aligned with the West and grew increasingly autocratic . Growing dissent against foreign influence and political repression led to the 1979 Revolution and the establishment of an Islamic republic , a political system which combines elements of a parliamentary democracy with a theocracy governed by Islamic jurists under the concept of a `` Supreme Leadership '' . According to international observers , the current Iranian government is oppressive , with human rights abuses commonplace .   A multicultural country comprising numerous ethnic and linguistic groups , most inhabitants of Iran are Shia Muslims and Persian is the official language . The largest ethnic groups in Iran are the Persians , Azeris , Kurds and Lurs .   Iran is a founding member of the UN , ECO , NAM , OIC , and OPEC . Iran is a major regional and middle power , and its large reserves of fossil fuels -- which include the largest natural gas supply in the world and the fourth-largest proven oil reserves -- exert considerable influence in international energy security and the world economy . Iran 's rich cultural legacy is reflected in part by its 21 UNESCO World Heritage Sites , the third-largest number in Asia and 11th-largest in the world .

evidence_da: Psykologisk rædsel er en undergenre af rædsel og psykologisk fiktion , som bygger på den mentale, følelsesmæssige og psykologiske status af tegn til at skræmme eller forstyrre læsere , seere , eller spillere . Undergenren overlapper ofte den relaterede undergenre af psykologisk thriller - og den bruger ofte mystiske elementer og karakterer med ustabile , upålidelige eller forstyrrede psykologiske tilstande til at øge rammens og plottets spænding og rædsel og til at giver en samlet ubehagelig, foruroligende eller sørgelig atmosfære.
evidence_en: Psychological horror is a subgenre of horror and psychological fiction , which relies on the mental , emotional and psychological status of characters to frighten or unsettle readers , viewers , or players . The subgenre frequently overlaps with the related subgenre of psychological thriller , and it often uses mystery elements and characters with unstable , unreliable , or disturbed psychological states to enhance the suspense and horror of the setting and plot and to provide an overall unpleasant , unsettling , or distressing atmosphere .

Han har etableret sig som en af de mest kendte og populære spillere i ligaen . Wade havde den bedst sælgende trøje i NBA i næsten to år , førende ligaen i trøje salg fra 2005 NBA Playoffs , indtil midtpunktet af 2006 - 07 sæsonen .   Efter en vellykket college karriere på Marquette , Wade blev udarbejdet femte samlet i 2003 NBA udkast fra Miami Heat . Han blev opkaldt til All-Rookie holdet og All-Star holdet de følgende tolv sæsoner . Ved Sommer-OL 2008 , Førte Wade usa mænds basketball hold , almindeligvis kendt som '' Redeem Team '' , i scoring , og hjalp dem med at fange guldmedalje hædersbevisninger i Beijing , Kina . evidence_en: Dwyane Tyrone Wade Jr. -LRB- -LSB- dweɪn -RSB- ; born January 17 , 1982 -RRB- is an American professional basketball player for the Chicago Bulls of the National Basketball Association -LRB- NBA -RRB- . He has established himself as one of the most well-known and popular players in the league . Wade had the top-selling jersey in the NBA for nearly two years , leading the league in jersey sales from the 2005 NBA Playoffs , until the midpoint of the 2006 -- 07 season .   After a successful college career at Marquette , Wade was drafted fifth overall in the 2003 NBA draft by the Miami Heat . He was named to the All-Rookie team and the All-Star team the following twelve seasons . In his third season , Wade led the Heat to their first NBA championship in franchise history and was named the 2006 NBA Finals MVP . At the 2008 Summer Olympics , Wade led the United States men 's basketball team , commonly known as the `` Redeem Team '' , in scoring , and helped them capture gold medal honors in Beijing , China . In the 2008 -- 09 season , Wade led the league in scoring and earned his first NBA scoring title . With LeBron James and Chris Bosh , Wade guided Miami to four consecutive NBA Finals from 2011 to 2014 , winning back-to-back championships in 2012 and 2013 . In 2016 , Wade departed the Heat in free agency to play for the Chicago Bulls .

evidence_da: Michael Gerard Tyson -LRB- -LSB- יtaיsən -RSB- født 30 juni , 1966 -RRB- er en amerikansk tidligere professionel bokser, der konkurrerede fra 1985 til 2005 . Han regerede som den ubestridte verdensmester i sværvægt og har rekorden som den yngste bokser til at vinde en sværvægter titel på 20 år, 4 måneder og 22 dage gammel . Tyson vandt sine første 19 professionelle kampe ved knockout , 12 af dem i første runde . Han vandt WBC titel i 1986 efter at have stoppet Trevor Berbick i to runder , og tilføjede WBA og IBF titler efter at have besejret James Smith og Tony Tucker i 1987 . Dette gjorde Tyson den første sværvægter bokser til samtidig at holde WBA , WBC og IBF titler , og den eneste sværvægter til successivt forene dem .   Tyson blev lineal mester i 1988, da han slog ud Michael Spinks i 91 sekunder af første runde . Han forsvarede med succes sine titler ni gange , som omfattede sejre over Larry Holmes og Frank Bruno . I 1990 , Tyson mistede titlerne til underdog Buster Douglas , der slog ham ud i tiende runde . Forsøger at genvinde titlerne , Tyson besejrede Donovan Ruddock to gange i 1991 , men trak sig ud af en kamp med daværende ubestridte sværvægter mester Evander Holyfield-LRB- der havde besejret Douglas senere i 1990-RRB- på grund af en ribben skade .   I 1992 blev Tyson dømt for voldtægt og idømt seks års fængsel , men blev løsladt efter at have afsonet tre år . Efter sin løsladelse i 1995 , han engageret i en række comeback kampe . Han vandt WBC og WBA titler i 1996 , efter at have besejret Frank Bruno og Bruce Seldon ved knockout . Med sit nederlag bruno , Tyson sluttede Floyd Patterson , Muhammad Ali , Tim Witherspoon , Evander Holyfield , George Foreman som de eneste mænd i boksning historie at have genvundet en sværvægter mesterskab efter at have mistet det . Efter at være blevet frataget WBC titel i samme år , Tyson mistede WBA titel til Evander Holyfield ved en ellevte-runde standsning . Deres berygtede 1997 revanche sluttede, da Tyson blev diskvalificeret for at bide Holyfield ører .   I 2002 kæmpede Tyson for verdens sværvægter titel igen i en alder af 35 , taber ved knockout til Lennox Lewis . Tyson pensioneret fra professionel boksning i 2006 , efter at være blevet slået ud i træk kampe mod Danny Williams og Kevin McBride . Tyson erklæret konkurs i 2003 , på trods af at have modtaget over 30 millioner dollars for flere af hans kampe og 300 millioner dollars i løbet af sin karriere . På det tidspunkt blev det rapporteret, at han havde omkring 23 millioner dollars af gæld .   Tyson var kendt for sin glubske og skræmmende boksning stil samt hans kontroversielle adfærd i og uden for ringen . Med tilnavnet '' Iron , '' og '' Kid Dynamite '' i sin tidlige karriere , og senere kendt som '' The Baddest Man on the Planet , '' Tyson betragtes som en af de bedste sværvægtere gennem tiderne . Han blev rangeret nr ESPN.com. '' Sky Sports bedømt ham som '' den mest skræmmende bokser nogensinde , '' og beskrev ham som '' måske den mest glubske fighter til at træde ind i en professionel ring . '' Han er blevet optaget i International Boxing Hall of Fame og World Boxing Hall of Fame .
evidence_en: Michael Gerard Tyson -LRB- -LSB- ˈtaɪsən -RSB- born June 30 , 1966 -RRB- is an American former professional boxer who competed from 1985 to 2005 . He reigned as the undisputed world heavyweight champion and holds the record as the youngest boxer to win a heavyweight title at 20 years , 4 months and 22 days old . Tyson won his first 19 professional fights by knockout , 12 of them in the first round . He won the WBC title in 1986 after stopping Trevor Berbick in two rounds , and added the WBA and IBF titles after defeating James Smith and Tony Tucker in 1987 . This made Tyson the first heavyweight boxer to simultaneously hold the WBA , WBC and IBF titles , and the only heavyweight to successively unify them .   Tyson became the lineal champion in 1988 when he knocked out Michael Spinks in 91 seconds of the first round . He successfully defended his titles nine times , which included victories over Larry Holmes and Frank Bruno . In 1990 , Tyson lost the titles to underdog Buster Douglas , who knocked him out in the tenth round . Attempting to regain the titles , Tyson defeated Donovan Ruddock twice in 1991 , but pulled out of a fight with then-undisputed heavyweight champion Evander Holyfield -LRB- who had defeated Douglas later in 1990 -RRB- due to a rib injury .   In 1992 , Tyson was convicted of rape and sentenced to six years in prison , but was released after serving three years . After his release in 1995 , he engaged in a series of comeback fights . He won the WBC and WBA titles in 1996 , after defeating Frank Bruno and Bruce Seldon by knockout . With his defeat of Bruno , Tyson joined Floyd Patterson , Muhammad Ali , Tim Witherspoon , Evander Holyfield , George Foreman as the only men in boxing history to have regained a heavyweight championship after having lost it . After being stripped of the WBC title in the same year , Tyson lost the WBA title to Evander Holyfield by an eleventh-round stoppage . Their infamous 1997 rematch ended when Tyson was disqualified for biting Holyfield 's ears .   In 2002 , Tyson fought for the world heavyweight title again at the age of 35 , losing by knockout to Lennox Lewis . Tyson retired from professional boxing in 2006 , after being knocked out in consecutive matches against Danny Williams and Kevin McBride . Tyson declared bankruptcy in 2003 , despite having received over $ 30 million for several of his fights and $ 300 million during his career . At the time it was reported that he had approximately $ 23 million of debt .   Tyson was well known for his ferocious and intimidating boxing style as well as his controversial behavior inside and outside the ring . Nicknamed `` Iron , '' and `` Kid Dynamite '' in his early career , and later known as `` The Baddest Man on the Planet , '' Tyson is considered one of the best heavyweights of all time . He was ranked No. 16 on The Rings list of 100 greatest punchers of all time , and No. 1 in the ESPN.com list of `` The Hardest Hitters in Heavyweight History . '' Sky Sports rated him as `` the scariest boxer ever , '' and described him as `` perhaps the most ferocious fighter to step into a professional ring . '' He has been inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame and the World Boxing Hall of Fame .

evidence_da: John Wayne Gacy Jr. -LRB- Marts 17 , 1942 - Maj 10 , 1994 -RRB- var en amerikansk seriemorder og voldtægtsforbryder . Han seksuelt overfaldet , tortureret og myrdet mindst 33 teenage drenge og unge mænd mellem 1972 og 1978 i Cook County , Illinois-LRB- en del af hovedstadsområdet Chicago -RRB- .   Alle Gacy 's kendte mord blev begået inde i hans Norwood Park ranch hus . Hans ofre blev typisk lokket til hans adresse med magt eller bedrag , og alle undtagen et af hans ofre blev myrdet af enten kvælning eller kvælning med en improviseret årepresse; hans første offer blev stukket ihjel . Gacy begravet 26 af sine ofre i krybe rummet af sit hjem . Tre andre ofre blev begravet andre steder på hans ejendom, mens ligene af hans sidste fire kendte ofre blev kasseret i Des Plaines-floden .   Dømt for 33 mord , Gacy blev dømt til døden marts 13 , 1980 for 12 af disse drab . Han tilbragte 14 år på dødsgangen, før han endelig blev henrettet ved dødelig indsprøjtning på Stateville Correctional Center maj 10 , 1994 .   Gacy blev kendt som '' Killer Clown '' på grund af hans velgørende tjenester på fundraising arrangementer, parader, og børn 's parter, hvor han ville klæde sig som '' Pogo klovnen '', en karakter han udtænkt sig selv .
evidence_en: John Wayne Gacy Jr. -LRB- March 17 , 1942 -- May 10 , 1994 -RRB- was an American serial killer and rapist . He sexually assaulted , tortured and murdered at least 33 teenage boys and young men between 1972 and 1978 in Cook County , Illinois -LRB- a part of metropolitan Chicago -RRB- .   All of Gacy 's known murders were committed inside his Norwood Park ranch house . His victims were typically lured to his address by force or deception , and all but one of his victims were murdered by either asphyxiation or strangulation with a makeshift tourniquet ; his first victim was stabbed to death . Gacy buried 26 of his victims in the crawl space of his home . Three other victims were buried elsewhere on his property , while the bodies of his last four known victims were discarded in the Des Plaines River .   Convicted of 33 murders , Gacy was sentenced to death on March 13 , 1980 for 12 of those killings . He spent 14 years on death row before he was finally executed by lethal injection at Stateville Correctional Center on May 10 , 1994 .   Gacy became known as the `` Killer Clown '' because of his charitable services at fundraising events , parades , and children 's parties where he would dress as `` Pogo the Clown '' , a character he devised himself .

evidence_da: Nilen -LRB- النيل , egyptisk arabisk en-Nīl , Standard arabisk an-Nīl ; - P -LRB- h -RRB- iaro ; Gamle egyptiske : Ḥ ' pī og Iteru ; Bibelsk hebraisk : יווי , Ye'or-RRB- er en stor nord-strømmende flod i det nordøstlige Afrika . Det er generelt betragtes som den længste flod i verden , men andre modstridende kilder citerer en 2007 undersøgelse, der gav titlen til Amazonfloden i Sydamerika . Nilen , som er 6.853 km -LRB- 4.258 miles -RRB-lang , er en "" international "" flod som sit afvandingsområde dækker elleve lande, nemlig Tanzania , Uganda , Rwanda , Burundi, Congo-Kinshasa , Kenya , Etiopien , Eritrea , Sydsudan , Sudan og Egypten . Navnlig er Nilen egyptens og Sudans primære vandkilde .   Nilen har to store bifloder, Den Hvide Nil og Den Blå Nil. Den Hvide Nil anses for at være udspringet og den primære strøm af Nilen selv. Den Blå Nil er imidlertid kilden til det meste af vandet og silt . Den Hvide Nil er længere og stiger i de store søers område i Centralafrika , med den fjerneste kilde stadig ubestemt, men placeret i enten Rwanda eller Burundi . Det løber nordpå gennem Tanzania , Lake Victoria , Uganda og Sydsudan . Den Blå Nil -LRB- -,- -RRB- begynder ved Tana-søen i Etiopien og løber ind i Sudan fra sydøst . De to floder mødes lige nord for den sudanesiske hovedstad Khartoum.   Den nordlige del af floden løber næsten udelukkende gennem den sudanesiske ørken til Egypten , og derefter ender i et stort delta og løber ud i Middelhavet . Egyptiske civilisation og sudanesiske kongeriger har været afhængige af floden siden oldtiden. De fleste af befolkningen og byerne i Egypten ligger langs de dele af Nildalen nord for Aswan, og næsten alle de kulturelle og historiske steder i det gamle Egypten findes langs flodbredder.   På det gamle egyptiske sprog kaldes Nilen Ḥ ' pī eller Iteru -LRB- Hapy -RRB- , der betyder '' floden ''. I koptisk , ordene piaro -LRB- Sahidic -RRB- eller phiaro-LRB- Bohairic-RRB- der betyder '' floden '' -LRB- tændt . p -LRB- h -RRB- . iar-o '' the.canal-great '' -RRB- kommer fra samme gamle navn .   Det engelske navn Nilen og de arabiske navne en-Nîl og an-Nîl stammer begge fra det latinske Nilus og det antikke græske Νε.λος . Ud over dette er ætologien imidlertid omstridt . En mulig etymologi stammer fra en semitisk Nahal , der betyder '' flod ''. De engelske standardnavne '' White Nile '' og '' Blue Nile '' , for at henvise til flodens kilde , stammer fra arabiske navne, der tidligere kun blev anvendt på de sudanesiske strækninger , der mødes i Khartoum .
evidence_en: The Nile -LRB- النيل , Egyptian Arabic en-Nīl , Standard Arabic an-Nīl ; ⲫⲓⲁⲣⲱ , P -LRB- h -RRB- iaro ; Ancient Egyptian : Ḥ ` pī and Iteru ; Biblical Hebrew : יאור , Ye'or -RRB- is a major north-flowing river in northeastern Africa . It is generally regarded as the longest river in the world , however other conflicting sources cite a 2007 study that gave the title to the Amazon River in South America . The Nile , which is 6,853 km -LRB- 4,258 miles -RRB- long , is an `` international '' river as its drainage basin covers eleven countries , namely , Tanzania , Uganda , Rwanda , Burundi , Congo-Kinshasa , Kenya , Ethiopia , Eritrea , South Sudan , Sudan and Egypt . In particular , the Nile is the primary water source of Egypt and Sudan .   The Nile has two major tributaries , the White Nile and Blue Nile . The White Nile is considered to be the headwaters and primary stream of the Nile itself . The Blue Nile , however , is the source of most of the water and silt . The White Nile is longer and rises in the Great Lakes region of central Africa , with the most distant source still undetermined but located in either Rwanda or Burundi . It flows north through Tanzania , Lake Victoria , Uganda and South Sudan . The Blue Nile -LRB- ዓባይ , ʿĀbay -RRB- begins at Lake Tana in Ethiopia and flows into Sudan from the southeast . The two rivers meet just north of the Sudanese capital of Khartoum .   The northern section of the river flows north almost entirely through the Sudanese desert to Egypt , then ends in a large delta and flows into the Mediterranean Sea . Egyptian civilization and Sudanese kingdoms have depended on the river since ancient times . Most of the population and cities of Egypt lie along those parts of the Nile valley north of Aswan , and nearly all the cultural and historical sites of Ancient Egypt are found along riverbanks .   In the ancient Egyptian language , the Nile is called Ḥ ` pī or Iteru -LRB- Hapy -RRB- , meaning `` river '' . In Coptic , the words piaro -LRB- Sahidic -RRB- or phiaro -LRB- Bohairic -RRB- meaning `` the river '' -LRB- lit . p -LRB- h -RRB- . iar-o `` the.canal-great '' -RRB- come from the same ancient name .   The English name Nile and the Arabic names en-Nîl and an-Nîl both derive from the Latin Nilus and the Ancient Greek Νεῖλος . Beyond that , however , the etymology is disputed . One possible etymology derives it from a Semitic Nahal , meaning `` river '' . The standard English names `` White Nile '' and `` Blue Nile '' , to refer to the river 's source , derive from Arabic names formerly applied only to the Sudanese stretches which meet at Khartoum .

evidence_da: Cloud Atlas er en tysk-amerikansk science fiction-film fra 2012 skrevet og instrueret af The Wachowskis og Tom Tykwer . Tilpasset fra 2004 roman af samme navn af David Mitchell , filmen har flere plots sat på tværs af seks forskellige epoker , som Mitchell beskrevet som '' en slags pointillist mosaik . '' Den officielle synopsis beskriver det som '' en udforskning af, hvordan de enkelte livs handlinger påvirker hinanden i fortiden , nutid og fremtid , som en sjæl er formet fra en morder til en helt , og en handling af venlighed krusninger gennem århundreder til at inspirere til en revolution .  '' Tom Hanks , Halle Berry , og Jim Broadbent føre et ensemble stemmer .   Filmen blev produceret af Grant Hill , Stefan Arndt , Wachowskis , og Tykwer . I løbet af fire års udvikling havde projektet problemer med at sikre økonomisk støtte ; det blev til sidst produceret med et budget på 102 millioner dollars fra uafhængige kilder , hvilket gør det til en af de dyreste uafhængige film nogensinde . Produktionen begyndte i september 2011 på Studio Babelsberg i Potsdam-Babelsberg , Tyskland .   september 2012 på 37th Toronto International Film Festival og blev udgivet den 26 oktober 2012 i konventionelle og IMAX biografer . Det polariserede kritikere , og er blevet optaget på forskellige bedste film og værste film lister . Det blev nomineret til en Golden Globe Award for bedste originale score for Tykwer -LRB, der co-scorede filmen -RRB- Johnny Klimek , og Reinhold Heil . Det modtog flere nomineringer på Saturn Awards, herunder Best Science Fiction Film , vinde for bedste redigering og bedste make-up .
evidence_en: Cloud Atlas is a 2012 German-American science fiction film written and directed by The Wachowskis and Tom Tykwer . Adapted from the 2004 novel of the same name by David Mitchell , the film has multiple plots set across six different eras , which Mitchell described as `` a sort of pointillist mosaic . '' The official synopsis describes it as `` an exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past , present and future , as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero , and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution . '' Tom Hanks , Halle Berry , and Jim Broadbent lead an ensemble cast .   The film was produced by Grant Hill , Stefan Arndt , the Wachowskis , and Tykwer . During four years of development , the project met difficulties securing financial support ; it was eventually produced with a $ 102 million budget provided by independent sources , making it one of the most expensive independent films of all time . Production began in September 2011 at Studio Babelsberg in Potsdam-Babelsberg , Germany .   It premiered on 8 September 2012 at the 37th Toronto International Film Festival and was released on 26 October 2012 in conventional and IMAX cinemas . It polarized critics , and has been included on various Best Film and Worst Film lists . It was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for Best Original Score for Tykwer -LRB- who co-scored the film -RRB- , Johnny Klimek , and Reinhold Heil . It received several nominations at the Saturn Awards including Best Science Fiction Film , winning for Best Editing and Best Make-up .

evidence_da: Cloud Atlas er en roman fra 2004 , den tredje bog af den britiske forfatter David Mitchell . Den består af seks indlejrede historier, der tager læseren fra det fjerntliggende sydlige Stillehav i det nittende århundrede til en fjern , post-apokalyptisk fremtid . Det vandt British Book Awards Literary Fiction Award og Richard & Judy Book of the Year award , og blev short-listet til 2004 Booker Prize , Nebula Award , Arthur C. Clarke Award , og andre priser .   En filmatisering af samme navn blev udgivet i 2012 .
evidence_en: Cloud Atlas is a 2004 novel , the third book by British author David Mitchell . It consists of six nested stories that take the reader from the remote South Pacific in the nineteenth century to a distant , post-apocalyptic future . It won the British Book Awards Literary Fiction Award and the Richard & Judy Book of the Year award , and was short-listed for the 2004 Booker Prize , Nebula Award , Arthur C. Clarke Award , and other awards .   A film adaptation of the same name was released in 2012 .

evidence_da: Diana -LRB- stiliseret som Diana-RRB- er den tiende studie solo album af den amerikanske sanger Diana Ross , udgivet den maj 22 , 1980 af Motown Records . Albummet er det bedst sælgende studiealbum i Ross' karriere , der sælger ni millioner eksemplarer på verdensplan og gyder tre internationale hitsingler , herunder det amerikanske nummer 1-hit '' Upside Down ''.
