evidence_en: Dogstar was an alternative rock group active from the mid-1990s to the early 2000s . The band performed at the 1996 Zwemdokrock Festival -LRB- Lummen , Belgium -RRB- and at the 1999 Glastonbury Festival -LRB- United Kingdom -RRB- , and it released an EP and two albums . The band garnered media attention due to the non-musical activities of bassist Keanu Reeves , who starred in major Hollywood action films such as Point Break , Speed and '' The Matrix .

evidence_da: Donald McKinley Glover -LRB- -LSB- יlķvər -RSB- født September 25 , 1983 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller , forfatter , producent , komiker , rapper , sanger , og sangskriver . Som musiker optræder han normalt under kunstnernavnet Childish Gambino , og som disc jockey optræder han under navnet mcDJ .   Han først kom til opmærksomhed for sit arbejde med Derrick Comedy og , med hjælp fra Tina Fey , blev ansat i en alder af 23 til at blive forfatter til NBC komedieserie 30 Rock . Han senere portrætteret community college studerende Troy Barnes på NBC sitcom Fællesskabet . Han i øjeblikket stjerner i FX-serien Atlanta , som han også skabt . Han vil blive vist i Spider-Man : Homecoming , og er blevet støbt som den unge Lando Calrissian i den kommende, untitled standalone Han Solo Star Wars film. Han vil også give stemme Simba i en genindspilning af Disney-filmen The Lion King .   Efter flere selvudgivne albums og mixtapes skrev Glover kontrakt med Glassnote Records i 2011 . Han udgav sit første album , Camp , on November 15 , 2011 til generelt positive anmeldelser . Hans andet studiealbum , Fordi internettet , blev udgivet den 10. evidence_en: Donald McKinley Glover -LRB- -LSB- ˈɡlʌvər -RSB- born September 25 , 1983 -RRB- is an American actor , writer , producer , comedian , rapper , singer , and songwriter . As a recording artist , he usually performs under the stage name Childish Gambino , and as a disc jockey , he performs under the name mcDJ .   He first came to attention for his work with Derrick Comedy and , with the help of Tina Fey , was hired at the age of 23 to become a writer for the NBC comedy series 30 Rock . He later portrayed community college student Troy Barnes on the NBC sitcom Community . He currently stars in the FX series Atlanta , which he also created . He will appear in Spider-Man : Homecoming , and has been cast as the young Lando Calrissian in the upcoming , untitled standalone Han Solo Star Wars movie . He will also provide the voice of Simba in a remake of the Disney film The Lion King .   After several self-released albums and mixtapes , Glover signed to Glassnote Records in 2011 . He released his first album , Camp , on November 15 , 2011 to generally positive reviews . His second studio album , Because the Internet , was released on December 10 , 2013 . Glover was nominated for two Grammy Awards in 2015 , Best Rap Album for Because the Internet and Best Rap Performance for his single `` 3005 '' . Glover 's third album , `` Awaken , My Love ! '' , was released on December 2 , 2016 .

evidence_en: Teen Wolf is an American television series developed by Jeff Davis for MTV . It is loosely based on the 1985 film of the same name , and stars Tyler Posey as a teenager named Scott McCall , who is bitten by a werewolf and must cope with how it affects his life and the lives of those closest to him , and Dylan O'Brien as `` Stiles '' Stilinski , Scott 's best friend . The series has received generally positive reviews from critics and is a fan favorite on social media .   Teen Wolf premiered on June 5 , 2011 , following the 2011 MTV Movie Awards . On July 9 , 2015 , Teen Wolf was renewed for a sixth season of 20 episodes , which premiered on November 15 , 2016 . On July 21 , 2016 , the cast announced at Comic Con that the sixth season would be the series ' final .

evidence_da: Robert Francis '' Bobby '' Kennedy-LRB- November 20 , 1925 - Juni 6 , 1968 -RRB-, almindeligvis kendt under hans initialer RFK , var en amerikansk politiker fra Massachusetts . Han fungerede som usa's junior senator fra New York fra januar 1965 til hans mord i juni 1968 . Han var tidligere den 64th US Attorney General fra januar 1961 til september 1964 , tjener under sin storebror præsident John F. Kennedy og hans efterfølger , præsident Lyndon B. Johnson . Kennedy var medlem af Det Demokratiske Parti , og ses som et ikon for moderne amerikansk liberalisme .   Efter at have gjort tjeneste i United States Naval Reserve som sømandslærling fra 1944 til 1946 , dimitterede Kennedy fra Harvard University og University of Virginia . Han begyndte sin politiske karriere i Massachusetts som leder for sin bror John 's succesfulde kampagne for det amerikanske senat i 1952 . Forud for at komme ind offentlige embeder selv , arbejdede han som korrespondent for The Boston Post og som en assisterende rådgiver for Senatets udvalg ledet af Joe McCarthy . Han fik national opmærksomhed som chefrådgiver for Senatets Labor Rackets Udvalg fra 1957 til 1959 , hvor han offentligt udfordret Teamsters præsident Jimmy Hoffa over den korrupte praksis i sin union og forfattet The Enemy Within , en bog om korruption i organiseret arbejdskraft .   Kennedy trak sig tilbage fra udvalget for at gennemføre sin bror John 's kampagne i 1960 præsidentvalget . Han blev udnævnt til justitsminister efter det vellykkede valg og fungerede som den nærmeste rådgiver for præsidenten fra 1961 til 1963 . Hans embedstid er bedst kendt for sin fortalervirksomhed for Borgerrettighedsbevægelsen , kampen mod organiseret kriminalitet og mafiaen , og engagement i USA's udenrigspolitik i forbindelse med Cuba . Efter mordet på sin bror forblev han i embedet i Johnson-administrationen i flere måneder . Han forlod for at køre for usa's Senat fra New York i 1964 og besejrede republikanske etablerede Kenneth Keating .   I 1968 var Kennedy en førende kandidat til demokraternes nominering til præsidentposten ; han appellerede især til fattige , afrikansk-amerikanske, spansktalende, katolske og unge vælgere . juni 1968 , efter at have besejret senator Eugene McCarthy i californien og South Dakota præsidentvalget primærvalg , blev han dødeligt såret af Sirhan Sirhan , en 24-årig rasende palæstinenser , og døde den følgende dag .
evidence_en: Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy -LRB- November 20 , 1925 -- June 6 , 1968 -RRB- , commonly known by his initials RFK , was an American politician from Massachusetts . He served as the United States junior senator from New York from January 1965 until his assassination in June 1968 . He was previously the 64th U.S. Attorney General from January 1961 to September 1964 , serving under his older brother President John F. Kennedy and his successor , President Lyndon B. Johnson . Kennedy was a member of the Democratic Party , and is seen as an icon of modern American liberalism .   After serving in the United States Naval Reserve as a Seaman Apprentice from 1944 to 1946 , Kennedy graduated from Harvard University and the University of Virginia . He began his political career in Massachusetts as the manager for his brother John 's successful campaign for the U.S. Senate in 1952 . Prior to entering public office himself , he worked as a correspondent for The Boston Post and as an assistant counsel to the Senate committee chaired by Joe McCarthy . He gained national attention as the chief counsel of the Senate Labor Rackets Committee from 1957 to 1959 , where he publicly challenged Teamsters President Jimmy Hoffa over the corrupt practices of its union and authored The Enemy Within , a book about corruption in organized labor .   Kennedy resigned from the committee to conduct his brother John 's campaign in the 1960 presidential election . He was appointed Attorney General after the successful election and served as the closest adviser to the president from 1961 to 1963 . His tenure is best known for its advocacy for the Civil Rights Movement , the fight against organized crime and the Mafia , and involvement in U.S. foreign policy related to Cuba . After his brother 's assassination , he remained in office in the Johnson administration for several months . He left to run for the United States Senate from New York in 1964 and defeated Republican incumbent Kenneth Keating .   In 1968 , Kennedy was a leading candidate for the Democratic nomination for the presidency ; he appealed especially to poor , African-American , Hispanic , Catholic and young voters . Shortly after midnight on June 5 , 1968 , after defeating Senator Eugene McCarthy in the California and South Dakota presidential primaries , he was mortally wounded by Sirhan Sirhan , a 24-year-old enraged Palestinian , and died the following day .

evidence_da: Alice Cooper -LRB- født Vincent Damon Furnier ; Februar 4 , 1948 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , sangskriver , og skuespiller, hvis karriere spænder over fem årtier . Med sin karakteristiske ru stemme og en scene viser, at funktioner guillotiner, elektriske stole, falsk blod, dødbringende slanger , baby dukker, og duellering sværd , Cooper anses af musik journalister og jævnaldrende både at være '' The Godfather of Shock Rock ''. Han har trukket ligeligt fra horror film , vaudeville , og garage rock til pioner en makabre og teatralskmærke af rock designet til at chokere folk .   Oprindelse i Phoenix , Arizona , i slutningen af 1960'erne, efter at han flyttede fra Detroit , Michigan , '' Alice Cooper '' var oprindeligt et band bestående af Furnier på vokal og harmonika , lead guitarist Glen Buxton , Michael Bruce på rytme guitar , Dennis Dunaway på bas guitar  , og trommeslager Neal Smith . Den oprindelige Alice Cooper band udgivet sit første album i 1969, men brød ind i den internationale musik mainstream med 1971 hit '' I 'm Atten' fra deres tredje studiealbum Love It to Death , som blev efterfulgt af den endnu større single '' School 's Out' i 1972 .  Bandet nåede deres kommercielle højdepunkt med albummet Billion Dollar Babies fra 1973 .   Furnier adopterede bandets navn som sit eget navn i 1970'erne og begyndte en solokarriere med konceptalbummet Welcome to My Nightmare fra 1975 . I 2011 udgav han Welcome 2 My Nightmare , hans 19. album som soloartist og 26. album i alt . I 2011 blev det oprindelige Alice Cooper band optaget i Rock and Roll Hall of Fame . Udvide fra hans Detroit rock rødder , Cooper har eksperimenteret med en række musikalske stilarter , herunder kunst rock, hard rock , heavy metal , ny bølge, glam metal, pop rock , eksperimenterende rock , og industrielle rock .   Cooper er kendt for sin sociale og vittige persona offstage , med The Rolling Stone Album Guide kalder ham verdens mest '' elskede heavy metal entertainer ''. Han er krediteret for at hjælpe med at forme lyden og udseendet af heavy metal, og er blevet beskrevet som kunstneren, der '' først introducerede horror billedsprog til rock 'n' roll , og hvis scenekunst og showmanship har permanent forvandlet genren ''. Væk fra musik , Cooper er en film skuespiller, en golf berømthed , en restauratør , og, siden 2004 , en populær radio DJ med sin klassiske rock show Nights med Alice Cooper .
evidence_en: Alice Cooper -LRB- born Vincent Damon Furnier ; February 4 , 1948 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter , and actor whose career spans over five decades . With his distinctive raspy voice and a stage show that features guillotines , electric chairs , fake blood , deadly snakes , baby dolls , and dueling swords , Cooper is considered by music journalists and peers alike to be `` The Godfather of Shock Rock '' . He has drawn equally from horror films , vaudeville , and garage rock to pioneer a macabre and theatrical brand of rock designed to shock people .   Originating in Phoenix , Arizona , in the late 1960s after he moved from Detroit , Michigan , `` Alice Cooper '' was originally a band consisting of Furnier on vocals and harmonica , lead guitarist Glen Buxton , Michael Bruce on rhythm guitar , Dennis Dunaway on bass guitar , and drummer Neal Smith . The original Alice Cooper band released its first album in 1969 but broke into the international music mainstream with the 1971 hit `` I 'm Eighteen '' from their third studio album Love It to Death , which was followed by the even bigger single `` School 's Out '' in 1972 . The band reached their commercial peak with the 1973 album Billion Dollar Babies .   Furnier adopted the band 's name as his own name in the 1970s and began a solo career with the 1975 concept album Welcome to My Nightmare . In 2011 , he released Welcome 2 My Nightmare , his 19th album as a solo artist and 26th album in total . In 2011 , the original Alice Cooper band was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame . Expanding from his Detroit rock roots , Cooper has experimented with a number of musical styles , including art rock , hard rock , heavy metal , new wave , glam metal , pop rock , experimental rock , and industrial rock .   Cooper is known for his social and witty persona offstage , with The Rolling Stone Album Guide calling him the world 's most `` beloved heavy metal entertainer '' . He is credited with helping to shape the sound and look of heavy metal , and has been described as the artist who `` first introduced horror imagery to rock 'n' roll , and whose stagecraft and showmanship have permanently transformed the genre '' . Away from music , Cooper is a film actor , a golfing celebrity , a restaurateur , and , since 2004 , a popular radio DJ with his classic rock show Nights with Alice Cooper .

evidence_da: Jeff Bezos -LRB- -LSB- Januar 12 , 1964 -RRB- er en amerikansk teknologi og detailhandel iværksætter, investor , og filantrop , der er bedst kendt som grundlægger, formand, og administrerende direktør for Amazon.com , som er verdens største online shopping forhandler . Virksomheden begyndte som en Internet købmand af bøger og udvidet til en bred vifte af produkter og tjenester, senest video streaming og audio streaming . Amazon.com er i øjeblikket verdens største internetsalgsselskab på World Wide Web , samt at være verdens største leverandør af cloud-infrastrukturtjenester , gennem sin Amazon Web Services arm .   Bezos 's andre diversificerede forretningsmæssige interesser omfatter rumfart og aviser . Han er grundlægger og producent af Blue Origin -LRB- grundlagt i 2000 -RRB- med testflyvninger til rummet, der startede i 2015 , og planer om kommerciel suborbital menneskelig rumflyvning begynder i 2018 . I 2013 købte Bezos Avisen The Washington Post . En række andre forretningsinvesteringer forvaltes gennem Bezos Expeditions .   Med en anslået nettoformue på 82 milliarder dollar pr. maj 2017 er Bezos i øjeblikket den tredjerigeste person i verden - lige bag Bill Gates og Amancio Ortega på første- og andenpladsen og lige foran Warren Buffett på fjerdepladsen . Hans stigning til denne position opstod efter Amazon registreret en 67 % hoppe i aktiekursen .
evidence_en: Jeff Bezos -LRB- -LSB- ˈbeɪzoʊs -RSB- born Jeffrey Preston Jorgensen ; January 12 , 1964 -RRB- is an American technology and retail entrepreneur , investor , and philanthropist who is best known as the founder , chairman , and chief executive officer of Amazon.com , which is the world 's largest online shopping retailer . The company began as an Internet merchant of books and expanded to a wide variety of products and services , most recently video streaming and audio streaming . Amazon.com is currently the world 's largest Internet sales company on the World Wide Web , as well as being the world 's largest provider of cloud infrastructure services , through its Amazon Web Services arm .   Bezos 's other diversified business interests include aerospace and newspapers . He is the founder and manufacturer of Blue Origin -LRB- founded in 2000 -RRB- with test flights to space which started in 2015 , and plans for commercial suborbital human spaceflight beginning in 2018 . In 2013 , Bezos purchased The Washington Post newspaper . A number of other business investments are managed through Bezos Expeditions .   With an estimated net worth of US$ 82 billion as of May 2017 , Bezos is currently the third-richest person in the world , just behind Bill Gates and Amancio Ortega in first and second places , and just ahead of Warren Buffett in fourth place . His rise to this position occurred after Amazon registered a 67 % jump in share price .

evidence_en: Bryan Lee Cranston -LRB- born March 7 , 1956 -RRB- is an American actor , voice actor , screenwriter , director and producer . He is best known for portraying Walter White on the AMC crime drama series Breaking Bad , Hal on the Fox comedy series Malcolm in the Middle , and Dr. Tim Whatley in five episodes of the NBC comedy series Seinfeld .   For Breaking Bad , Cranston won the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series four times -LRB- 2008 -- 2010 , 2014 -RRB- , including three consecutive wins -LRB- the second time in television history after Bill Cosby in I Spy during the 1960s -RRB- . After becoming one of the producers of Breaking Bad in 2011 , he also won the award for Outstanding Drama Series twice .   Cranston was also nominated three times for the Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series for his role in Malcolm in the Middle . His role in Breaking Bad also earned him five Golden Globe nominations and one win in 2014 , nine Screen Actors Guild Awards nominations with four wins , and six Satellite Awards nominations with four wins . In June 2014 , he won a Tony Award for Best Actor in a Play for his portrayal of Lyndon B. Johnson in the play All the Way on Broadway . He reprised his role in the television film of the same name , which debuted on HBO in May 2016 . For the film Trumbo -LRB- 2015 -RRB- , he received widespread acclaim and was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor .   Cranston has directed episodes of various television series , including seven episodes of Malcolm in the Middle , three episodes of Breaking Bad , two episodes of Modern Family and one episode of The Office . He has also appeared in several acclaimed films such as Saving Private Ryan -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , Little Miss Sunshine -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Drive -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , Argo -LRB- 2012 -RRB- and Godzilla -LRB- 2014 -RRB- . In 2015 , Cranston , together with David Shore , executive produced and wrote the story for the Amazon Studios original crime drama Sneaky Pete , the pilot episode of which aired on August 7 , 2015 .

evidence_da: Tyra Lynne Banks -LRB- født December 4 , 1973 -RRB- er en amerikansk tv-personlighed , producent , forretningskvinde , skuespiller , forfatter , tidligere model og lejlighedsvis sanger . Født i Inglewood , Californien , hun begyndte sin karriere som model i en alder af 15 , og var den første afroamerikanske kvinde, der skal figurerede på forsiderne af GQ og Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue , hvor hun optrådte to gange . Hun var en Victoria 's Secret Angel fra 1997 til 2005 . I begyndelsen af 2000'erne var Banks en af verdens bedst indtjenende modeller .   Banks begyndte at handle på tv i 1993 på The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air , og fik sin filmdebut i Higher Learning i 1995 . Hun havde store roller som Eve i Disney Channel 's Life-Size og Zoe i box office hit Coyote Ugly . Hun havde små roller i den romantiske film Love & Basketball og horror film Halloween : Resurrection , og dukkede op i tv-serien Gossip Girl og Glee .   I 2003 oprettede og begyndte Banks at præsentere den langvarige reality-tv-serie America 's Next Top Model , som hun udøvende produceret og præsenteret for de første 22 sæsoner indtil seriens aflysning i oktober 2015 . Hun forblev executive producer for genoplivning af serien , og hyret Rita Ora som vært for den 23 cyklus, før omlægge tolden selv for den kommende fireogtyvende cyklus . Banks var medskaber af True Beauty , og havde sit eget talkshow , The Tyra Banks Show , som blev sendt på Cw i fem sæsoner og vandt to Daytime Emmy awards for Outstanding Talk Show Informative . Hun var medvært på talkshowet FABLife i to måneder. I 2017 , Banker vil erstatte Nick Cannon som vært for America 's Got Talent for sin 12.   I 2010 udgav hun en ung voksen roman med titlen Modelland , baseret på hendes liv som en model, der toppede The New York Times Bestseller liste i 2011 . Banker er en af fire afroamerikanere og syv kvinder, der gentagne gange har rangeret blandt verdens mest indflydelsesrige mennesker ved TIME Magazine .
evidence_en: Tyra Lynne Banks -LRB- born December 4 , 1973 -RRB- is an American television personality , producer , businesswoman , actress , author , former model and occasional singer . Born in Inglewood , California , she began her career as a model at age 15 , and was the first African American woman to be featured on the covers of GQ and the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue , on which she appeared twice . She was a Victoria 's Secret Angel from 1997 to 2005 . By the early 2000s , Banks was one of the world 's top-earning models .   Banks began acting on television in 1993 on The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air , and made her film debut in Higher Learning in 1995 . She had major roles such as Eve in Disney Channel 's Life-Size and Zoe in the box office hit Coyote Ugly . She had small roles in the romantic film Love & Basketball and horror film Halloween : Resurrection , and appeared in television series Gossip Girl and Glee .   In 2003 , Banks created and began presenting the long-running reality television series America 's Next Top Model , which she executive produced and presented for the first twenty-two seasons until the series ' cancellation in October 2015 . She remained executive producer for the revival of the series , and enlisted Rita Ora as host for the twenty-third cycle before reassuming the duties herself for the upcoming twenty-fourth cycle . Banks was the co-creator of True Beauty , and had her own talk show , The Tyra Banks Show , which aired on The CW for five seasons and won two Daytime Emmy awards for Outstanding Talk Show Informative . She co-hosted the talk show FABLife for two months . In 2017 , Banks will replace Nick Cannon as host of America 's Got Talent for its 12th season .   In 2010 , she published a young adult novel titled Modelland , based on her life as a model which topped The New York Times Best Seller list in 2011 . Banks is one of four African Americans and seven women to have repeatedly ranked among the world 's most influential people by TIME magazine .

evidence_da: Charlemagne -LRB- -LSB- ----Rl-RSB- -RRB- eller Charles the Great -LRB- 2 April 742/747/74828 Januar 814 -RRB-, nummereret Charles I , var kongen af Franks fra 768 , Konge af Lombards fra 774 og kejser af romerne fra 800 . Han forenet en stor del af Europa i den tidlige middelalder . Han var den første anerkendte kejser i Vesteuropa siden det vestromerske imperiums fald tre århundreder tidligere . Den udvidede frankiske stat, at Charlemagne grundlagde blev kaldt Carolingian Empire .   Charlemagne var den ældste søn af Pepin den korte og Bertrada af Laon . Han blev konge i 768 efter sin fars død , i første omgang som co-lineal med sin bror Carloman I. Carloman 's pludselige død i 771 under uforklarlige omstændigheder forlod Karl den Store som den ubestridte hersker i det frankiske kongerige . Han fortsatte sin fars politik over for pavedømmet og blev dens beskytter , fjerne Lombards fra magten i det nordlige Italien og fører en indtrængen i muslimske Spanien . Han kæmpede mod sakserne mod sin øst , kristne dem ved dødsstraf og fører til begivenheder som massakren i Verden . Charlemagne nåede højden af sin magt i 800, da han blev kronet kejser af romerne af pave Leo III juledag på Old St. Peter 's Basilica .   Charlemagne er blevet kaldt '' Europas Fader '' -LRB- Pater Europae -RRB- , da han for første gang siden romerriget forførste gang siden romerriget forførste gang siden romerriget . Hans styre ansporede den karælerenæssance , en periode med energisk kulturel og intellektuel aktivitet i den vestlige kirke . Alle hellige romerske kejsere betragtede deres riger som efterkommere af Karl den Stores imperium , op til den sidste kejser Francis II og de franske og tyske monarkier .   Men den østortodokse kirke ser Karl den Store mere kontroversielt , mærkning som heterodokse hans støtte til filiok og anerkendelse af biskoppen af Rom som legitim romersk kejser , snarere end at anerkende Irene af Athen i det østlige romerske imperium . Disse og andre rænkespil førte til den endelige opdeling af Rom og Konstantinopel i den store skisma i 1054 .   Charlemagne døde i 814 , efter at have regeret som kejser i tretten år . Han blev lagt til hvile i sin kejserlige hovedstad Aachen i, hvad der i dag Tyskland . Han giftede sig mindst fire gange og havde tre legitime sønner , men kun hans søn Louis den Fromme overlevede at efterfølge ham .
evidence_en: Charlemagne -LRB- -LSB- ˈʃɑːrlᵻmeɪn -RSB- -RRB- or Charles the Great -LRB- 2 April 742/747/74828 January 814 -RRB- , numbered Charles I , was the King of the Franks from 768 , King of the Lombards from 774 and Emperor of the Romans from 800 . He united much of Europe during the early Middle Ages . He was the first recognised emperor in western Europe since the fall of the Western Roman Empire three centuries earlier . The expanded Frankish state that Charlemagne founded was called the Carolingian Empire .   Charlemagne was the oldest son of Pepin the Short and Bertrada of Laon . He became king in 768 following his father 's death , initially as co-ruler with his brother Carloman I. Carloman 's sudden death in 771 in unexplained circumstances left Charlemagne as the undisputed ruler of the Frankish Kingdom . He continued his father 's policy towards the papacy and became its protector , removing the Lombards from power in northern Italy and leading an incursion into Muslim Spain . He campaigned against the Saxons to his east , Christianising them upon penalty of death and leading to events such as the Massacre of Verden . Charlemagne reached the height of his power in 800 when he was crowned Emperor of the Romans by Pope Leo III on Christmas Day at Old St. Peter 's Basilica .   Charlemagne has been called the `` Father of Europe '' -LRB- Pater Europae -RRB- , as he united most of Western Europe for the first time since the Roman Empire . His rule spurred the Carolingian Renaissance , a period of energetic cultural and intellectual activity within the Western Church . All Holy Roman Emperors considered their kingdoms to be descendants of Charlemagne 's empire , up to the last Emperor Francis II and the French and German monarchies .   However , the Eastern Orthodox Church views Charlemagne more controversially , labelling as heterodox his support of the filioque and recognition by the Bishop of Rome as legitimate Roman Emperor , rather than recognising Irene of Athens of the Eastern Roman Empire . These and other machinations led to the eventual split of Rome and Constantinople in the Great Schism of 1054 .   Charlemagne died in 814 , having ruled as emperor for thirteen years . He was laid to rest in his imperial capital of Aachen in what is today Germany . He married at least four times and had three legitimate sons , but only his son Louis the Pious survived to succeed him .

evidence_da: Skizofreni er en psykisk lidelse karakteriseret ved unormal social adfærd og manglende forståelse af, hvad der er virkeligt . Almindelige symptomer omfatter falske overbevisninger , uklar eller forvirret tænkning , høre stemmer, som andre ikke hører , reduceret socialt engagement og følelsesmæssige udtryk , og manglende motivation . Mennesker med skizofreni har ofte yderligere psykiske problemer såsom angst, svær depressiv sygdom, eller stofbrug lidelser . Symptomerne typisk kommer på gradvist, begynder i den unge voksenalder, og vare i lang tid .   Årsagerne til skizofreni omfatter miljømæssige og genetiske faktorer . Mulige miljømæssige faktorer omfatter at blive rejst i en by, cannabis brug, visse infektioner, forældrealderen, og dårlig ernæring under graviditeten . Genetiske faktorer omfatter en række almindelige og sjældne genetiske varianter. Diagnosen er baseret på observeret adfærd , personens rapporterede oplevelser og rapporter om andre, der er fortrolige med personen . Under diagnosen skal der også tages hensyn til en persons kultur . Fra 2013 er der ingen objektiv test . Skizofreni indebærer ikke en '' split personlighed '' eller '' flere personlighedsforstyrrelse '' - betingelser, som det ofte forveksles med i offentlighedens opfattelse .   Grundpillen i behandlingen er antipsykotisk medicin , sammen med rådgivning, jobtræning og social rehabilitering . Det er uklart, om typiske eller atypiske antipsykotika er bedre. Hos dem, der ikke forbedres med andre antipsykotika clozapin kan blive retsforfulgt . I mere alvorlige situationer - hvor der er risiko for sig selv eller andre - kan ufrivillig hospitalsindlæggelse være nødvendig , selv om hospitalsophold nu er kortere og mindre hyppige, end de engang var.   Omkring 0,3 - 0,7 % af befolkningen er ramt af skizofreni i løbet af deres levetid. I 2013 var der anslået 23,6 millioner tilfælde på verdensplan . Hanner er oftere påvirket end kvinder. Omkring 20 % af befolkningen klarer sig godt , og nogle få kommer sig helt . Sociale problemer , såsom langtidsledighed , fattigdom og hjemløshed , er almindelige . Den gennemsnitlige forventede levetid for personer med sygdommen er ti til femogtyve år mindre end for den almindelige befolkning . Dette er resultatet af øgede fysiske sundhedsproblemer og en højere selvmordsrate -LRB- omkring 5 % -RRB- . I 2015 en anslået 17,000 mennesker på verdensplan døde af adfærd relateret til , eller forårsaget af , skizofreni .
evidence_en: Schizophrenia is a mental disorder characterized by abnormal social behavior and failure to understand what is real . Common symptoms include false beliefs , unclear or confused thinking , hearing voices that others do not hear , reduced social engagement and emotional expression , and a lack of motivation . People with schizophrenia often have additional mental health problems such as anxiety disorders , major depressive illness , or substance-use disorders . Symptoms typically come on gradually , begin in young adulthood , and last a long time .   The causes of schizophrenia include environmental and genetic factors . Possible environmental factors include being raised in a city , cannabis use , certain infections , parental age , and poor nutrition during pregnancy . Genetic factors include a variety of common and rare genetic variants . Diagnosis is based on observed behavior , the person 's reported experiences , and reports of others familiar with the person . During diagnosis a person 's culture must also be taken into account . As of 2013 there is no objective test . Schizophrenia does not imply a `` split personality '' or `` multiple personality disorder '' -- conditions with which it is often confused in public perception .   The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic medication , along with counselling , job training , and social rehabilitation . It is unclear whether typical or atypical antipsychotics are better . In those who do not improve with other antipsychotics clozapine may be tried . In more serious situations -- where there is risk to self or others -- involuntary hospitalization may be necessary , although hospital stays are now shorter and less frequent than they once were .   About 0.3 -- 0.7 % of people are affected by schizophrenia during their lifetimes . In 2013 there were an estimated 23.6 million cases globally . Males are more often affected than females . About 20 % of people do well , and a few recover completely . Social problems , such as long-term unemployment , poverty , and homelessness are common . The average life expectancy of people with the disorder is ten to twenty-five years less than for the general population . This is the result of increased physical health problems and a higher suicide rate -LRB- about 5 % -RRB- . In 2015 an estimated 17,000 people worldwide died from behavior related to , or caused by , schizophrenia .
